18.18: mq paag ninb Eei tia xij zu'g weig ninb kanb Eei zwid taig, laaij ninb nyruq myenb weig tu'q Eaanb yaag Zaavq ninb Eei kxb yrud Eei ka'naaiq, yaag yem ninb Eei Jwavg fivj myenb Bu'Dovj zruj maiq penj Eei sig.
18.8: ninb kaaq Eaanb pun myenb yaag maiq lovg leig, kaaq liud yaag maiq lovg kaub Zamq pwrnq. ninb Lwrtq puad maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig. ninb yem i laanb myenb Bu'Dovj pcvb fim Eei tunj sig.
18.3: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, yem naaiq mivb yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv meib Bua maiq tu'q cvj lovg naaiq tiub waab peiq.
18.32: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia maiq a'Neiq haiq taub myenb zu'g taig. xij zu'g kxiq Hruq Rwrnj, tu'q mcvg zyavb Jyenq a'q.
18.21: “mq paag sij kxvq x'q myenb kxiq Hruq kwavg Gxi ninb paamd Eei yetg zuvq zwid, ei Jyenq yia Eei leid yaag zruj tu'q hxpg, zruj tu'q pcvb fim Eei, ninb zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq, maiq zu'g taig.
18.14: “mq paag sij kxvq naaiq laanb myenb maaib taub txn, txn pwatg tia zruj Eei yetg zuvq zwid, ninb zyrug kamb Riaj, maiq ei Jyenq zruj.
18.23: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “x'q myenb taig yia a'Neiq Eei fai? yia a'Neiq Eei se ninb kxiq Hruq kwavg ninb zruj Eei x'q sig tu'q zyavb Jyenq maiq zeid?
18.6: sij kxvq ninb maiq yem Bov kub vwaaig Eang ziag pun miub favj Eei ka'naaiq, yaag maiq Zau Myen paaij i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei miub favj, ninb maiq Yenj myenb Eei auq, yaag maiq Zauj maaib sinb yeng Eei msia'q txn pweij.
18.2: “meib Bua fuvg zanb zang Ramg Jyenq kxvq Tauj i-saa-laa-en teib puv naaiq tiub waab peiq? meib Bua kxvq, “+‘tia Eang a'vung pyrub swi, txn Eei Eaab Fyend.’
18.20: haiq taub paamd zwid, uaq taub xij zu'g taig. txn maiq zu'g weig tia zruj Eei zwid Daamb txv. tia yaag maiq zu'g weig txn zruj Eei zwid Daamb txv. Kuq myenb weig ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig winb pun ninb. x'q myenb weig ninb zruj Eei x'q sig zu'g winb pun ninb.
18.24: “mq paag sij kxvq Kuq myenb kwavg ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig cvj paamd zwid yaag zruj x'q myenb zruj Eei yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig, uaq taub myenb hxpg zu'g tu'q mcvg zyavb fai? tovb ninb zinb Daavg zruj Jiaj taaib Eei Kuq sig yia zuvq maiq Javj. laaij ninb Byenq Hruq yaag laaij ninb paamd Eei zwid, ninb xij zu'g taig a'q.
18.28: weig zu'g ninb Namb Rwrnj, kwavg Gxi ninb paamd Eei yetg zuvq zwid. ninb Dovg haaij zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq. ninb maiq zu'g taig.
18.7: ninb maiq zeij haiq taub, zuvq zx'q txvb taaub Twij Rwrnj pun kaaq zc'q Eei myenb. ninb maiq luq myenb Eei ka'naaiq, zuvq zx'q kanb Eei Eang hopq pun vxg Eei myenb, yaag zx'q lwib hruj pun Fav sin Eei myenb zu'q.
18.29: mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun kxvq, ‘zyruq zruj Eei Jauq se maiq pcvb fim.’ o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia Eei Jauq maiq zeid pcvb fim Eei fai? se meib Bua kanb Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim maiq zeid?
18.19: “meib Bua Zxg kxvq, ‘txn weig haiq tiug maiq zu'g weig ninb Eei tia zruj Eei zwid Daamb txv?’ txn zruj tu'q hxpg, zruj tu'q pcvb fim Eei, kan yia Eei leid yaag ei Jyenq zruj, ninb Dovg haaij zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
18.17: ninb Lwrtq puad maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig. ninb kaaq Eaanb pun myenb yaag maiq lovg leig, kaaq liud yaag maiq lovg kaub Zamq pwrnq. ninb kan yia Eei leid yaag ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg. “ninb maiq weig ninb Eei tia Eei zwid zu'g taig, ninb zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
18.31: meib Bua xij zu'g zx'q meib Bua zruj txvg yia Eei yetg zuvq zwid kwavg Revg. xij zu'g tu'q syavb Hruq, syavb livb wrnb. o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! meib Bua weig haiq tiug xij taig?
18.30: “o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b!” zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “weig naaiq yia xij ziuj meib Bua kx'g myenb zruj Eei sig syemq. kxiq Hruq kwavg meib Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq zwid maa'b! Riaj meib Bua Eei zwid haib pun meib Bua Di'q zu'g Dxpg zyrug zu'g myetg.
18.27: mq paag sij kxvq cvj maaib laanb myenb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei x'q sig, cvj zruj tu'q hxpg, zruj pcvb fim, ninb zyrug Fruj tu'q kanb Eei mcvg.
18.11: (maiq kunq ninb Eei tia maiq zruj Jiaj naaiq teij haiq Euvg waaig sig), “naaiq taub txn yem Bov Eang ziag pun miub favj Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Yenj Jwavg laavd myenb Eei auq.
18.5: “sij kxvq maaib taub Kuq myenb, ninb zruj tu'q hxpg yaag zruj tu'q pcvb fim,
18.9: ninb kan yia Eei leid, yaag kan lovj yia Eei leib latg. naaiq Euvg myenb se Kuq myenb, ninb zuvq tu'q mcvg zyavb Jyenq.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
18.16: ninb maiq zruj txvg haiq taub, yaag maiq lovg txvb taaub. ninb maiq luq myenb Eei ka'naaiq, zuvq zx'q Eang hopq pun vxg Eei myenb, yaag pun lwib hruj Fav sin Eei myenb zu'q.
18.4: mavg maa'b! mrud taub myenb Eei mcvg penj yia Eei. maiq kunq tiaj maag fai fu'Jweiq Eei mcvg, yaag penj yia Eei. haiq taub myenb paamd zwid, uaq taub xij zu'g taig.
18.10: “sij kxvq ninb maaib taub txn zruj Zyruq, taij myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq fai zruj naaiq teij haiq Euvg sig pun myenb,
18.22: ninb zruj Eei yetg zuvq zwid yia zyrug maiq Javj. weig ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig ninb tu'q zyavb Jyenq.”
18.12: ninb zeij myenb Jomg myenb Zauj tavb tonj Eei myenb, yaag luq myenb Eei ka'naaiq. ninb maiq Kavq Twij zruj txvb taaub Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Zau Myen paaij miub favj, ninb zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig.
18.15: “ninb maiq yem Bov Eang ziag pun miub favj Eei ka'naaiq, maiq Zau Myen paaij i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei miub favj. ninb yaag maiq Yenj Jwavg laavd myenb Eei auq.
18.13: ninb puvj zc'q weig lovg leig weig tu'q kaub Zamq pwrnq. naaiq Euvg myenb haib maaib mcvg zyavb fai? ninb zuvq maiq tu'q mcvg zyavb. ninb zruj liud naaiq teij yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig, ninb zuvq xij zu'g taig a'q. ninb Eei zwid ninb kanb zu'g Daamb txv.
18.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
18.26: sij kxvq Kuq myenb kwavg ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig mivb zruj waaig sig, ninb xij zu'g weig ninb zruj Eei zwid zu'g taig. ninb xij zu'g taig weig ninb paamd Eei zwid.
18.25: “mq paag meib Bua Zxg kxvq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq zruj se maiq pcvb fim.’ o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! mwavj maa'b! yia zruj Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim fai? se meib Bua kanb zruj Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim maiq zeid?

45.18: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “zib Laaj scvb yetq meib xij zu'g lovg taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei vovb kruq lunj weig saaj sivj ting Zivb Revg.
45.8: naaiq teij Dau yem i-saa-laa-en Bu'Dovj Paaiq penj huvb Eei pwrng. yem naaiq mivb huvb tiaj maiq cvj zeij yia Eei pc'g fivj. mq paag huvb xij pun ninb Bua ziuj ninb Bua Eei fivj tu'q ninb Bua Eei Dau.”
45.3: yem naaiq teij Zivb Revg Dau, xij zu'g Dx'g zx'q Zwrtq pwrng Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g. yem naaiq ka'Euad xij zu'g lyepg sivj ting, se kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj.
45.21: “+‘+“zib Laaj zyepg feij uaq Nxi xij zu'g Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq. siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Eang maiq an pivq Eei Fuaq.
45.14: meib Bua fovg hxg Eei ka'lanq yrub, yetg Ko-laa. xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg Batg zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq. (yetg Ko-laa Zauj yetg ho-me fib Dovg Eei, maaib zyepg Batg.)
45.23: Jiaj zipq Eei siag Nxi ka'Euad, Nxib Nxi ninb xij zu'g liug leid fovg hxg siag taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei vovb kruq lunj Zauj siag taub pa'ki yuvb kruq zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq. yaag xij zu'g Nxib Nxi lovg taub yuvb kruq ziag fi'q zwid.
45.6: “+‘+“nitq Jyenq tivg penj Zivb Revg txvj Eei pwrng Dau xij zu'g Paaiq pwrng penj zivb Eei txvj, Javq pyaa Zin Dx'g, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g. penj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun Eei pwrng.
45.2: yem naaiq teij Dau ka'Euad xij zu'g maaib Qovj Dau weig sivj ting, Daauq Mmd pc'q Dx'g, Javq Mmd pc'q Dx'g feib puv. Wiv Rwrnj ka'Len xij zu'g maaib txvj Kuvj Mmd zyepg Dx'g.
45.20: naaiq nxm Laaj scvb Zyetq xij zu'g weig Za'g prug fai maiq kx'g Jaav paamd zwid Eei haiq taub myenb fi'q zwid. meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq weig zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fi'q zwid.
45.24: ninb yaag xij zu'g liug leid fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g. yetg taub vovb kruq xij zu'g maaib yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g Zauj Jyenq fovg hxg. yetg taub yuvb kruq yaag xij zu'g lovg yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g Zauj Jyenq fovg hxg. yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g xij zu'g lovg pyei kxvg ka'lanq yrub Zauj Jyenq.
45.7: “+‘+“huvb tiaj Eei Dau xij zu'g yem Zivb Revg Eei Dau Zauj lyepg zivb Eei Dau i puv ka'Len, yem fai puv ka'Len Zwrtq mivb fai puv, tov puv ka'Len Zwrtq mivb tov puv. yem fai puv Tauj tov puv Eei kapg Jaaij se Zauj yetg fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Dau fib Daau.
45.19: sai myenb xij zu'g zx'q teij ziag weig fi'q zwid Eei scvb Kuq Ryaamq zaij zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb zrug Zauj ziab txvb Kwav pia'g uaq teij txvj Eei pyei nxm kx'q, Zauj ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg kcvb Eei kcvb zrug.
45.17: huvb kanb Eei pwrng se xij zu'g weig Jiaj Eei zipq, se syavb Laaj Zauj tivb kov Nxi Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb tivg taaib Eei yetg zuvq zipq, pun fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g, Zauj Ziaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq. ninb xij zu'g Beng ka'naaiq fi'q zwid, Zauj fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g, Zauj puaq ziag Eei, Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, weig fi'q i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei zwid.”
45.11: e-faa Zauj Batg xij zu'g txij, Lo faij fib Navq Eei. yetg Batg se yetg ho-me Eei zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq. yetg e-faa penj yetg ho-me zyepg kruq Eei yetg kruq. xij zu'g lovg ho-me penj myenb yetg kau lovg Laau Eei sruj mrug.
45.5: cvj maaib pwrng Dau, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g. naaiq teij Dau penj yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fub suj uaq teij le-wi myenb Eei Dau weig penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng lyepg zivb yem.
45.9: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “o i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb aa'b! kauj a'q. meib Bua xij zu'g kwavg Gxi zruj to'g, zeij myenb Eei sig. xij zu'g zruj pcvb fim Eei Jauq Zauj hxpg Eei Jauq. meib Bua xij zu'g kwavg Gxi maiq tuvq zung yia Eei pc'g fivj leib Gxi ninb Bua Ripg Eei Dau.” zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq,
45.16: “zyavb nxm teib puv Eei pc'g fivj xij zu'g txb naaiq teij ka'naaiq fovg hxg pun i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb.
45.4: naaiq teij Dau penj Zivb Revg Eei pwrng, se pun sai myenb, tovb yem sivj ting ka'Euad mivb nitq fatq zyruq fub suj ninb uaq teij sai myenb. naaiq teij Dau penj ninb Bua zruj kanb Eei pyauq Eei txvj yaag penj Zivb Revg txvj weig sivj ting.
45.10: “meib Bua xij zu'g lovg Ryav tu'q hxpg Eei Tinb pcvb tavq. Laau ka'naaiq xij zu'g Laau hxpg.
45.22: tovb uaq Nxi huvb tiaj xij zu'g weig kanb yaag weig kua'q ka'Euad Eei zwavj pc'g fivj liug leid taub vovb kruq lunj zruj ziag fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq.
45.12: yetg se-Kenj xij zu'g maaib Eig zyepg ke-laa. pyaa se-Kenj xij zu'g za'kevb pyaa se-Kenj, zyepg se-Kenj xij zu'g za'kevb zyepg se-Kenj. meib Bua Eei mi-naa xij zu'g maaib Mmd zyepg se-Kenj.
45.15: yem i-saa-laa-en Eei nxmb nxm Eyemd Eei miab Zyavq, mrud Eig pc'q taub pa'ki yuvb xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg taub. naaiq se zruj ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, weig Tevj pc'g fivj fi'q zwid.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
45.13: “+‘+“naaiq se meib Bua xij zu'g fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq. yetg ho-me Byaub witq xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg e-faa Ju'q kruq Eei yetg kruq. yetg ho-me Byaub Baa-li xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg e-faa Ju'q kruq Eei yetg kruq.
45.1: “+‘+“meib Bua Paaiq Dau penj Ripg Eei pwrng, xij zu'g fovg hxg pwrng penj zyruq Eei Zivb Revg Dau, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g. yem ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq Dau penj Zivb Revg Dau.
45.25: “+‘+“Tauj Zyetq Laaj zyepg Mmd uaq Nxi, Jiaj zipq Eei siag Nxi ka'Euad, huvb tiaj xij zu'g Navq naaiq liug leid fovg hxg weig fi'q zwid Zauj fovg hxg puaq ziag Zauj fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g Zauj ka'lanq yrub.”

3.18: sij kxvq yia Buaj x'q myenb, ‘meib Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g taig,’ meib yaag maiq tonq ninb yaag maiq Kwinj ninb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj x'q Eei Jauq weig Fruj ninb Eei mcvg nx, uaq taub x'q myenb zuvq xij zu'g laaij ninb Eei zwid taig, mq paag weig ninb zu'g taig yia pun meib Daamb txv.
3.8: yia xij pun meib vcvg tu'q Jyenq ninb Bua, yaag xij pun meib Eei mGxvq kaub vcvg Jiaj ninb Bua Eei mGxvq.
3.3: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Eang yia pun meib naaiq Fung sru. Eang Fiag pwavq meib Eei ka'sia.” yia zyrug Eang. yem Rwib haid Navq mweib txvb nx kaam.
3.21: mq paag sij kxvq meib tonq Kuq myenb maiq tuvq paamd zwid, ninb yaag maiq paamd zwid, ninb Dovg haaij zuvq tu'q mcvg zyavb, weig zu'g ninb tu'q zipq meib tonq Eei waag. meib yaag tu'q Fruj meib kanb Eei mcvg.”
3.14: sivj livb prub yia faauj cvj txb yia mivb. yia haid Hruq yrug Kruq yrug Qiaj Jiad Eei. mq paag zyruq Eei tomb Qa'q yem yia Eei sin.
3.23: Navq naaig yia Jiad taaib mivb uaq Daub pcvb. maaib zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem uaq, Navq yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len yia pwatg Jiaj Eei Favb laavg nx. yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau.
3.6: maiq zeid Paaiq meib mivb Tauj kxvq kanb fivj myenb Eei waag fai a'g tu'q kxvq Eei waag, tovb meib maiq haib pia'g Hruq Eei waag. sij kxvq yia Paaiq meib mivb lxd naaiq Euvg myenb, taaij ninb Bua zuvq xij mwavj meib.
3.2: yia zyrug mxvj Gxi Rwib, ninb yaag pun yia Eang uaq Fung sru.
3.20: “cvj maaib tiug. sij kxvq maaib taub Kuq myenb kwavg ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig cvj paamd zwid, yia zyrug zx'q Euvg pun ninb Di'q zu'g Dxpg, ninb yaag zu'g taig. weig zu'g meib maiq tonq ninb, ninb xij zu'g laaij ninb Eei zwid taig. ninb zruj Jiaj Eei Kuq sig maiq maaib haiq taub Javj. weig ninb zu'g taig, yia pun meib Daamb txv.
3.24: mq paag sivj livb pia'g yia, Tevj yia sruq Jiad sin taaib. zyruq Zauj yia kxvq waag cvj Buaj yia, “Rwrnj pyauq mivb zx'q kanb wrnj Jyenq.
3.7: mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun maiq Kavq mwavj meib kxvq weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq Kavq mwavj yia. i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun mtaaib penj mnxmb hod, Hruq vcvg Eei myenb.
3.19: mq paag sij kxvq meib tonq x'q myenb, ninb yaag maiq kwavg ninb zruj Eei x'q sig, yaag maiq kwavg ninb zruj x'q Eei Jauq. ninb xij zu'g laaij ninb kanb Eei zwid zu'g taig, mq paag meib tu'q Fruj Zwrtq meib kanb Eei mcvg.
3.17: “paamb myenb aa'b! yia lyepg meib zruj syruq kcv myenb syruq i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun. meib haiq zang haid yia kxvq, meib xij zu'g txb yia Eei waag Tevj yia tonq ninb Bua.
3.27: mq paag yia Zauj meib kxvq waag Eei zyavb hog, yia xij pun meib Eei Rwib Gxi. meib zyrug Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.’ haiq taub mwavj, kunq pun ninb mwavj. haiq taub vcvg Jyenq maiq mwavj, sweib ninb vcvg, weig zu'g ninb Bua mtaaib Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.
3.11: mivb a'q. mivb meib Eei pwrnb kua'q zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb uaq Zauj ninb Bua kxvq. maiq kunq ninb Bua mwavj fai maiq mwavj xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq.’+”
3.5: meib maiq zeid zu'g Paaiq mivb Tauj kxvq kanb fivj myenb Eei waag fai a'g tu'q kxvq Eei waag. yia Paaiq meib mivb se mivb lxd i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun.
3.9: yia pun meib Eei mGxvq vcvg, kaub vcvg Jiaj vcvg haig Eei la'pyeiq, zuvq kaub vcvg trub lau. pwatg ninb Bua Eei Myen maiq tuvq kamb Riaj, maiq tuvq Hruq Waav maiq kunq ninb Bua se Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.”
3.16: uaq teij siag Nxi Jiaj liud, yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
3.4: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g mivb i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun uaq, txb yia Eei waag Buaj ninb Bua.
3.10: Tinb huvb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g lovg mnxmb mwavj yaag lovg Hruq Javj Jyenq yia kxvq Eei yetg zuvq waag.
3.22: yem uaq zyruq Eei Qa'q Fiag taaib yem yia. ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “Jiad taaib mivb uaq Daub pcvb. yem uaq yia xij Zauj meib kxvq waag.”
3.12: uaq zang sivj livb prub yia faauj. zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem ninb Eei txvj faauj uaq zang, yia haid yem yia Eei Ga'haaq Gaav maaib Qiaj lomb lomd Eei Bwi.
3.15: yia zyrug Tauj zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb yem Ten-aa-Bipg, Ke-Baa Daaib Len uaq. yia yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zweid Jyenq yrub yru yia'g yia'q siag Nxi.
3.13: yia haid uaq teij Qiaj se uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei Daatq Zxb Jaaj, cvj Zauj yem ninb Bua Eei ka'Len uaq teij yenb Eei Qiaj lomb lomd Eei Bwi Navq Daub tovd.
3.1: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! kunq Eang Zunq pun meib Eei ka'naaiq, se Eang naaiq Fung sru. Eang liud mivb Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun kxvq.”
3.26: yia xij pun meib Eei Byetg nctq Jyenq Rwib tuvd, meib zyrug Vovj mivb, maiq haib kxvq ninb Bua, weig zu'g ninb Bua mtaaib Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.
3.25: paamb myenb aa'b! myenb xij zx'q Laav Dob Jyenq meib, meib zyrug zu'g Dob, maiq haib Zwrtq mivb yem myenb Bu'Dovj.

43.18: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘naaiq se Zeij zyavj ziab txvb uaq Nxi puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq yaag lovg scvb Kuq Ryaamq fu'q ziab txvb Eei leid.
43.8: huvb tiaj pun ninb Bua Eei kcvb Bc'q txij yia Eei kcvb Bc'q yaag pun ninb Bua Eei kcvb zrug yem nitq yia Eei kcvb zrug, Kuvj maaib Du'g Pev Fovg Genj Jyenq Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig pun yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj maaib wij. yia zyrug Qiaj Jiad, myetg ninb Bua.
43.3: yia pwatg naaiq teij laaug yaavb Eei sig Navq zinb Daavg yia pwatg ninb taaib myetg uaq nxm zivb, yaag pwatg Navq zinb Daavg yia yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len uaq teij laaug yaavb Eei sig. yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag Dau.
43.21: meib yaag xij zu'g zx'q ziag weig fi'q zwid uaq taub vovb kruq yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Eiag, tovb Paaiq zyavj penj Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Zivb Revg txvj ka'Eiag mcvj, puaq.
43.14: yem Daub peib, kxnb Do'q kub vwaaig faauj ta'yetq Kav Tauj Kwav pia'g ka'Euad Lav i Dx'g. Kwav pia'g ka'Euad Eei txvj Javq yetg Dx'g. yem faij uaq Kav Tauj Lo uaq Kav Lav pyei Dx'g. Kwav pia'g ka'Euad Javq yetg Dx'g.
43.23: meib saaj liud ziab txvb, meib xij zu'g zx'q taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei vovb kruq txn Zauj yem pa'ki yuvb kwanb zx'q taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei pa'ki yuvb kruq fovg hxg.
43.6: uaq laanb myenb sruq Jyenq yia Eei ka'Len uaq zang, yia haid maaib taub yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Zauj yia kxvq waag.
43.2: yia mavg pwatg i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg yem tov puv mcvj taaib. ninb Eei Qiaj Bwi Navq uam Zamq zob zod Eei Bwi. Daub peib yaag cvq Zwrtq ninb Eei Favb laavg.
43.20: xij zu'g zx'q teij naaiq taub vovb kruq Eei Ryaamq zaij ziab txvb Eei kx'q uaq teij pyei nxm Jxv cvj Zauj Kwav pia'g Eei txvj pyei puv kx'q, yaag zaij kxmj pyei puv ka'Len faauj Lav Eei txvj. Navq naaiq nx saaj liud ziab txvb, ziab txvb zyrug Zivb Revg mig a'q.
43.24: xij zu'g txb Tauj zyruq Eei Ra'Myen. sai myenb zyrug zx'q Rauq Yaamj Jyenq cvj fovg hxg penj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq pun zyruq.
43.7: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! naaiq se yia Eei weig Zauj yia Eei zaub penq Zaaiq Eei txvj. se yia yetg liud yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Eei txvj. yem naaiq mivb i-saa-laa-en myenb, lyemb ninb Bua kanb Zauj ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj, maiq pun yia Eei Zivb Revg mevb maaib wij. ninb Bua maiq hxpg zu'g zavg Eiag Eei zyenb. ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj kwei seij, maiq tuvq txb sei zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad zavj.
43.19: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib xij zu'g zx'q yetg taub vovb kruq pun le-wi fivj, saaj-Dokg Eei zeib fun uaq teij sai myenb, ziag weig fi'q zwid. ninb Bua taaib nitq fatq fub suj yia.
43.17: Bu'Dovj uaq Kav, Kwav pia'g ka'Euad Eei txvj ka'Len, yaag feib puv Eei, Daauq zyepg feij Dx'g, Javq zyepg feij Dx'g. Wiv kxmj ka'Len Lav Daamb Dx'g. ziab txvb Eei kxn Kwav pia'g Eei txvj yaag Javq Zwrtq yetg Dx'g. ziab txvb Eei Tei Win mivb tov puv mcvj.”
43.27: naaiq teij Nxib Eia'g Jiaj liud, yem ta'petq Nxi Jiaj mivb, sai myenb xij zu'g yem ziab txvb puaq meib Bua fovg hxg puaq ziag Zauj fovg hxg weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq. yia zyrug hxpg Hruq meib Bua.’+” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
43.11: sij kxvq ninb Bua Eaiq ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig, xij zu'g pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q zruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei yetg Eeig, se pyauq Navq haiq nx yem, pia'g Zwrtq Eei txvj Navq haiq nx, Zauj yetg zuvq mru zeiq Navq haiq nx. yaag xij zu'g pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei leib latg Zauj yetg zuvq leid. xij zu'g txv Jyenq ninb Bua fiaq Fiag weig pun ninb Bua ei Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei leib latg Zauj yetg zuvq leid zruj.
43.5: sivj livb prub yia faauj, txb yia pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav zivb laatg. zyruq Eei Favb laavg yaag pwavq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq mig a'q.
43.9: ib zang ninb Bua xij zu'g kwavg, maiq zavg Eiag Eei zyenb. ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj Eei sei yaag xij zu'g zavj leib ko yia. yia zyrug yetg liud yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.
43.16: ziab txvb Eei Roj feib puv, Daauq zyepg Eeig Dx'g, Javq zyepg Eeig Dx'g.
43.4: zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem tov puv mcvj Eei laatg kcvb pia'g zavg zyruq Eei pyauq ka'Euad uaq zang,
43.10: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq mevb naaiq nxm zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Jaub lrug pun i-saa-laa-en myenb mwavj, pun ninb Bua lovb lovj Eei Namq Tauj zyrug Eaiq ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig.
43.22: “+‘ta'Eeig Nxi meib xij zu'g zx'q taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei yuvb kruq fovg hxg ziag fi'q zwid, weig saaj ziab txvb Zivb Revg taaib Navq lovg vovb kruq saaj nx.
43.12: “naaiq se zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei leid. yem Bovb nivq kub vwaaig weib kxmj Eei txvj yetg zuvq penj Zivb Revg Eei txvj. mavg maa'b! naaiq se zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei leib latg.
43.15: ziab txvb kub vwaaig, puaq ziag Eei Roj, Lav pyei Dx'g. naaiq teij txvj Eei pyei nxm kx'q, yetg nxm kx'q maaib yetg nxm Jxv Lav yetg Dx'g.
43.13: “yem naaiq mivb kxvq ziab txvb Eei Zi'g Zunj, kxvq penj Dx'g. (naaiq teij Dx'g se yetg Dx'g levb yetg puab zaavq.) ziab txvb Eei kxnb Do'q Lav yetg Dx'g, Javq yetg Dx'g. Wiv kxmj ka'Len Lav yetg naamj. ziab txvb se Bcvg naaiq Lav.
43.1: Ga'haaq uaq laanb myenb txb yia mivb Tauj Win mivb tov puv Eei laatg kcvb.
43.26: sai myenb xij zu'g saaj ziab txvb Zivb Revg pwavq siag Nxi Zivj saaj Revg. yaag xij zu'g fuvj pun zyruq weig penj Zivb Revg Eei txvj.
43.25: “+‘siag Nxi ka'Euad xij zu'g Nxib Nxi fovg hxg taub yuvb kruq ziag weig fi'q zwid. meib yaag xij zu'g fovg hxg taub vovb kruq Zauj taub yem yuvb kwanb maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei pa'ki yuvb kruq.

14.18: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, maiq kunq uaq teij pua laanb myenb yem naaig ka'Euad, ninb Bua lyemb kanb Eei naamb Erud Fruj maiq tu'q. Kuvj haib Fruj tu'q kanb Navq.
14.8: yia zyrug Byenq Myen pun uaq laanb myenb. yia pun ninb penj Javb hog yaag pun myenb lovg ninb zruj kruq kxvq. yia xij pun ninb yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj zu'g Pai kwavg. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
14.3: “paamb myenb aa'b! naaiq teij myenb zx'q miub favj an Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag zx'q hxig ninb Bua paamd zwid, Di'q zu'g Dxpg Eei ka'naaiq, an Jyenq ninb Bua Eei uaq Daavg mcvj. yia Zxg hxpg zu'g pun ninb Bua naaig yia fai?
14.21: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia tivg ye-lu-saa-lem myenb Eei zwid pun ninb Bua zu'g naaiq teij pyei Euvg ze'g naang kaub Zyruq Dovg haaij Zamq. se pun ninb Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq, vxg Naavj, Zyruq Eei Yiab zxib Zauj wrnb pcvg pun myenb Zauj scvb Kuq zu'g myetg Revg.
14.14: maiq kunq maaib naaiq teij pua laanb myenb, no-yaa, Daa-ni-en Zauj yopq yem naaig nxm teib puv ka'Euad, weig ninb Bua zruj Eei Kuq sig ninb Bua haib Fruj ninb Bua kanb Eei mcvg Navq.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
14.23: meib Bua tu'q pwatg ninb Bua Eei Jauq Zauj ninb Bua zruj Eei sig, meib Bua zyrug Hruq fov teij, yaag hiuq tu'q yia yem ye-lu-saa-lem zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig maaib kxnb pcvj.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
14.6: “weig naaiq xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “xij zu'g kxiq Hruq kwavg Gxi meib Bua Eei miub favj yaag Win Myen maiq tuvq mavg meib Bua yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig.
14.2: yia yaag tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
14.20: maiq kunq no-yaa, Daa-ni-en Zauj yopq yem naaiq nxm teib puv ka'Euad, zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb kxvq, ninb Bua lyemb kanb Eei naamb Erud Fruj maiq tu'q. ninb Bua Kuvj weig kanb zruj Eei Kuq sig Fruj tu'q kanb Eei mcvg Navq.
14.7: “+‘+“i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun fai yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Eei haiq fivj myenb, ta'faanb haiq taub, tovb leib Gxi yia, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei miub favj an Jyenq Hruq, zx'q hxig kanb Di'q zu'g Dxpg paamd zwid uaq Euvg ka'naaiq an ninb Eei Ra'Myen, zyrug cvj taaib lxd trug waag myenb naaig yia Tauj ninb Bua Eei sig weig Tevj kanb tu'q lovj, yia, zyruq kanb, xij tau ninb.
14.19: “fai sij kxvq yia pun wrnb pcvg pia'g uaq nxm teib puv, yaag pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq myetg ninb Bua, lyemb myenb Zauj scvb Kuq myetg Revg,
14.17: “fai sij kxvq yia txb Ru'g Daauq hxig uaq nxm teib puv zyrug kxvq, ‘pun Ru'g Daauq Jiaj uaq nxm teib puv a'q,’ yia zyrug zx'q teib puv Eei myenb, lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq, taij Revg.”
14.11: yia Navq naaiq zruj weig pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun maiq cvj leib Gxi yia, yaag maiq cvj paamd zwid kua'q kanb maaib wij. Navq naaig ninb Bua zyrug penj yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia yaag zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.”+’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
14.5: yia Navq naaiq zruj weig pun yia haib Rcv i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei Hruq Rwrnj, se kan ninb Bua Eei miub favj zyrug leib ko yia uaq teij yetg zuvq myenb.”+’
14.9: “+‘+“sij kxvq maaib taub trug waag myenb zu'g Duaq kxvq yetg Jruj trug Eei waag, se yia, zyruq, Duaq uaq taub trug waag myenb. yia zyrug suv yia Eei puad Zauj ninb txib tekg, zx'q ninb yem yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa- laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj, myetg Revg.
14.16: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, maiq kunq naaiq teij pua laanb myenb yem naaiq nxm teib puv ka'Euad, lyemb ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud yaag Fruj maiq tu'q. Kuvj haib Fruj tu'q kanb Navq, mq paag uaq nxm teib puv xij Waav Revg.
14.4: weig naaiq meib xij zu'g Zauj ninb Bua kxvq, yaag Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. “i-saa-laa-en Eei haiq taub zeib fun zx'q miub favj an Jyenq Hruq yaag zx'q hxig ninb paamd zwid Di'q zu'g Dxpg Eei ka'naaiq an Ra'Myen, Ga'haaq taaib lxd trug waag myenb, yia, zyruq kanb, xij tau ninb laaij ninb Eei miub favj Zamq.
14.10: ninb Bua zyrug weig kanb zruj txvg Eei zwid Daamb txv. uaq taub trug waag myenb Zauj Toq naaig Eei myenb zyrug zu'g tivg zwid fib Navq Eei.
14.22: mq paag yem naaig ka'Euad maaib tu'q mcvg Zwrtq zevg Fiag Eei myenb txb ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud Zwrtq. ninb Bua Zwrtq Tauj meib Bua naaig, meib Bua tu'q pwatg ninb Bua zruj Eei sig. meib Bua zyrug haid Hruq kaub fov weig yia pun ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g Eei ze'g naang, se yia pun uaq nxm zivb zu'g Eei yetg zuvq sig.
14.12: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
14.15: “sij kxvq yia pun Zyruq Eei Yiab zxib Jiaj naaiq nxm teib puv vaatg myenb zyrug pun teib puv Waav mig a'q, laaij naaiq teij Yiab zxib, maiq maaib haiq taub Jiaj tu'q teib puv.
14.13: “paamb myenb aa'b! sij kxvq haiq nxm kua'q Eei myenb paamd zwid, maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yia, yia zyrug suv yia Eei puad Zauj uaq nxm teib puv txib tekg, pun ninb Bua Eei laavb zi'g tavj, pun ninb Bua vxg Naavj, yaag zx'q myenb Zauj Yiab zxib myetg Revg.
14.1: maaib teij i-saa-laa-en Eei myenb koj taaib lxd yia yaag zweid Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.

48.18: nitq Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei pwrng zevg Fiag Eei Dau, tov puv mcvj Daauq yetg waang Dx'g, fai puv Daauq yetg waang Dx'g yaag yem nitq Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei teib Jaaij. yem naaiq teij Dau ka'Euad tu'q Eei kcvb zwavj penj yem zivb ka'Euad zruj kov uaq teij myenb Eei Eang hopq.
48.8: “nitq Jyenq yu-Daa fivj Eei kapg Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv, xij zu'g zx'q Zwrtq teij penj kanb Za'levg Eei Dau, Javq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g. yem tov puv Tauj fai puv yaag fib Daau yetg fivj tu'q Eei pwrng Dau. sivj ting yem zyavj Bu'Dovj
48.33: “naamb puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g. maaib pua taub laatg kcvb. maaib si-me-on Eei laatg kcvb, itg-saaj-Kaa Eei laatg kcvb Zauj sej-Bu-lun Eei laatg kcvb.
48.3: “nitq Jyenq aa-se Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj napq-Taa-li Eei pwrng Dau.
48.32: “tov puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g. maaib pua taub laatg kcvb. maaib yo-sepq Eei laatg kcvb, Ben-yaa-min Eei laatg kcvb Zauj Daan Eei laatg kcvb.
48.21: “Zivb Revg Eei Dau Zauj zivb Eei Dau i puv ka'Len zevg Fiag Eei Dau xij zu'g penj huvb tiaj Eei. yem uaq teij i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g Eei ka'Len mivb Tauj tov puv Eei kapg Jaaij, cvj yem uaq teij i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g Eei ka'Len mivb Tauj fai puv Eei kapg Jaaij Zauj fivb fivj tu'q Eei Dau fib Dovg. naaiq teij Dau xij zu'g pun penj huvb tiaj Eei pwrng. Zivb Revg Eei Dau Zauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei sivj ting yem Bu'Dovj.
48.35: “Dx'g Wiv kxmj zivb maaib yetg waang Yetg Zin Dx'g. “yem naaiq mivb naaiq nxm zivb Eei Buaj heug, ‘ zyruq yem naaiq.’ ”
48.14: naaiq teij Dau maiq tuvq zx'q haiq teij taaib maaig fai Tiuq. maiq tuvq pun penj kanb taub Ripg Eei pwrng weig zu'g penj zyruq Eei Zivb Revg Dau.
48.23: “zevg Fiag Eei fivj, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj Ben-yaa-min fivj Eei pwrng Dau.
48.6: “nitq Jyenq e-faa-im Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj lu-Ben Eei pwrng Dau.
48.34: “fai puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g. maaib pua taub laatg kcvb. maaib kaatg Eei laatg kcvb, aa-se Eei laatg kcvb Zauj napq-Taa-li Eei laatg kcvb.
48.2: “nitq Jyenq Daan Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj aa-se Eei pwrng Dau.
48.20: meib Bua kanb Za'levg zx'q Zwrtq Eei Zivb Revg Dau, lyemb zivb Eei Dau, feib puv Javq Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g.
48.24: “nitq Jyenq Ben-yaa-min fivj Eei kapg Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj si-me-on fivj Eei pwrng Dau.
48.28: “kaatg fivj Eei naamb puv kapg Jaaij yem Taa-maa mivb Tauj me-li-Batg-Kaa-Detg Eei uam, kan i-yipq Eei Do'g txn mivb Tauj tomb Kxiq.
48.7: “nitq Jyenq lu-Ben Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj yu-Daa Eei pwrng Dau.
48.29: “naaiq teij Dau se meib Bua xij zu'g Paaiq pun Gxi fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. naaiq zyrug penj ninb Bua tu'q Eei pwrng Dau.” zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.
48.19: yem zivb ka'Euad zruj kov Eei fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb xij zu'g laib naaiq teij Dau.
48.17: zivb xij zu'g maaib miab Zyavq. yem pa'q puv mcvj maaib Eig pc'q Mmd zyepg Dx'g, yem naamb puv maaib Eig pc'q Mmd zyepg Dx'g, tov puv maaib Eig pc'q Mmd zyepg Dx'g, fai puv maaib Eig pc'q Mmd zyepg Dx'g.
48.31: taub taub laatg kcvb kan i-saa-laa-en fivj Eei Buaj heug. pa'q puv maaib pua taub laatg kcvb. maaib lu-Ben Eei laatg kcvb, yu-Daa Eei laatg kcvb Zauj le-wi Eei laatg kcvb.
48.30: “yem naaiq mivb kxvq Zwrtq zivb Eei laatg kcvb. zivb Eei pa'q puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
48.27: “nitq Jyenq sej-Bu-lun fivj Eei kapg Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj kaatg fivj Eei pwrng Dau.
48.11: naaiq teij Dau penj saaj Zivb Revg Eei sai myenb Eei pwrng, se saaj-Dokg Eei zeib fun, tovb ei Jyenq yia hatg Eei waag. i-saa-laa-en myenb zruj txvg uaq zang, ninb Bua maiq kan Jyenq zruj txvg Navq le-wi myenb zruj.
48.5: “nitq Jyenq maa-natq-sej Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj e-faa-im Eei pwrng Dau.
48.9: “tovb meib Bua zx'q Zwrtq penj zyruq Eei Dau, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g.
48.16: zivb Eei Zi'g Zunj se Navq naaiq. pa'q puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g, naamb puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g, tov puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g, fai puv pyei Zin Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
48.4: “nitq Jyenq napq-Taa-li Eei teib Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj maa-natq-sej Eei pwrng Dau.
48.10: naaiq teij Zivb Revg Dau xij zu'g Navq naaiq pun Gxi. sai myenb tu'q Eei pwrng yem pa'q puv mcvj, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, fai puv Javq yetg waang Dx'g, tov puv Javq yetg waang Dx'g, naamb puv Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g. zyruq Eei sivj ting yem zyavj Bu'Dovj.
48.22: le-wi myenb Eei Dau Zauj zivb Eei Dau xij zu'g yem huvb tiaj Eei pwrng Bu'Dovj. yem yu-Daa fivj Eei kapg Jaaij Zauj Ben-yaa-min fivj Eei kapg Jaaij Bu'Dovj penj huvb tiaj Eei pwrng.
48.12: naaiq teij Dau yem Zivb Revg Eei Dau ka'Euad penj ninb Bua levg Jeiq Eei pwrng, se kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj Eei pwrng, yaag nitq Jyenq le-wi myenb Eei pwrng Dau.
48.15: “zevg Fiag Eei Dau Javq pyaa Zin Dx'g, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g lovg weig zivb Qyemj zu'g lovg Eei, se weig zruj pyauq Zauj miab Zyavq. zivb xij zu'g yem Bu'Dovj.
48.13: “yem sai myenb Eei Dau ka'Len se le-wi myenb tu'q Eei pwrng Dau, Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g. yetg zuvq zyrug Daauq i waang pyaa Zin Dx'g, Javq yetg waang Dx'g.
48.1: “yem naaiq mivb se fivb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Buaj. yem pa'q puv mcvj Jiad kxn yem Kxiq kan hetq-lon uaq tiub Jauq mivb Tauj haa-matq Eei Jaub Kuq cvj mivb Tauj haa-saa-e-non, (se yem Daa-matq-katg Eei pa'q puv kapg Jaaij nitq Jyenq haa-matq) Daan fivj tu'q Eei pwrng Dau yem tov puv mivb Tauj fai puv.
48.26: “nitq Jyenq itg-saaj-Kaa fivj Eei kapg Jaaij, yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj sej-Bu-lun fivj Eei pwrng Dau.
48.25: “nitq Jyenq si-me-on Eei kapg Jaaij yem tov puv Tauj fai puv penj itg-saaj-Kaa fivj Eei pwrng Dau.

34.18: meib Bua yem lovj haig Eei miab Zyavq Eang lovj haig Eei miaq Zxg maiq kauj fai? meib Bua Zxg lovg teib Zaaiq zevg Fiag Eei miaq. meib Bua hopq uamb Rav Zxg maiq kauj fai? Zxg lovg meib Bua Eei teib Qruq zevg Fiag Eei uam Fo'g mivb.
34.8: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd waag. weig zu'g yia Eei pa'ki yuvb maiq maaib myenb kruj, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub mivb zimb lxd ninb Bua, yia Eei pa'ki yuvb penj yetg zuvq Yiab zxib Eang Eei ka'naaiq. taauj Rwrnj uaq teij kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb Kuvj kruj kanb Navq, maiq kruj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb.
34.3: meib Bua Eang xb Jung, zu'q yuvb pyei Eei lwi, taij kaub Jung Jiaj Eei pa'ki yuvb Eang, mq paag maiq kruj pa'ki yuvb.
34.21: weig zu'g meib Bua lovg Ba'taub Zauj sin Bevj yetg zuvq hei Eei, mau Eei uaq teij, yaag lovg Jxv zov Tauj meib Bua pun ninb Bua Raanj mivb pyei puv.
34.14: yia xij puvj ninb Bua yem lovj haig Eei miab Zyavq. ninb Bua Eei miab Zyavq yaag yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bovb Lav. ninb Bua haib pweij Fiag miaq lovj Eei Zyavq, se yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov Eang lovj haig, Kuq haig Eei miaq.
34.23: yia xij xn yetg taub kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb, se yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, kruj ninb Bua. ninb xij kruj ninb Bua yaag penj ninb Bua Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb.
34.6: yia Eei pa'ki yuvb yrub kan yetg zuvq Bov Zauj nxmb nxm Bovb Lav mivb. yia Eei pa'ki yuvb Raanj mivb yem luvb Diaq Eei Daub peib, yaag maiq maaib myenb zimb lxd.”
34.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq i-saa-laa-en Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb. xij zu'g trug waag kxvq ninb Bua, se kxvq uaq teij mavg pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb, Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb Kuvj kruj kanb Navq zyrug xij zu'g Kruq a'q. kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb xij zu'g kruj pa'ki yuvb maiq zeid?
34.20: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “yia xij yem pa'ki yuvb Jung Zauj pa'ki yuvb Jaig Bu'Dovj syemq,
34.24: yia, zyruq, xij zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb. yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, yaag xij yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zruj kaub Lo Jiaj uaq taub huvb tiaj. yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q.
34.28: yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua maiq zu'g kanb kua'q myenb luq. teib puv Eei Yiab zxib yaag maiq vaatg ninb Bua. ninb Bua tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem ninb Bua Eei teib puv, maiq maaib haiq taub zruj hc'q ninb Bua.
34.7: “+‘weig naaiq meib Bua kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag.
34.29: yia zx'q maaib mevb taub, Daub Truq lovj Eei livb teig pun ninb Bua. yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua maiq zu'g vxg Naavj taig, yaag maiq zu'g kanb kua'q myenb mavg Piaj ninb Bua.
34.19: yia Eei pa'ki yuvb xij zu'g Eang meib Bua Zaaiq Fiag Eei miaq yaag hopq meib Bua Eei teib Qruq Fo'g Eei uam se hxpg Eei fai?
34.17: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb aa'b! yia xij yem pa'ki yuvb Bu'Dovj syemq yetg taub yetg taub, yaag zx'q pa'ki yuvb kruq Zauj yuvb kruq pun Gxi.
34.31: meib Bua zruj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb, se yia Eei miab Zyavq Eei pa'ki yuvb. meib Bua penj paamb myenb. yia penj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”+’+”
34.30: ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj ninb Bua yem. ninb Bua se i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, penj yia Eei pc'g fivj. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
34.27: lomb Waav Eei Dyavj xij Zwrtq pyruq. Daub peib xij Zwrtq kcvb zwavj. ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem ninb Bua Eei teib puv. yia wrtq ninb Bua kaad Eei Dyavb kaad nauq, Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq hxig ninb Bua zruj nrub uaq teij Eei puab Diaq uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
34.11: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia kanb xij zimb lxd, xij lxd pwatg yia kanb Eei pa'ki yuvb.
34.5: ninb Bua faatq Raanj Revg weig zu'g maiq maaib kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb. Raanj mivb Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua penj yetg zuvq Yiab zxib Eang Eei ka'naaiq.
34.9: weig naaiq meib Bua kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
34.16: tivj laaib uaq teij, yia xij mivb lxd. txvg Jauq uaq teij, yia xij txb Rwrnj. zu'g mun uaq teij, yia xij peu Dia. mau uaq teij, yia xij Tevj henq. mq paag Jung Eei, henq Eei, yia xij myetg. yia xij lovg pcvb fim Eei Jauq kruj naaiq teij pa'ki yuvb.
34.4: mau uaq teij, meib Bua maiq Tevj henq. putq pcvg uaq teij, meib Bua maiq zxg. zu'g mun Eei, meib Bua maiq peu. txvg Jauq uaq teij, meib Bua maiq txb Rwrnj. tivj laaib uaq teij, meib Bua maiq lxd. taauj Rwrnj meib Bua kunq ninb Bua, yaag Qa'q zeij, zruj to'g ninb Bua.
34.10: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia Zauj uaq teij kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb taaq win. yia xij zx'q yia Eei pa'ki yuvb yem ninb Bua Eei puab Diaq Rwrnj, maiq pun ninb Bua kruj a'q. Navq naaig ninb Bua maiq tu'q cvj kruj ninb Bua kanb. yia xij Fruj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb pyauj Dutq ninb Bua Eei Rwib, maiq pun zruj ninb Bua Eei Eang hopq a'q.”
34.22: weig naaiq yia xij Fruj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb. yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua zyrug maiq zu'g zeij a'q. yia yaag xij yem ninb Bua yetg taub yetg taub pa'ki yuvb Bu'Dovj syemq ninb Bua.
34.12: kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb Navq haiq nx yem ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb Raanj mivb Eei txvj lxd ninb Eei pa'ki yuvb, yia yaag xij Navq uaq nx lxd yia Eei pa'ki yuvb. naaiq teij pa'ki yuvb yem Bwrnb Jia'q Mwavj Eei Nxi zu'g Raanj mivb Eei nxmb nxm txvj, yia xij yem uaq Fruj ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib.
34.15: yia kanb zruj yia Eei pa'ki yuvb Eei kruj pa'ki yuvb myenb yaag pun ninb Bua tu'q pweij Fiag.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
34.13: yia xij yem maang fivj maang kua'q txb ninb Bua Rwrnj taaib yem ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv. yia xij kruj ninb Bua yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov Zauj tiub tiub uamb Len Zauj myenb yem Fiag Eei yetg zuvq txvj.
34.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
34.26: yia xij pun ninb Bua Zauj weib kxmj yia Eei Bov nxmb nxm txvj penj Zeij fu'q Eei txvj. yia xij ziuj Zunb Zyru pun luvb twib Byuvg, penj Zeij fu'q pun myenb Eei Byuvg.
34.25: “+‘+“yia xij Zauj ninb Bua lyepg vcvg waag pun ninb Bua pcvb xn Eei yem, yaag pun yem teib puv Zyruq Eei Yiab zxib zutg Revg. ninb Bua zyrug haib pcvb xn Eei yem teib puvb Waav yaag pweij uaq Dyavb lomg.

2.3: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! yia Paaiq meib mivb Tauj i-saa-laa-en myenb, se mivb Tauj yetg fivj Hruq vcvg Eei myenb. ninb Bua vcvg Jyenq yia. ninb Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij zuvq zruj txvg yia Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
2.8: mq paag paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g mwavj yia kxvq Buaj meib Eei waag. maiq tuvq vcvg Navq uaq teij Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun. meib xij zu'g mxvj Gxi Rwib Eang yia pun meib Eang Eei ka'naaiq.”
2.4: ninb Bua mnxmb hod, Hruq vcvg. yia Paaiq meib mivb lxd ninb Bua. meib xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq.’
2.2: ninb Zauj yia kxvq waag uaq zang sivj livb pia'g yia, Tevj yia sruq Jiad sin taaib. yia yaag haid ninb Zauj yia kxvq waag.
2.6: paamb myenb aa'b! meib kanb maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb Bua yaag maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag, maiq kunq maaib Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng weib kxmj, meib yaag yem zyepg Eeig Daavb Bu'Dovj. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag, fai laaij ninb Bua Eei Myen kamb Riaj, weig zu'g ninb Bua penj Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.
2.9: yia zyrug mavg, pwatg Jia'q puad suv Zwrtq taaib huvj Jyenq yia. puad nanq Jyenq Fung sru.
2.5: maiq kunq ninb Bua mwavj fai maiq mwavj, (weig zu'g ninb Bua penj Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun), ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q maaib taub trug waag myenb yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj.
2.7: meib xij zu'g txb yia Eei waag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, maiq kunq ninb Bua mwavj fai maiq Kavq mwavj, weig zu'g ninb Bua penj Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.
2.1: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! Jiad sin taaib sruq Jyenq maa'b! yia xij Zauj meib kxvq waag.”
2.10: ninb txv Jyenq yia Kxi. yia pwatg i puv zuvq fiaq Jyenq Ravg, se fiaq Jyenq Raub Eei, Eyemq Eei, zu'g Kruq Eei waag.

36.18: weig naaiq yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun ninb Bua, weig zu'g ninb Bua yem teib puv taij myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, yaag laaij miub favj ninb Bua zruj pun teib puv maaib wij.
36.8: “+‘mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov aa'b! meib Eei Dyavj xij Zwrtq Gwaab, zyavb pyruq pun yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, weig zu'g maiq laub ninb Bua tu'q Rwrnj taaib.
36.33: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “tovb yia saaj meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq zwid Zivb Revg taaib uaq Nxi, yia xij pun meib Bua Eei nxmb nxm zivb maaib myenb yem. zu'g paaig waaig Eei txvj cvj tu'q Zeij Jiad.
36.3: weig naaiq meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq, “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘weib kxmj Eei kua'q pun meib zu'g paaig Waav yaag yem puvb puv zeij meib, pun meib zu'g penj zevg Fiag Eei kanb fivj myenb Ripg Eei pwrng. meib yaag penj myenb lovg zruj kruq kxvq taanb meib.
36.32: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia xij meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia Navq naaiq zruj se maiq zeid weig meib Bua. o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! meib Bua xij zu'g weig kanb zruj Eei Jauq zu'g Eaiq, zu'g paaig Myen.”
36.21: mq paag yia Raub yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj. i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb yem haiq nxm kua'q Bu'Dovj, ninb Bua pun yia Eei Buaj maaib wij.
36.35: ninb Bua zyrug kxvq, ‘naaiq nxm penj Daub Waav Eei teib puv ib zang Navq e-Den Wivj. zu'g kwavg Waav Zauj paaig waaig Eei zivb ib zang maaib myenb yem yaag maaib wrnq Eei zivb laatg.’
36.14: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yem naaiq mivb meib maiq tu'q na'q myenb. meib Eei kua'q Eei myenb yaag maiq zu'g cvj kwavg ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq.
36.23: yia xij piuj mevb yia Lo haig Eei mevb se Zivb Revg, tovb yem maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj zu'g maaib wij, se meib Bua yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj pun maaib wij. yia lovg meib Bua txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei mziv pun Ziv yia se Zivb Revg uaq zang, maang kua'q myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
36.6: weig naaiq meib xij zu'g zyavq Jyenq i-saa-laa-en teib puv trug waag kxvq Buaj tomb Bov fiub Bov, Do'q Zauj hxvd, “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Rcv Jyenq meib Bua yaag Qiaj Jiad Jyenq Eei kxvq laaij meib Bua zu'g kanb fivj myenb kxvq Wrtq pun meib Bua zu'g Eaiq.’+”
36.34: Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb mavg pwatg penj Daub Waav Eei txvj, cvj tu'q laib a'q.
36.2: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “weig zu'g winb wavq kxvq meib Bua, ‘haaq! haaq! naaiq teij lob Nxi Eei Bov penj yia Bua Eei pwrng mig a'q,’+”
36.36: uaq zang weib kxmj meib Bua Eei kua'q zevg Fiag Eei myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, tu'q Zeij Jiad paaig waaig Eei txvj, yaag tu'q zwavj ka'naaiq yem Daub Waav Eei txvj. yia, zyruq, kxvq liud yaag za'kevb xij Navq uaq nx zruj.”
36.20: mq paag ninb Bua mivb uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb, maiq kunq mivb Tauj haaij, ninb Bua pun yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj maaib wij. myenb zyrug kxvq taanb ninb Bua, ‘naaiq teij myenb penj zyruq Eei pc'g fivj, ninb Bua Zxg xij zu'g Zwrtq zyruq Eei teib puv.’
36.24: “+‘+“yia xij yem maang fivj myenb Bu'Dovj zx'q meib Bua Zwrtq taaib. yia yaag xij yem maang kua'q syru meib Bua zunq, txb meib Bua Rwrnj meib Bua kanb Eei teib puv.
36.28: meib Bua zyrug tu'q yem yia Zeij pun meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv. meib Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj. yia yaag zruj meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
36.7: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia hruq waag kxvq weib kxmj Eei kanb fivj myenb zuvq xij zu'g laaij kanb zruj Eei sig zu'g Eaiq.”
36.29: yia xij Fruj meib Bua leib Gxi yetg zuvq Eei wij. yia yaag xij heug Byaub puvb zua'g, maiq pun meib Bua zu'g vxg Naavj.
36.19: yia zyrug zx'q ninb Bua faatq Raanj mivb yem ziaj kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua zyrug yem uaq teij teib puv Raanj mig a'q. yia ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei sig tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid.
36.17: “paamb myenb aa'b! i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun yem Jyenq kanb Eei teib puv Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei sig pun teib puv maaib wij. ninb Bua yem yia Eei Ra'Myen zruj Eei se Navq msia'q txn sinb yeng Eei zyavb hog maaib wij.
36.38: Navq fovg hxg ziag Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb, se tivg taaib Eei zipq yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pa'ki yuvb kwanb, uaq teij paaig waaig Eei zivb xij maaib myenb Dovg uaq Zamq pwavq Revg. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
36.31: uaq zang meib Bua zyrug Javj zu'g meib Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq Zauj meib Bua zruj maiq penj Eei sig, zyrug weig meib Bua Eei zwid Zauj meib Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig yruj meib Bua kanb.”
36.30: yia xij pun Dyavj zyavb pyruq Zamq, pun livb teig Zwrtq kcvb zwavj lovj, weig pun meib Bua maiq zu'g cvj laaij vxg Naavj yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj zu'g paaig Myen.
36.27: yia xij pun yia Eei sivj livb yem meib Bua ka'Euad, pun meib Bua ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg, kan lovj yia Eei leid.
36.11: yia xij pun myenb Zauj scvb Kuq Jaa Yaavj cvj tu'q txnb Jweiq Zamq. yia xij pun meib maaib myenb yem Navq lod uaq nx, yaag pun meib tu'q kaub lovj zinb Daavg Zamq. uaq zang meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
36.5: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia za'kevb! Rcv Jyenq meib Bua zyrug kxvq uaq teij zevg Fiag Eei kanb fivj myenb Zauj e-Dom Eei yetg zuvq myenb. ninb Bua xnb lx'g haig, Hruq Rxv Jyenq zx'q yia Eei teib puv penj ninb Bua kanb Eei pwrng cvj luq teib puv.”
36.9: yia Eei Hruq yem meib naaiq puv Tevj meib, yia zyrug xij Win Rwrnj lxd meib. meib zyrug tu'q laib Dau, tu'q zwavj ka'naaiq.
36.16: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
36.37: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia yaag xij pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Toq yia weig ninb Bua Navq naaiq zruj, se Toq pun ninb Bua Eei myenb Yaavj taaib Navq pa'ki yuvb kwanb nx Zamq.
36.4: i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov aa'b! weig naaiq xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Tinb huvb Eei waag. zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj tomb Bov fiub Bov, zwavj Do'q zwavj hxvd, zu'g paaig Waav Eei txvj Zauj kwavg Waav Eei zivb, se zu'g weib kxmj zevg Fiag Eei fivj luq, yaag zu'g ninb Bua Wrtq.”
36.10: yia xij pun meib Eei myenb, se i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj zeib fun, Yaavj Jyenq faauj. zivb zyrug maaib myenb yem. paaig Waav Eei txvj cvj tu'q Zeij Jiad.
36.22: “weig naaiq meib xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia zruj Jyenq naaiq teij sig se maiq zeid weig meib Bua, se weig yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj, tovb meib Bua mivb yem uaq teij kua'q Bu'Dovj pun zu'g maaib wij.”+’
36.12: yia xij pun myenb, se yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, yavb meib kub vwaaig. ninb Bua tu'q meib penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng, ninb Bua zyrug tu'q Ripg Jyenq mivb. yem naaiq mivb meib yaag maiq pun ninb Bua zu'g kwavg ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq.
36.15: yia yaag maiq pun meib cvj haid nxmb nxm kua'q Eei myenb kxvq Wrtq meib. meib yaag maiq zu'g maang fivj Jyetq yaag maiq pun meib Eei kua'q Di'q zu'g Dxpg.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.’+”
36.13: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “myenb kxvq meib na'q myenb, meib yaag pun meib Eei kua'q Eei myenb zu'g kwavg ninb Bua Eei fu'Jweiq.”
36.1: zyruq kxvq, “paamb myenb aa'b! xij zu'g trug waag kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov, ‘o i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj Bov aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag.
36.26: yia xij Zeij syavb Hruq pun meib Bua, yaag pun syavb livb wrnb yem meib Bua ka'Euad. meib Bua Hruq vcvg Navq la'pyeiq, yia xij zx'q Zwrtq mivb cvj pun mau Eei, mwavj waag Eei Hruq.
36.25: yia xij lovg Zivb Revg uam fu'q meib Bua, saaj Revg meib Bua Eei yetg zuvq wij. meib Bua yetg zuvq miub favj yia yaag xij zx'q kwavg.

35.3: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘sej-i Bov aa'b! yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq. yia xij suv yia Eei puad zruj pun meib, pun meib penj Daub Waav, paaig waaig Eei txvj.
35.8: yia xij pun sej-i Bov maaib zu'g taij taig Eei myenb pwavq Revg. yem meib Eei fiub Bov Zauj hxvd, lyemb meib Eei tiub tiub Do'q maaib zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb.
35.9: yia xij pun meib yetg liud penj Daub Waav. meib Eei zivb yaag maiq maaib myenb yem. uaq zang meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
35.7: yia xij pun sej-i Bov penj Daub Waav, paaig waaig Eei txvj. yia yaag xij pun yetg zuvq mivb mivb taaib taaib Eei myenb zutg Revg.
35.5: “+‘weig zu'g yem lob Nxi taaib meib Zauj i-saa-laa-en nipg Jyenq win. i-saa-laa-en myenb zu'g ze'g naang Eei zyavb hog, se zu'g tivg zwid Ga'haaq laai uaq Rung, meib zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun winb wavq Eei Ru'g Daauq taij.
35.14: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “kxmj luvb Diaq Fyenb yrub Eei zyavb hog yia xij pun meib zu'g paaig Waav.
35.4: yia xij pun meib Eei zivb penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, zyrug penj zu'g kwavg Waav Eei txvj. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
35.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win mivb sej-i Bov yaag trug waag kxvq uaq nxm Bov.
35.6: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd waag kxvq, yia xij liug leid pun meib zu'g pwavb Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig. naaiq teij sig yaag xij zung Jyenq meib mivb. weig zu'g meib maiq Rxv taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei zwid, naaiq Euvg zwid zyrug zung Jyenq meib mivb.
35.13: meib Bua lovg Rwib puvj waab mauj Zev kanb Lo, maiq tivb lyrub Eei kxvq yia, yia yaag haid mig a'q.’
35.12: meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, haid meib kxvq to'g Eei yetg zuvq waag, se meib kxvq xij zruj pun i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov Eei waag. meib kxvq, “naaiq teij Bov zu'g paaig Waav, zuvq Jiu pun yia Bua na'q mig a'q.”
35.15: weig zu'g i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Ripg Eei pwrng zu'g paaig Waav uaq zang meib Fyenb yrub, yia zyrug ziuj meib zruj Eei zruj pun meib. sej-i Bov aa'b! meib Zauj e-Dom teig, se zyavb nxm teib puv, zyrug penj Daub Waav. uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
35.11: weig naaiq yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd waag. meib Rxv ninb Bua zyrug Qiaj Jiad, mweig Jia'q. meib Navq haiq nx zruj pun ninb Bua uaq zang, yia xij Navq uaq nx zruj pun meib. yia syemq meib Eei zyavb hog, yia xij yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia.
35.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
35.10: “+‘weig zu'g meib kxvq, “naaiq teij i kua'q i fivj penj yia Eei. yia xij zx'q penj yia Eei pwrng, maiq kunq zyruq yem uaq.”

24.18: Navq naaig luvb Dxm yia Zauj pc'g fivj kxvq waag. luvb maanb Mwavj yia Eei auq taig mig a'q. ta'Eeig Dxm yia ei zyruq hatg Eei waag zruj.
24.8: yia zx'q zivb ka'Euad taij myenb lyrug Zwrtq Eei Ryaamq toj nxm Fav Eei la'pyeib zxv kub vwaaig, weig pun maiq haib Txvq, zyrug Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad Jaauq win.”
24.3: xij zu'g kxvq tiub waab peiq Buaj uaq teij Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun. Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“zx'q Zcv Taapq Jyenq trud kub vwaaig, Taapq Jyenq toj uam tapq ka'Euad.
24.21: ‘meib xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij pun yia Eei sivj ting maaib wij, tovb meib Bua henq, puvj waab mauj Eei txvj. se mziv pwatg a'Neiq Eei, Hruq yaag xij Eei txvj. tovb meib Bua lyrub yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei naamb Erud yaag xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
24.14: “+‘+“yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q. zyavb hog xij Tauj, yia za'kevb zruj a'q. yia maiq Twij, maiq Kxb lyenb yaag maiq kxiq Hruq. yia xij ziuj meib zruj Eei Jauq Zauj zruj Eei sig syemq meib.”+’ zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.”
24.23: meib Bua Zxg xij zu'g peu Jyenq meib Bua Eei mGxvb peu, taapg Jyenq heb, maiq tuvq Raub Eyemq. laaij meib Bua Eei zwid, meib Bua Eei sin zavg xij Kruq Jyenq Fiag, laanb Zauj laanb Funb Jyenq yem.
24.6: “+‘weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“maaib taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei zivb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. se yetg nxm ka'Euad Jiaj Rivj Eei Zcv, Rivj yaag maiq haib Dutq. xij zu'g zx'q xq yetg Dunb yetg Dunb Eei Zwrtq, yaag maiq tuvq kinq haiq Dunb.
24.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g zx'q naaiq nxm Nxi fiaq Jyenq. za'kevb fiaq naaiq nxm Nxi weig zu'g tovb naaiq nxm Nxi Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb weib Jyenq xij Bx'q ye-lu-saa-lem.
24.20: yia zyrug Buaj ninb Bua, “yia zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
24.24: e-sej-Ken zyrug penj nxm Javb hog pun ninb Bua mavg. ta'faanb ninb Navq haiq nx zruj, meib Bua xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj. naaiq teij sig Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq Tinb huvb. ”+’
24.7: “+‘+“weig zu'g zivb ka'Euad Zxg maaib taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig, uaq teij Ryaamq toj Jyenq Fav Eei la'pyeib zxv kub vwaaig, ninb maiq toj Fiag Dau, haib maaib niab Buv pwav Jyenq Eei txvj.
24.19: pc'g fivj zyrug naaig yia, “meib maiq Buaj yia Bua fai? meib Navq naaiq nx zruj, weig yia Bua maaib haiq Euvg eij leid?”
24.17: kunq Tauq Qiab Do'g mq paag maiq tuvq Bwi. maiq tuvq weig taig mivb Eei myenb Raub Eyemq. meib xij zu'g peu Jyenq mGxvb peu, taapg Jyenq heb, yaag maiq tuvq pwav Rwib fai Eang weig Raub Eyemq Beng Eei laib Naavj.”
24.27: tovb uaq Nxi, meib txv Jyenq pyauj sig uaq taub myenb haib kxvq waag a'q. yem naaig mivb meib maiq Vovj. Navq naaig meib zyrug penj nxm Javb hog pun ninb Bua mavg. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
24.11: zx'q Zcvb Kuvj Taapq Jyenq trub Taanj kub vwaaig, puaq Zcv Jxm Tauj tovb si'q Zcv si'q Revg, pun ka'Euad laib Lopq Eei ka'naaiq yu'g Revg, Rivj yaag puaq Qwi.
24.5: kinq pa'ki yuvb kwanb ka'Euad kaub lovj Jiaj Eei pa'ki yuvb. zx'q zaavb Dwi Jyenq trub Raug pun uam Bweij, wrnb Tauj Buvq mau.”
24.9: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “+‘+“taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei zivb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. yia fib Navq Eei xij zx'q zaavb Dwi Jyenq Zamq Eei.
24.16: “paamb myenb aa'b! yia xij zx'q tovb meib Eei mziv pwatg kaub Namq Jiaj Eei myenb, pun ninb lyemb zeib zu'g taig. mq paag maiq tuvq Raub, maiq tuvq Eyemq fai pun uamb mweig lyrug.
24.4: zx'q xq yetg Dunb yetg Dunb tapq Jyenq, tovb yetg zuvq lovj Jiaj Eei xq, se puab zwib Zauj zaub zwib Eei xq. zx'q kaub lovj Jiaj Eei Buvq tapq pwavq Zcv.
24.10: Jaa zaavb Zamq, tyemq trud, wrnb xq mau, toj xb Txv Zwrtq yaag pun Buvq laaud.
24.22: Tauj uaq zang meib Bua xij zu'g zruj Navq yia zruj. maiq tu'q pwav Rwib yaag maiq tu'q Eang Raub Eyemq Eei myenb Eei Eang hopq.
24.12: yia pc'g pc'g zruj Kruq Navq. trud zuvq puaq maiq Dutq naaiq teij hod Eei Rivj.
24.15: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
24.13: “+‘+“naaiq teij Rivj peiq meib Yenj Eei Jauq penj laib Lopq Eei sig. maiq kunq yia xij saaj meib Zivb Revg, meib maiq saaj meib zruj laib Lopq Eei sig Zivb Revg. meib zyrug maiq haib cvj saaj Zivb Revg Tauj yia Eei ka'Qiaj fiu, maiq nrud meib a'q.
24.1: yia Bua zu'g Zaavq mivb ta'Juaq Havj, zyepg Laaj scvb zyepg, yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
24.26: uaq Nxi maaib taub pyauj Dutq sig Eei myenb xij taaib zx'q naaiq teij Jauq kxvq pun meib mwavj.
24.25: “paamb myenb aa'b! yia zx'q Zwrtq ninb Bua wrnq Eei txvj, tovb ninb Bua Kauj tu'q Fyenb yrub Zauj Favb laavg Eei txvj, ninb Bua Eei mziv pwatg a'Neiq Eei, Hruq yaag xij Eei, lyemb ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud yaag zx'q mivb.

7.18: ninb Bua zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru, sin zinj Eanb Eanb Eei. mavg taub taub Eei Myen pwatg ninb Bua Eaiq Revg, mGxvq yaag zu'g Teij Fav.
7.8: yia syepg syepq Eei xij pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun meib, nrud meib Tauj yia Eei ka'Qiaj fiu. yia xij ziuj meib zruj Eei Jauq syemq meib, yaag weig meib zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig tivg meib Eei zwid.
7.3: ib zang meib Eei setq mweid Tauj a'q. yia xij pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq zruj pun meib. yia xij ei meib zruj Eei Jauq syemq meib Eei zwid, yaag ziuj meib zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig winb pun meib.
7.21: yia zyrug zx'q Jiu pun kanb fivj myenb penj luq taaib Eei ka'naaiq, yaag Jiu pun luvb Diaq Eei x'q myenb penj Zaavq taaib Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua zyrug zruj pun maaib wij.
7.14: ninb Bua zuvq pyomq Jxv liug leid Bx'q Jaaj, mq paag maiq maaib myenb Zwrtq mivb Bx'q weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei zwavj myenb zu'g yia nrud.
7.23: “+‘liug leid limg weig zu'g maaib taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig pwavq teib puv yaag maaib to'g Eei sig pwavq zivb.
7.6: setq mweid Tauj a'q. setq mweid Tauj a'q. weig meib setq mweid Tauj a'q. mavg maa'b! za'kevb Tauj a'q.
7.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en teib puv, ‘setq mweid a'q. teib puv Eei pyei puv kx'q Eei setq mweid zuvq Tauj a'q.
7.20: ninb Bua Zev ninb Bua Rweig haig Eei syrub setq yaag lovg zruj ninb Bua Eei kamb Riaq haig, laib Lopq Eei miub favj. Navq naaig yia Zivj pun uaq teij ka'naaiq weig ninb Bua penj maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq.
7.24: weig naaiq yia xij pun ziaj kua'q kaub Zyruq Jiaj Eei myenb taaib Rcv ninb Bua Eei pyauq. yia yaag xij pun kaub henq Jiaj Eei myenb zruj mauj Eei Jauq paag mig a'q. ninb Bua Zivb Revg Eei txvj yaag zu'g maaib wij.
7.7: i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! meib Bua zu'g myetg Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q. zyavb hog Tauj, Nxib Eia'g fatq a'q. penj faanq lung Eei Nxi. yem Bov kub vwaaig maiq maaib Fyenb yrub heug Eei Qiaj.
7.19: ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei Eaanb zxi kwavg uaq Jaaib hxvg. ninb Bua Eei Jyem Navq maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq. zu'g zyruq nrud Eei Nxi ninb Bua Eei Jyem Eaanb maiq haib Fruj ninb Bua. ninb Bua Eei Jyem Eaanb maiq haib Tevj ninb Bua Hruq maiq sia fai pun ninb Bua Eei ka'sia peuq, weig zu'g naaiq teij Jyem Eaanb zruj pun ninb Bua paamd zwid.
7.17: taub taub Eei puad Domb mau Eei, taub taub Eei Zivb Bx'g Eanb Eanb Eei.
7.27: huvb tiaj Raub Eyemq, tomb Jyen haid maiq lamb Namq a'q. teib puv Eei pc'g fivj puad zinj laaij kamb Riaj. yia zyrug weig ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq winb pun ninb Bua. yia yaag xij syemq ninb Bua ziuj ninb Bua kanb syemq Eei za'eij. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’+”
7.11: zruj Zyruq zruj to'g Eei sig Lo taaib penj tiub zruj x'q sig Eei pyaab Byaag. maiq zevg yetg taub myenb. ninb Bua puvb zua'g Eei Jauq Zauj ninb Bua Eei zinb zxib maiq maaib. yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj yaag maiq maaib haiq taub tu'q zruj Lo.
7.5: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘ze'g naang Tauj a'q, yetg Euvg Jiaj liud yetg Euvg Tauj. mavg maa'b! ze'g naang zuvq Tauj taaib a'q.
7.9: yia Eei mziv mavg yaag maiq Kxb lyenb, maiq lyrub meib. yem meib Bu'Dovj zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig Eei zyavb hog yia xij ziuj meib zruj Eei sig winb pun meib. Navq naaig meib zyrug hiuq tu'q Bx'q meib uaq taub se yia, zyruq.
7.16: sij kxvq maaib haiq taub pyauj Dutq, tu'q mcvg Zwrtq nx, ninb zyrug yem uaq Bov. kx'g myenb weig kx'g myenb Eei zwid heug Navq yem hxvd Eei pc'g kopq nx.
7.4: yia Eei mziv mavg yaag maiq Kxb fi'q maiq Kxb lyenb. yem meib Bu'Dovj zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig Eei zyavb hog yia xij weig meib zruj Eei Jauq winb pun meib. Navq naaig meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
7.10: “+‘mavg maa'b! uaq nxm Nxi xij syepg syepq Eei Tauj. meib Bua zu'g myetg Eei zyavb hog zuvq Tauj a'q. pyaab Byaag putq Eweid. zruj mauj Eei Jauq Gxi pyavb.
7.22: yia zyrug nyruq Myen maiq mavg ninb Bua, ninb Bua zyrug zruj pun yia Jaaij Eei txvj maaib wij. Janb za'g yaag pia'g taaib pun txvj maiq Zivb Revg.
7.12: zyavb hog Tauj. Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq a'q. maaid Eei myenb maiq tuvq a'Neiq, maaig Eei myenb maiq tuvq Raub, weig zu'g ninb Bua zwavj myenb tu'q Tinb huvb nrud.
7.15: “+‘yem zivb ka'Eiag maaib Ru'g Daauq. zivb ka'Euad maaib wrnb pcvg Zauj vxg Naavj Eei Jauq. yem lomb Waav Eei myenb zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. yem zivb ka'Euad uaq teij vxg Naavj yaag putq wrnb pcvg taig.
7.13: maaig Eei myenb Zxg zyavb Jyenq Eei zyavb hog maiq tu'q cvj Rwrnj ninb maaig Eei Dau uaq. weig zu'g naaiq laaug yaavb Eei sig kxvq zu'g ninb Bua zwavj myenb yaag maiq haib kxiq yeng. laaij ninb Bua Eei zwid maiq maaib haiq taub haib peu tu'q kanb Eei mcvg.
7.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
7.26: ze'g naang Jaa maaib ze'g naang, waab Ryaauj Ripg waag Ryaauj yetg Kav Jiaj yetg Kav. ninb Bua lxd trug waag myenb Jrub laaug yaavb Eei sig. sai myenb maiq Faauj leib latg. myenb koj Zaavb laavb Eei Jauq yaag tavj Revg mig a'q.
7.25: zu'g Kruq Eei zyavb hog Tauj, ninb Bua xij lxd pcvb xn mq paag lxd maiq tu'q yetg teij.

17.18: laaij ninb mavg Piaj hruq Eei waag cvj vcvg lcvd Eei vcvg waag yaag laaij ninb kanb hruq Jyenq waag mq paag Zxg zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig, ninb zuvq maiq haib pyauj tu'q Dutq.”
17.8: naaiq zuvb a'vung Mei zuvq zwavj Daub lovj, uam Zamq Eei txvj, weig pun haib Zwrtq Gwaab zyavb pyruq, penj Rweig haig Eei a'vung Mei.”+’
17.3: xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “maaib nxm tomb Jaavq Lo! Eei. ninb Eei Daatq Lo haig, Daatg pyei yaag Daauq. pyei za'kevb Rweig haig, zxpg ziaj Euvg setq. naaiq nxm tomb Jaavq Daij Tauj le-Baa-nxn Bov yaag Fapq tiub sij-Daa zovb Dyavb tweiq.
17.21: yem ninb Eei pcvb kwanb kaub lovj Jiaj Eei pcv xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. tu'q mcvg Zwrtq zevg Fiag Eei myenb zyrug Raanj mivb pyei puv luvb Diaq. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q se yia, zyruq, kxvq liud naaiq teij waag.”
17.14: weig pun uaq nxm teib puv mau, cvj lyepg maiq Jiad, zyrug pun uaq teij lyepg Eei vcvg waag haib yem tu'q wrnq.)
17.23: yia xij zwavj yem i-saa-laa-en kaub Lav Jiaj Eei Bov, ninb zyrug Zwrtq Gwaab zyavb pyruq, penj tiub maaib mevb taub Eei Dyavj. Euvb Euvg nx'g xij taaib yem uaq zuvb Dyavj ka'Diaq. cvj maaib Euvb Euvg nx'g xij yem ninb Eei Gwaab zruj laud pivj laavb.
17.6: Eim ku'g Eaab Lo taaib penj tiub a'vung Mei aiq Eei mq paag lrug lwavb Javq Eei. Mei Eei Gwaab Win mivb tomb Jaavq uaq puv mq paag Ruvb Zxg Fiag ka'Diaq Do Eei. Eim zyrug penj a'vung Mei Zwrtq Gwaab, Zwrtq nxmb Zamq.
17.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq waab xmq yaag kxvq penj waab peiq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun.
17.20: yia xij Zxv Gxi muvd zaauj Jyenq ninb. ninb zuvq zu'g yia Eei muvd Lopq Jyenq, yia zyrug txb ninb mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon, yem uaq syemq ninb Eei zwid laaij ninb Byenq Hruq pun yia.
17.24: yem lomb Waav Eei tiub tiub Dyavj zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, pun aiq Eei Dyavj haib Lav, pun Lav Eei Dyavj aiq. yia pun Dyavb Eyemd Gaai mivb, pun Gaai Eei Dyavj Eyemd taaib.” “+‘yia, zyruq, kxvq liud yaag xij ei Jyenq zruj.’+”
17.7: “+‘+“cvj maaib kanb nxm tomb Jaavq Lo! Eei, Daatq yaag Lo, Daatg pyei yaag Zamq. ib zang naaiq zuvb a'vung Eei Ruvb Zauj Gwaab yem zwavj Eei txvj Win mivb naaiq nxm tomb Jaavq weig pun tomb Jaavq fu'q uam.
17.19: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “weig naaiq yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, laaij ninb mavg Piaj ninb Zauj yia hruq Eei waag, yaag vcvg Jyenq Zauj yia lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag, yia zuvq xij winb pun ninb.
17.17: faa-lo huvb Zauj ninb Eei tomb pcvb kwanb Zauj myenb Zamq yaag maiq haib Tevj sej-De-Ki-yaa Bx'q Jaaj txij Baa-Bi-lon myenb wetq niab Dwi cvj Zeij laatg weib kxmj weig taij myenb Zamq.
17.11: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
17.5: “+‘+“Ga'haaq ninb zx'q teij uaq nxm teib puv Eei Eim zwavj Jyenq Daub lovj Eei txvj. ninb zwavj Jyenq maaib uam Zamq Eei txvj Navq zuvb swib lyemb Dyavj.
17.9: “meib xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “naaiq zuvb a'vung Mei haib Rweig yaag Lo fai? tomb Jaavq maiq zeid xij pcv Zwrtq Ruvb, Zutq Revg pyruq pun Mei Eauj fai? maiq zu'g lovg tomb Qa'q fai myenb Zamq lyemb Ruvb pcv Zwrtq.
17.16: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, ninb xij zu'g yem Baa-Bi-lon taig, se yem lyepg ninb zruj huvb uaq taub huvb tiaj yem Eei txvj. ninb mavg Piaj uaq taub huvb Zauj uaq taub huvb tiaj hruq Eei waag yaag vcvg Zauj ninb lyepg Jiad Eei vcvg waag.
17.4: ninb wrtq kub vwaaig nivq Eei Gwaab lunj Dutq zyrug Daam mivb Tauj nxm scvb eij myenb Eei teib puv zyrug an Jyenq nxm maaid maaig Eei myenb Eei zivb Bu'Dovj.
17.10: sij kxvq swiq mivb zwavj kanb nxm txvj, Mei haib Rweig, haib Lo Eei fai? ninb yetq zu'g tov puv Eei Ryaauj pwrng, Mei maiq zeid xij Gaai Revg fai? ninb xij yem ninb zwavj Jyenq Eei txvj Gaai Revg.”+’+”
17.22: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia kanb xij zx'q Lav Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj kub vwaaig tweiq Eei Gwaab lunj txb mivb zwavj. yia xij wrtq tiub tweib mweib nivq Eei Gwaab lunj txb mivb zwavj nxm za'kevb Lav haig Eei Bov.
17.12: “meib ib zang xij zu'g Buaj uaq teij Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun, ‘meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q naaiq teij sig Eei eij leid fai?’ meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb taaib Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb zx'q ninb Bua Eei huvb Zauj yetg zuvq zruj Lo Eei myenb txb mivb Baa-Bi-lon.
17.15: mq paag yu-Daa Eei huvb Byenq Hruq pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb tiaj zyrug Paaiq kovb zob mivb lxd i-yipq Eei huvb tiaj, Toq ninb pun maad Zauj tomb pcvb kwanb Zamq Eei. huvb tiaj Namq taaib za'kevb haib zruj tu'q Zwrtq Eei fai? zruj naaiq Euvg sig Eei myenb haib pyauj tu'q Dutq Eei fai? sij kxvq ninb vcvg Jyenq ninb lyepg Eei vcvg waag, ninb haib pyauj tu'q Dutq Eei fai?’
17.13: ninb zx'q yetg taub uaq teij maaib huvb trub Eei myenb Zauj ninb lyepg vcvg waag yaag pun ninb hruq Jyenq waag. (teib puv Eei yetg zuvq zruj Lo Eei myenb ninb yaag kwaatq mivb Revg
17.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

11.18: “ninb Bua tu'q Rwrnj taaib yem Jyenq uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug zx'q yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei, yruj Eei x'q sig kwavg Revg.
11.8: meib Bua kamb Riaj Ru'g Daauq, yia zyrug pun meib Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
11.3: ninb Bua kxvq, ‘komq pyauq Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj fatq. naaiq nxm zivb peiq nxm Zcv. yia Bua peiq Zcv ka'Euad Eei xq.’
11.21: mq paag Kuvj maaib Hruq kan ninb Bua kamb Riaq haig, yruj haig Eei uaq teij ka'naaiq, ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei yia xij winb pun ninb Bua.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
11.14: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
11.23: zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem zivb Bu'Dovj faauj, tivb Jyenq zivb Eei tov puv mcvj uaq nxm Bov kub vwaaig.
11.6: meib Bua yem naaiq nxm zivb taij myenb Dovg naaig Zamq yaag kwavg zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Eei sei pwavq Jaaib hxvg.’
11.2: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! naaiq teij myenb se yem naaiq nxm zivb taaq x'q Eei za'eij yaag Zaavb laavb zruj waaig sig.
11.20: weig pun ninb Bua kan yia Eei leib latg yaag ei yia Eei leid zruj. ninb Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj. yia yaag xij zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
11.24: sivj livb txb yia faauj. yem laaug yaavb Eei sig ka'Euad, Tinb huvb Eei sivj livb txb yia mivb Baa-Bi-lon, Tauj zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb uaq. yia pwatg liud Eei laaug yaavb sig zyrug mitg mig a'q.
11.7: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ‘meib Bua taij taig kwavg zivb ka'Euad Eei myenb se penj xq. naaiq nxm zivb penj Zcv. mq paag yia xij pun meib Bua yem naaig ka'Euad zu'g txb Zwrtq mivb.
11.19: yia xij pun ninb Bua maaib Du'g tiug Hruq yaag pun ninb Bua maaib syavb livb wrnb. yia xij zx'q Gxi Navq la'pyeiq vcvg Eei Hruq cvj pun mau Eei, mwavj waag Eei Hruq,
11.17: “weig naaiq xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj syru zunq meib Bua, yaag yem meib Bua zu'g mivb yem Raanj Eei kua'q txb meib Bua kapq zunq taaib, cvj zx'q i-saa-laa-en teib puv Jiu pun meib Bua.”+’
11.11: naaiq nxm zivb se maiq zeid meib Bua Eei Zcv. meib Bua yaag maiq zeid naaiq nxm Zcv Eei xq. yia xij yem i-saa-laa-en Eei kapg Jaaij tivg meib Bua Eei zwid.
11.5: zyruq Eei sivj livb Fiag taaib yem yia yaag kxvq Buaj yia, “meib xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! meib Bua Navq naaig Namq, mq paag yia hiuq tu'q maaib haiq Euvg yem meib Bua Eei Hruq.
11.9: ‘yia xij yem naaiq nxm zivb ka'Euad txb meib Bua Zwrtq taaib Jiu pun kanb fivj myenb yaag syemq tivg meib Bua Eei zwid.
11.16: “weig naaiq meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. maiq kunq yia zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb swiq mivb ko Eei kua'q Eei myenb Bu'Dovj, yaag maiq kunq yia pun ninb Bua Raanj mivb maang kua'q Bu'Dovj, yia yaag xij yem ninb Bua mivb yem Eei kua'q zruj Zaamj ninb Bua Eei sivj ting.’
11.4: paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq ninb Bua. kunq trug waag a'q.”
11.10: meib Bua zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. yia zuvq xij yem i-saa-laa-en Eei kapg Jaaij tivg meib Bua Eei zwid. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
11.22: uaq teij Ke-lu-Bim yav Gxi Daatq. uaq teij yenb yaag yem ninb Bua Eei ka'Len. i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg yaag yem ninb Bua kub vwaaig.
11.12: meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, weig zu'g meib Bua maiq ei Jyenq yia Eei leib latg yaag maiq ei yia Eei leid. meib Bua kan weib kxmj uaq teij kua'q Eei pc'g fivj Eei leid.’+”
11.15: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib Eei kxb yrud, meib Eei Zyenb Ze'q, meib Eei yetg zuvq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei Jwavg fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb, se ye-lu-saa-lem Eei myenb, kxvq, ‘ninb Bua leib zyruq ko. naaiq teij Dau Zeij pun yia Bua penj yia Bua Eei pwrng a'q.’
11.13: txij yia trug Jyenq waag Eei zyavb hog, Be-nai-yaa Eei txn, paa-laa-Ti-yaa taig mig a'q. yia zyrug Baapq Fiag Dau heug Qiaj Lo Eei, “zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! Kruq a'q. meib za'kevb xij myetg Revg zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb fai?”
11.1: zyruq Eei sivj livb prub yia faauj, txb yia mivb Tauj zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei tov puv kcvb, se Win mivb tov puv uaq taub kcvb. pia'g kcvb uaq nxm txvj maaib Eig zyepg Mmd laanb myenb. yia pwatg yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq, se atg-su Eei txn, yaa-aa-san-yaa, Zauj Be-nai-yaa Eei txn, pe-laa-Ti-yaa.
11.25: yia zyrug zx'q zyruq pun yia pwatg Eei yetg zuvq sig kxvq Buaj zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb mwavj.

33.18: sij kxvq Kuq myenb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig, ninb zuvq xij zu'g weig ninb zruj Eei sig zu'g taig.
33.8: sij kxvq yia kxvq Buaj x'q myenb, ‘x'q myenb aa'b! meib Dovg haaij zuvq xij zu'g taig,’ mq paag meib yaag maiq Kwinj x'q myenb kwavg ninb zruj Eei Jauq, uaq taub x'q myenb xij zu'g weig ninb kanb Eei zwid zu'g taig. mq paag weig ninb zu'g taig yia xij pun meib Daamb txv.
33.33: “naaiq teij zyavb hog Tauj, (Dovg haaij zuvq xij Tauj a'q), ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib taub trug waag myenb.”
33.3: uaq taub syruq kcv myenb pwatg winb wavq txb Ru'g Daauq taaib fatq, ninb zyrug pyomq Jxv Kwinj myenb.
33.32: meib se Navq Bx'q lxb Rod, lovg Kub mwavj Eei Qiaj paauj zivb yrub Ruv pun ninb Bua mwavj weig zu'g ninb Bua mwavj meib kxvq Eei waag yaag maiq Kavq ei Jyenq zruj.
33.21: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb zyepg Eeig Havj zyepg Laaj scvb Mmd uaq Nxi maaib laanb myenb yem ye-lu-saa-lem pyauj taaib yia naaiq kxvq, “uaq nxm zivb Baav mig a'q.”
33.14: cvj maaib Euvg. sij kxvq yia Buaj x'q myenb, ‘meib zuvq xij zu'g taig,’ mq paag ninb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei zwid cvj zruj pcvb fim Zauj hxpg Eei Jauq.
33.23: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
33.6: mq paag sij kxvq syruq kcv myenb pwatg winb wavq txb Ru'g Daauq taaib fatq, ninb yaag maiq pyomq Jxv Kwinj myenb, zyrug yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib taub zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, uaq taub zu'g taij laaij ninb kanb Eei zwid. mq paag weig ninb taig yia xij pun syruq kcv myenb Daamb txv.’
33.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj meib Eei pwrnb kua'q myenb, ‘sij kxvq yia pun nxm teib puv zu'g Ru'g Daauq Bx'q Jaaj, uaq nxm kua'q yem ninb Bua Eei myenb Bu'Dovj yaag kinq taub zruj syruq kcv myenb,
33.20: o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! meib Bua Zxg kxvq, ‘zyruq zruj Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim.’ mq paag yia xij ziuj meib Bua kx'g myenb zruj Eei sig syemq meib Bua.”
33.24: “paamb myenb aa'b! yem Jyenq i-saa-laa-en Eei Daub Waav Eei myenb kxvq, ‘apg-laa-ham Du'g laanb myenb Navq tu'q naaiq nxm teib puv penj ninb Eei pwrng. mq paag yia Bua myenb sruj Zamq, naaiq nxm teib puv Dovg haaij zuvq Jiu penj yia Bua Eei pwrng.’
33.28: yia zyrug pun naaiq nxm teib puv penj Daub Waav, penj paaig waaig Eei txvj. ninb zruj mauj Eei Qa'q zyrug zutg mig a'q. i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov yaag Waav Revg, maiq maaib myenb Jiaj uaq.
33.7: “paamb myenb aa'b! ib zang yia Paaiq meib zruj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei syruq kcv myenb. meib haiq zang haid yia Eei Rwib kxvq Eei waag meib xij zu'g txb naaiq teij waag mivb Kwinj ninb Bua.
33.29: yia weig ninb Bua zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig pun teib puv penj Daub Waav, paaig waaig Eei txvj uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’
33.19: x'q myenb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei x'q sig zruj pcvb fim Zauj hxpg Eei Jauq, ninb weig naaiq tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
33.17: “mq paag meib Eei pwrnb kua'q myenb Zxg kxvq, ‘zyruq zruj Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim.’ mq paag se ninb Bua kanb Eei Jauq maiq pcvb fim.
33.31: ninb Bua zyrug taaib lxd meib Navq yetg kau myenb taaib nx, cvj yem meib Eei Ra'Myen Navq yia Eei pc'g fivj. ninb Bua mwavj meib kxvq Eei waag mq paag maiq ei Jyenq zruj, weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei Rwib kxvq Namq Eei mq paag Hruq Kuvj mauq lxd Eaanb.
33.30: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib Eei pwrnb kua'q myenb yem zivb laatg ka'Len fai pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg kxvq Tauj meib. laanb Buaj laanb, kxb yrud Buaj kxb yrud, ‘taaib maa'b! taaib mwavj yem zyruq Zwrtq taaib Eei waag.’
33.27: “meib xij zu'g Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd waag kxvq, yem Daub Waav Eei myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. yem lomb Waav uaq teij zu'g Jiu pun Yiab zxib Eang. yem weib wrnq Eei txvj Zauj yem Bcvb Kwrtq Eei myenb zu'g putq wrnb pcvg taig.
33.11: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg lcvd yia maiq a'Neiq x'q myenb taig. yia a'Neiq x'q myenb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj Eei Jauq tu'q mcvg zyavb Jyenq. Win Rwrnj maa'b! Win Rwrnj kwavg Gxi meib Bua zruj x'q Eei Jauq. o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! meib Bua fuvg xij zu'g taig?’
33.5: weig zu'g ninb haid Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi, ninb yaag maiq ei naaiq teij Kwinj Eei Qiaj zruj, ninb kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv. sij kxvq ninb ei naaiq teij Kwinj Eei Qiaj, ninb haib Fruj tu'q ninb kanb Eei mcvg.
33.9: mq paag sij kxvq meib Kwinj uaq taub x'q myenb kwavg ninb zruj Eei Jauq, ninb yaag maiq kwavg nx, ninb xij zu'g weig ninb kanb Eei zwid taig, mq paag meib tu'q Fruj Zwrtq meib kanb Eei mcvg.
33.16: ninb paamd Jiaj Eei zwid yia maiq Javj. ninb zruj pcvb fim Zauj zruj hxpg Eei Jauq zyrug Dovg haaij zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
33.4: haiq taub myenb haid Jxv Eei Qiaj Bwi yaag maiq ei Jyenq Kwinj Eei Qiaj zruj, ninb zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. weig ninb zu'g taig, ninb kanb xij zu'g Daamb txv.
33.10: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘meib Bua kxvq, “yia Bua zruj txvg Eei sig Zauj paamd Eei zwid vatq Jyenq yia Bua. weig naaiq yia Bua hei Jyenq Fiag. yia Bua Navq haiq nx haib tu'q zyavb Jyenq mivb?”+’
33.22: naaiq laanb myenb maiq kcvb Tauj zinb Daavg uaq Nxi luvb maanb Mwavj, zyruq Eei Qa'q yem yia Eei sin pun yia Eei Rwib haib kxvq waag. ta'Eeig Dxm uaq laanb myenb taaib Tauj yia naaiq, yia Eei Rwib haib kxvq tu'q waag, maiq cvj Vovj a'q.
33.12: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Buaj meib Eei pwrnb kua'q myenb, ‘Kuq myenb paamd zwid, ninb zruj Eei Kuq sig maiq haib Fruj maiq tu'q ninb. x'q myenb kwavg Gxi ninb zruj x'q Eei Jauq, ninb zruj Eei x'q sig yaag maiq haib pun ninb Di'q zu'g Dxpg. Kuq myenb paamd zwid yaag maiq haib weig ninb zruj Jiaj Eei Kuq sig tu'q zyavb Jyenq.’
33.15: kxvq Navq ninb zx'q zruj txvb taaub Eei ka'naaiq Twij Rwrnj cvj zx'q nimg taaib Eei ka'naaiq fuvj Rwrnj pun lob zyruq, ninb ei pun myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq Eei leid yaag maiq zruj haiq Euvg x'q sig, ninb zuvq tu'q zyavb Jyenq, maiq zu'g taig.

40.49: Zapq Zwrtq Eei txvj Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g, Javq zyepg yetq Dx'g. yaag maaib zyepg Kav Tei faauj. i puv kcvb ka'Len Eei Dyrub yaag maaib tomb Dyrub.
40.11: naaiq laanb myenb cvj Dx'g pia'g laatg Eei kcvb Daavg, maaib zyepg Dx'g Javq cvj maaib zyepg faam Dx'g Daauq.
40.33: ka'Len uaq teij syruq kcv myenb Eei Qovj Zauj uaq teij Dyrub Zauj kcvb ka'Euad mcvj uaq Qovj Zauj uaq teij laatg kcvb fib lomb Eei. maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj. kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj yaag maaib fib Navq Eei. yem naaiq puv kcvb Tauj uaq puv kcvb Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g.
40.16: pia'g laatg kcvb uaq tiub Jauq maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj. Qovb Qovj Eei Dyrub maaib fov mwrnb. fov mwrnb ka'Euad Javq, ka'Eiag hepg. kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj. yem Dyrub yaag maaib taaub Dyavj Eei favj.
40.40: yem ka'Eiag uaq Kav kcvb Daavg, se pa'q puv pia'g kcvb Eei txvj, maaib i nxm tiab. laatg kcvb ka'Euad uaq puv yaag maaib i nxm tiab.
40.37: kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj Win mivb ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg. i puv Eei Dyrub yaag tiu Jyenq taaub Dyavj. yaag maaib Yetg Kav Tei faauj Tauj kcvb.
40.4: uaq laanb myenb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb Eei txn aa'b! xij zu'g lovg meib Eei mziv mavg yaag lovg meib Eei mnxmb mwavj lovj. xij zu'g lovg Hruq mavg yia pun meib pwatg Eei yetg zuvq. se weig naaiq yia Zivj txb meib taaib naaiq. ta'faanb meib pwatg Eei, meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en myenb.”
40.12: yem i puv Jauq ka'Len, syruq kcv myenb Eei Qovj, Qovb Qovj Eei Ra'Myen mcvj maaib Genj Eei txvj yetg Dx'g Lav. uaq teij Qovj yaag fib Fyetq fib Daau Ju'q Dx'g.
40.46: Win mivb pa'q puv uaq teij se pun kruj ziab txvb Eei sai myenb. naaiq teij sai myenb se saaj-Dokg Eei zeib fun. Kuvj naaiq teij le-wi myenb Navq haib mivb nitq fatq zyruq weig fub suj ninb.”
40.13: yem yetg Qovj Ga'haaq mcvj Fovg kub vwaaig Tauj txib vaang uaq Qovj Ga'haaq mcvj Fovg kub vwaaig Javq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g, se yem Ga'haaq mcvj Fovg Eei kcvb mivb Tauj txib vaang uaq puv Ga'haaq mcvj Fovg Eei kcvb.
40.26: maaib siag Kav Tei faauj kub vwaaig Tauj uaq taub kcvb, yaag maaib kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj. nxmb nxm Dyrub tiu Jyenq taaub Dyavj, yetg puv maaib tiub.
40.28: uaq laanb myenb txb yia yavb naamb puv Eei laatg kcvb pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg. ninb zyrug Dx'g ka'Euad naamb puv uaq Kav kcvb. naaiq taub kcvb Zauj uaq teij kcvb fib lomb Eei.
40.8: ninb cvj Dx'g Zwrtq laatg kcvb pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg uaq Qovj, maaib Yetg Dx'g.
40.9: laatg Dyrub hod i Dx'g. laatg kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj Eei kcvb Win mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
40.32: ninb cvj txb yia mivb ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg, Tauj tov puv uaq puv zyrug Dx'g tov puv kcvb, pwatg Zauj uaq teij kcvb fib Navq Eei.
40.21: pia'g kcvb ka'Len, yetg puv maaib pua Qovj syruq kcv myenb Eei txvj. Dyrub Zauj pia'g laatg kcvb uaq Qovj Zauj ta'yetq taub kcvb Eei Zi'g Zunj fib Navq Eei, Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g.
40.23: Navq Win tov puv Eei kcvb, Win pa'q puv Eei kcvb txij zyavj pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eei kcvb fib Navq Eei. yem naaiq puv kcvb Dx'g mivb Tauj uaq puv kcvb maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g.
40.6: ninb cvj mivb Tauj Win tov puv uaq taub laatg kcvb Eei Jauq. ninb faauj Tei kub vwaaig Dx'g kcvb pia'g Eei txvj Dovg yetg tiub pyaab Dx'g Do.
40.44: uaq laanb myenb zyrug txb yia yem ka'Eiag pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg. uaq Kav laatg ka'Euad maaib i Qovj. maaib yetg Qovj yem pa'q puv Eei kcvb ka'Len Win mivb naamb puv. maaib Qovj yem naamb puv Eei kcvb ka'Len Win mivb pa'q puv.
40.20: uaq laanb myenb cvj Dx'g ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg ka'Euad mcvj, Win mivb pa'q puv uaq taub kcvb Dovg haaij Javq, Dovg haaij Daauq.
40.5: yia pwatg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Wiv Rwrnj Eei txvj maaib laatg weib kxmj. uaq laanb myenb nanq Jyenq Dx'g Eei pyaaq, Daauq Ju'q Dx'g. mrud Dx'g levb yetg puab zaavq. uaq laanb myenb zyrug Dx'g laatg. laatg hod Dovg yetg tiub pyaab Dx'g, Lav Dovg yetg tiub pyaab Dx'g.
40.19: naaiq laanb myenb yem aiq uaq taub laatg kcvb ka'Euad mcvj Dx'g mivb Tauj pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eei kcvb ka'Eiag, maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g. mivb tov puv Zauj pa'q puv yaag fib Navq Eei.
40.38: yem kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj Eei Dyrub ka'Len maaib yetg Qovj yaag maaib kcvb pia'g. se Raauj puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq Eei txvj.
40.31: kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj Win mivb ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg. Dyrub yaag tiu Jyenq taaub Dyavj yaag maaib Yetg Kav Tei faauj Tauj kcvb.
40.27: yem ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eei naamb puv maaib taub kcvb. ninb zyrug yem naaiq taub kcvb Dx'g Tauj Win naamb puv uaq taub kcvb, maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g.
40.41: yem ka'Euad yaag maaib pyei nxm. pia'g laatg kcvb uaq Qovj ka'Eiag cvj maaib pyei nxm. maaib Yetg nxm tiab. ninb Bua pavg naaiq teij tiab taij fovg hxg ziag Eei scvb Kuq.
40.1: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eig zyepg Mmd Havj uaq Havj, se ye-lu-saa-lem zu'g paaig waaig Ga'haaq zyepg feij Havj, pia'g syavb Havj scvb zyepg uaq Nxi, tovb uaq Nxi zyruq Eei Qa'q yem yia Eei sin, ninb zyrug txb yia mivb.
40.39: laatg kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj ka'Len maaib pyei nxm tiab, yetg puv maaib i nxm. naaiq teij tiab lovg taij puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq Zauj fi'q zwid Eei scvb Kuq cvj Zauj zruj txvg zwid fi'q Eei scvb Kuq.
40.47: ninb cvj Dx'g laatg ka'Euad, Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, Javq yetg pc'q Dx'g, se feib puv fib Navq Eei. ziab txvb yaag yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj.
40.10: yem tov puv Eei laatg kcvb ka'Euad, i puv zuvq fib Navq Eei. yetg puv maaib pua Qovj syruq kcv myenb Eei txvj, Qovb Qovj fib lomb Eei. naaiq puv Eei Dyrub Zauj uaq puv Eei Dyrub yaag fib lomb Eei.
40.25: pia'g naaiq taub kcvb Eei Jauq Zauj pia'g kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj, Zauj uaq teij fov mwrnb fib Navq Eei. naaiq teij txvj Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g.
