40.22: fov mwrnb Zauj pia'g laatg kcvb uaq Qovj Zauj tiu taaib Eei taaub Dyavj Zauj Win tov puv kcvb Eei Zi'g Zunj fib Navq Eei. maaib siag Kav Tei faauj kub vwaaig Tauj pia'g kcvb Eei txvj. yaag maaib kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj.
40.42: weig puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq maaib pyei nxm tiab penj zu'g taaib Eei la'pyeiq, Daauq Dx'g pyenj, Javq Dx'g pyenj, Lav yetg Dx'g. naaiq teij tiab lovg an Jaab txvj weig liug leid fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei scvb Kuq Zauj ziag weig kanb Euvg Jauq Eei ka'naaiq.
40.15: yem Ra'Myen mcvj uaq Kav kcvb Daavg Dx'g mivb Tauj uaq puv kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj maaib Mmd zyepg Dx'g.
40.29: ka'Len uaq teij syruq kcv myenb Eei Qovj Zauj uaq teij Dyrub Zauj kcvb ka'Euad mcvj uaq Qovj Zauj uaq teij kanb taub laatg kcvb fib lomb Eei. maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj. kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj yaag maaib fib Navq Eei. yem naaiq puv kcvb Tauj uaq puv kcvb Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g.
40.30: puvb puv yaag maaib yetg Qovj yetg Qovj. Qovb Qovj Daauq Eig zyepg Mmd Dx'g, Javq pyaa Dx'g.

37.18: “meib Eei pwrnb kua'q myenb naaig meib uaq zang, ‘naaiq teij i tiub pyaaq Eei eij leid meib maiq xij Buaj yia Bua fai?
37.8: yia mavg pwatg Buvq maaib Jaan yaag Zwrtq xq cvj maaib Dopq pwav Jyenq Buvq mq paag yem naaig ka'Euad maiq maaib Tauq Eei Qiaj.
37.3: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! naaiq teij Buvq cvj haib navb Eei fai?” yia zyrug tau, “o zyruq Tinb huvb aag, meib kanb hiuq Eei.”
37.21: xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia xij yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb yem ninb Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei txvj Zwrtq taaib, cvj yem pyei puv syru ninb Bua kapq zunq taaib txb ninb Bua Rwrnj ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv.
37.14: yia xij pun yia Eei sivj livb pia'g meib Bua ka'Euad, meib Bua zyrug navb taaib. yia yaag xij pun meib Bua yem Jyenq kanb Eei teib puv. uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q se yia, zyruq, kxvq liud, yia yaag ei Jyenq zruj a'q.” naaiq se zyruq kxvq Eei waag.’+”
37.23: ninb Bua yetg liud maiq cvj paaij miub favj fai zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig fai zruj txvg Eei haiq Euvg sig pun kanb zu'g maaib wij. yia xij Fruj ninb Bua pyauj Dutq ninb Bua paamd zwid Eei nxmb nxm txvj cvj saaj ninb Bua Zivb Revg. Navq naaig ninb Bua xij zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj, yia yaag zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
37.6: yia xij pun meib Bua maaib Jaan, pun xq Zwrtq taaib cvj pun Dopq pwav Jyenq meib Bua. yia xij pun Tauq Eei Qiaj pia'g meib Bua ka'Euad, meib Bua zyrug navb taaib. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
37.2: ninb txb yia yavb mivb yavb taaib mavg Revg uaq teij Buvq. pwatg hxvd ka'Euad maaib Buvq za'kevb Zamq! haig. Buvq yaag Bxvj Gaai Eei.
37.20: meib txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei mziv nanq fiaq Jyenq uaq teij i tiub pyaaq uaq zang,
37.24: “+‘+“yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, tu'q zruj huvb kunq ninb Bua. ninb Bua taub taub zyrug maaib yetg taub myenb kruj ninb Bua Navq kruj pa'ki yuvb Eei myenb nx. ninb Bua xij ei Jyenq yia Eei leid, kan lovj yia Eei leib latg yaag ei Jyenq zruj.
37.28: yia Eei sivj ting yetg liud yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Eei zyavb hog, maang kua'q myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q se yia, zyruq, pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Zivb Revg.”+’+”
37.7: yia zyrug ziuj zyruq Paaiq yia trug waag. trug waag Eei zyavb hog maaib Qiaj Bwi pa'likq pa'lxkq Eei. Buvq Zauj Buvq taauj Jyenq Jaaj, yetg tiub taauj yetg tiub.
37.19: meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij zx'q yo-sepq Zauj ninb zruj txig Eei i-saa-laa-en fivj uaq tiub pyaaq, se yem e-faa-im Eei puad Eei pyaaq, yaag zx'q yu-Daa Eei pyaaq taauj Jyenq penj yetg tiub, weig pun yem yia Eei puad penj yetg tiub a'q.”
37.17: zx'q naaiq teij i tiub pyaaq tweib mweid taauj Jyenq, lovg puad nanq Jyenq taauj Eei txvj, pun i tiub taauj Jyenq penj yetg tiub.
37.27: yia yem Eei txvj xij yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj. yia zyrug zruj ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, ninb Bua yaag zruj yia Eei pc'g fivj.
37.11: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! naaiq teij Buvq se i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun Eei Buvq. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘yia Bua Eei Buvq Gaai Revg mig a'q. yia Bua maiq lamb Namq txvj a'q. yia Bua zu'g myetg Revg mig a'q.’
37.5: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj meib Bua naaiq teij Buvq. “yia xij pun Tauq Eei Qiaj pia'g meib Bua ka'Euad, meib Bua zyrug navb taaib.
37.9: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag Buaj Tauq Eei Qiaj. xij zu'g trug waag kxvq Buaj Tauq Eei Qiaj, ‘Tauq Eei Qiaj aa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib xij zu'g yem pyei puv Ryaauj taaib pyomq pia'g naaiq teij zu'g taij taig Eei myenb weig pun ninb Bua navb taaib.”+’+”
37.16: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g zx'q tiub pyaaq fiaq Jyenq ‘weig yu-Daa cvj Zauj yu-Daa zruj txig Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb.’ cvj kanb zx'q tiub, penj e-faa-im Eei pyaaq, fiaq Jyenq, ‘weig yo-sepq cvj Zauj yo-sepq zruj txig Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb yetg zuvq zeib fun.’
37.4: ninb zyrug Buaj yia, “xij zu'g trug waag Buaj naaiq teij Buvq, ‘Buvb Gaai aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
37.10: yia zyrug trug waag Navq ninb Paaiq pun yia nx. Tauq Eei Qiaj zyrug pia'g ninb Bua. ninb Bua navb taaib sruq Jyenq, penj yetg tomb kwanb Junb pcv Zamq Eei.
37.22: yia xij pun ninb Bua yem uaq nxm teib puv, se i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj Bov, penj yetg kua'q myenb, maaib yetg taub huvb kunq ninb Bua yetg zuvq. ninb Bua zyrug maiq zruj i nxm kua'q Eei myenb yaag maiq pun Gxi penj i nxm kua'q.
37.12: weig naaiq meib xij zu'g trug waag Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “o yia Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! yia xij Kxi Gxi meib Bua Eei zruq cvj zx'q meib Bua yem zruq Zwrtq taaib txb meib Bua Rwrnj i-saa-laa-en teib puv.
37.15: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
37.13: o yia Eei pc'g fivj aa'b! yia Kxi Gxi meib Bua Eei zruq cvj zx'q meib Bua yem zruq Zwrtq taaib, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
37.1: zyruq Eei Qa'q taaib yem yia Eei sin. zyruq lovg ninb Eei sivj livb txb yia Zwrtq mivb yem nxm hxvd ka'Euad. uaq nxm hxvd maaib Buvq pwavq Revg.
37.26: yia xij Zauj ninb Bua lyepg pcvb xn Eei vcvg waag, penj yetg liud Eei vcvg waag. yia xij pun myenb Yaavj Jyenq faauj. yia yaag xij lyepg yia Eei sivj ting yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Tauj yetg liud.
37.25: ninb Bua xij yem yia Jiu pun yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq, uaq nxm teib puv, se meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem Eei teib puv. ninb Bua Zauj ninb Bua Eei zeib fun zeib fa'q xij yetg liud yem uaq. yia Eei pru, Daa-witq, tu'q zruj ninb Bua Eei huvb Tauj yetg liud.

4.3: zx'q Lia'g penq lyepg taaib an Jyenq meib Zauj zivb Bu'Dovj zruj penj Lia'g laatg, yaag Win meib Eei Myen mivb zivb uaq puv. zivb zyrug zu'g weib. xij zu'g weib Jyenq wrnq Eei. naaiq xij zruj Javb hog pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun mavg.
4.8: yia xij lovg Laav Dob Jyenq meib, pun meib maiq haib Byenq sin Tauj meib weib kxmj zivb Eei Nxib Eia'g pwavq.
4.9: “meib xij zu'g zx'q Byaub witq Zauj Byaub Baa-li, topg Zauj topg si'q, m'zai Zauj ta'Zaanq  zxpg Jyenq. tapq yetg nxm Jaab txvj lovg zruj Fuaq weig kanb Eang. yem meib Ra'Levj pweij uaq teij faamb pc'q Juaq zyepg Nxi xij zu'g Eang naaiq teij Fuaq.
4.7: meib xij zu'g Win Myen mivb tovb weib Jyenq Eei ye-lu-saa-lem zivb yaag xij zu'g suv Zwrtq maiq maaib lwib mweid Eei puad trug waag kxvq uaq nxm zivb.
4.5: yia weig meib tivg zyavj Nxi Eei sruj mrug se faamb pc'q Juaq zyepg Nxi, txij ninb Bua zu'g tivg zwid Eei Havb sruj. meib zyrug xij zu'g Navq naaig Daamb txv i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei zwid.
4.16: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! yia xij pun yem ye-lu-saa-lem Eei Eang hopq tavj. ninb Bua xij zu'g Eang Ryav taaib Eei Fuaq yaag Raub Jyenq Eang. ninb Bua xij zu'g Laau uam taaib hopq yaag kamb Riaj Jyenq Eei hopq.
4.17: yia Navq naaiq zruj weig xij pun ninb Bua Eei laavb zi'g Zauj uam tavj. laanb zyrug kamb Riaj Jyenq Eei mavg laanb, yaag kunq zruj kunq Jaig Jyenq Fiag laaij ninb Bua kanb Eei zwid.”
4.14: yia zyrug kxvq, “aa, zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! yia maiq zruj pun yia kanb maaib wij Jiaj. yem yia lunj Eei zyavb hog Tauj ib zang yia maiq Eang Jiaj ninb kanb taig Eei ka'naaiq fai zu'g Yiab zxib vaatg petq taig Eei ka'naaiq. yaag maiq maaib haiq Euvg kamb Riaq Eei xq pia'g Jiaj yia Eei Rwib.”
4.4: “meib xij zu'g Ra'Levj pweij zaaij mcvj puv. yia zyrug zx'q i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zu'g tivg Eei zwid pun meib Daam. ziuj meib Ra'Levj pweij Eei Nxib Eia'g, meib xij zu'g Daam ninb Bua zu'g tivg Eei zwid.
4.2: xij zu'g weib Jyenq naaiq nxm zivb, zruj laatg weib kxmj, wetq nia Dwi Jyenq, lyepg Zyavq nitq Jyenq, yaag lyepg zov zivb laatg Eei Jaab sig weib kxmj Bx'q zivb.
4.6: “naaiq teij Nxib Eia'g pwavq, meib xij zu'g cvj pweij ta'Eeig Rung, mq paag Ra'Levj pweij Byaaug puv weig Daam yu-Daa zeib fun Eei zwid. yia tivg zyavj pun meib pweij feij zyepg Nxi, yetg Nxi tiq yetg Havj.
4.13: zyruq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb xij zu'g yem tovb yia xij zung ninb Bua mivb Eei nxmb nxm kua'q Bu'Dovj Navq naaiq Eang maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq.”
4.12: xij zu'g Eang Navq Eang Baa-li Fuaq nx, yaag txv Jyenq zwavj myenb lovg myenb Eei Gaiq puaq trud zi'q.”
4.15: ninb zyrug kxvq Buaj yia, “uaq Euvg, yia pun meib lovg vovb Gaiq tiq myenb Gaiq zi'q meib Eei Fuaq.”
4.11: meib hopq Eei uam yaag xij zu'g Laau, yetg Nxi hopq i yenb pyenj uam.  yaag xij zu'g ziuj zyavb hog hopq.
4.1: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g zx'q nxm niab zun an Jyenq meib Eei Ra'Myen waad Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei favj.
4.10: meib Eang Eei xij zu'g Ryav, yetg Nxi Eang lua'g luvd.  xij zu'g ziuj tivg taaib Eei zyavb hog Eang.

12.18: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g sin zinj Jyenq Eang Naavj, yaag kamb Riaj Jyenq Eanb Eanb Eei hopq uam.
12.8: ta'Eeig Dxm yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
12.3: “paamb myenb aa'b! weig naaiq meib xij zu'g Beng Pwij zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb lovg Eei ka'naaiq yaag yem luvb Nxi zang txv Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen zruj Navq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb. meib xij zu'g yem meib kanb yem Eei txvj zruj Navq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb, txv Jyenq ninb Bua mivb yem kanb nxm txvj. maiq kunq ninb Bua se Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun, Riaj ninb Bua haib Namq tu'q Tov.
12.21: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
12.14: weib kxmj ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb, lyemb ninb Eei pxvb puad myenb Zauj zwavj pcvb kwanb, yia xij pun Raanj mivb Tauj pyei puv yaag xij pcv Ru'g Daauq zung ninb Bua.
12.23: meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. yia xij pun naaiq tiub waab peiq tavj mig a'q. yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv yavb naaiq Jiaj ninb Bua maiq tu'q lovg zruj waab peiq a'q.’ xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyavb hog Tauj fatq, Euvb Euvg laaug yaavb Eei sig xij Zwrtq taaib zyen.
12.6: Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog xij zu'g txv Jyenq ninb Bua zx'q ka'naaiq an Ba'taub Daam Jyenq Zwrtq mivb. meib xij zu'g pwav Jyenq Myen pun meib mavg maiq pwatg Dau, weig zu'g yia pun meib zruj nxm Javb hog weig i-saa-laa-en myenb.”
12.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib yem Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua maaib mziv mavg yaag mavg maiq pwatg, maaib mnxmb mwavj yaag mwavj maiq haid, weig zu'g ninb Bua penj Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun.
12.20: maaib myenb yem Eei zivb zyrug penj zivb Waav. zyavb nxm teib puv yaag penj paaig Waav Eei txvj. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’+”
12.24: weig zu'g yem naaiq mivb yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Bu'Dovj maiq maaib Jaaq hing yaavb Eei sig fai trug Jaaq waag Zev myenb.
12.28: “weig naaiq meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq. yem naaiq mivb yia Eei waag maiq maaib yetg Jruj vaib. yia kxvq Eei waag za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.’+”
12.7: yia zyrug ziuj zyruq Paaiq Eei waag zruj. luvb Nxi zang yia txb yia Eei ka'naaiq Zwrtq, Navq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb lovg Eei ka'naaiq. luvb maanb Mwavj yia lovg kanb Eei puad wetq Tov pyauq Eei Fovg. Ryemb yaavb Eei zyavb hog yia txv Jyenq ninb Bua zx'q yia Eei ka'naaiq an Ba'taub Daam Jyenq mivb a'q.
12.19: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj naaiq nxm teib puv Eei pc'g fivj, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj i-saa-laa-en teib puv, ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Eei myenb. ninb Bua xij sin zinj Jyenq Eei Eang Naavj, Hruq Waav Jyenq Eei hopq uam, weig zu'g yem ninb Bua Eei teib puv ka'Euad Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq xij zu'g Zaavq mivb, laaij yem naaig Eei zwavj myenb zruj to'g Eei sig.
12.17: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
12.27: “paamb myenb aa'b! mavg maa'b! i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei zeib fun kxvq, ‘ninb pwatg uaq teij hing yaavb Eei sig kxvq zu'g Ga'haaq hivq Eei Nxib Eia'g. ninb yaag trug waag kxvq Tauj Zxg yem ko Eei zyavb hog.’
12.11: xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘yia kanb weig meib Bua penj nxm Javb hog. yia Navq haiq nx zruj, ninb Bua yaag Navq uaq nx xij zu'g myenb zruj pun ninb Bua. ninb Bua zuvq xij zu'g kwaatq mivb.
12.5: meib xij zu'g txv Jyenq ninb Bua wetq Tov Fovg zyrug kan wetq Tov Eei Kwrtq txb ka'naaiq Zwrtq.
12.9: “paamb myenb aa'b! i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, se Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun, zuvq naaig meib, ‘meib zruj haiq Euvg?’
12.16: mq paag yia xij lyrub Fiag taub paaq pyauj Dutq Ru'g Daauq Zauj vxg Naavj Zauj wrnb pcvg, weig pun ninb Bua mivb yem nxmb nxm kua'q Eei myenb Bu'Dovj Eyemg ninb Bua zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig, yaag hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”
12.4: luvb Nxi zang xij zu'g txv Jyenq ninb Bua txb Beng taaib Eei ka'naaiq Zwrtq, se zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq. luvb maanb Mwavj meib xij zu'g txv Jyenq ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb, Navq zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb mivb nx.
12.10: “meib xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “naaiq teij waag kxvq zu'g ye-lu-saa-lem uaq taub tomb Jyen Zauj yem zivb ka'Euad Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun.”+’
12.22: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib Bua maaib waab xmq kxvq Tauj i-saa-laa-en teib puv maiq zeid? meib Bua kxvq, ‘yetg Nxi Jiaj yetg Nxi, Euvb Euvg hing yaavb Eei sig zyav naaig paag mig a'q.’
12.12: “yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj uaq taub tomb Jyen luvb mwrnd zang Eei zyavb hog xij zx'q ninb Eei ka'naaiq an Jyenq Ba'taub txb Jyenq Zwrtq mivb. ninb xij wetq Tov Fovg yavb Tov Eei txvj Zwrtq mivb, yaag xij pwav Jyenq ninb Eei Myen weig pun ninb kanb Eei mziv mavg maiq pwatg Dau.
12.15: “yia zx'q ninb Bua pun Raanj mivb yem ziaj fivj myenb, ziaj nxm kua'q Bu'Dovj uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
12.13: yia xij zx'q yia Eei muvd zaauj Jyenq ninb, ninb zyrug zu'g yem yia Eei muvd ka'Euad. yia zyrug txb ninb mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon, se Ken-Dia myenb Eei teib puv. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb maiq tu'q pwatg uaq nxm teib puv. ninb yaag xij zu'g yem uaq taig.
12.1: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
12.26: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
12.25: mq paag yia, zyruq, xij kxvq tovb yia xij kxvq Eei waag. ziuj yia kxvq Eei waag za'kevb xij Zwrtq taaib yaag maiq vaib. o Hruq vcvg Eei zeib fun aa'b! yem meib Bua zyavb Eei Nxi Eia'g yia xij kxvq Zwrtq waag yaag ei Jyenq zruj. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.’+”

46.18: huvb tiaj maiq hxpg zu'g Rcv haiq taub pc'g fivj Ripg Eei pwrng cvj zung ninb kwavg Jyenq Dau pyauj mivb. ninb xij zu'g zx'q ninb kanb Ripg Eei pwrng Dau pun ninb kanb Eei txn Ripg. Navq naaig maiq maaib haiq taub pc'g fivj zu'g zung Zwrtq kwavg Jyenq ninb Ripg Eei pwrng Dau mivb.”+’+”
46.8: huvb tiaj pia'g Eei zyavb hog ninb xij zu'g yavb laatg ka'Euad uaq Qovj pia'g cvj yavb naaig Zwrtq.
46.3: mrud nxm tivb kov Nxi Zauj scvb yetq Nxi, kua'q ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj xij zu'g yem naaiq taub kcvb Daavg, zyruq Eei Ra'Myen, paaij ninb.
46.21: ninb cvj txb yia Zwrtq Tauj ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg, cvj txb yia mivb Tauj laatg ka'Euad Eei pyei nxm kx'q, yem naaiq teij pyei nxm kx'q maaib txvj weib Jyenq Eei.
46.14: Dxmb Dxm xij zu'g pun fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj Jyenq. xij zu'g pun pua mx'q pyenj laavb zi'g Zauj yetg kxvg levb ka'lanq yrub weig zxpg Jyenq uaq teij laavb zi'g, pun laavb zi'g Nam teij. naaiq se fovg hxg pun zyruq Eei laavb zi'g. naaiq se fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei leib latg, xij zu'g zanb zang ei Jyenq zruj.
46.23: naaiq teij pyei nxm kx'q ka'Euad mcvj weib kxmj Eei txvj lovg la'pyeiq kx'q taaib zruj Roj puaq trud.
46.6: scvb yetq uaq Nxi xij zu'g fovg hxg taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei vovb kruq txn, Ju'q taub pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yetg taub pa'ki yuvb kruq. yetg zuvq maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei.
46.2: huvb tiaj xij zu'g yem ka'Eiag yavb uaq taub kcvb pia'g taaub Kav sruq Jyenq kcvb zrug ka'Len. sai myenb zyrug weig ninb fovg hxg puaq ziag yaag ziag weig Jiu Tov. ninb zyrug yem uaq kcvb Daavg paaij Tinb huvb. paaij liud zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q. mq paag uaq taub laatg kcvb maiq kwrn Tauj luvb Mwavj.
46.20: uaq laanb myenb Buaj yia, “naaiq nxm txvj se sai myenb zruq fovg hxg ziag fi'q zwid Zauj fovg hxg ziag weig zruj txvg zwid Eei scvb Kuq xq yaag zi'q fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g. Navq naaig maiq zu'g txb Zwrtq ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg Eei Kuvb txvj pun pc'g fivj Zivb Revg.”
46.24: uaq laanb myenb kxvq Buaj yia, “yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fub suj Eei kovb myenb yem naaiq teij txvj zruq pc'g fivj fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq.”
46.7: fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g xij zu'g weig yetg taub vovb kruq fovg hxg yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g Zauj Jyenq. fovg hxg pa'ki yuvb kruq yaag xij zu'g pun yetg Tovq levb. weig pa'ki yuvb txn nx, ziuj myenb xij pun Eei fovg hxg. yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g xij zu'g Jaa pua kxvg pyenj ka'lanq yrub.
46.19: Ga'haaq uaq laanb myenb txb yia yavb laatg kcvb ka'Len pia'g ka'Euad Eei txvj Tauj Win mivb pa'q puv uaq Baib pyauq Eei Zivb Revg Qovj, se sai myenb Eei txvj. yem uaq yia pwatg yem fai puv Jomg uaq maaib nxm txvj.
46.17: mq paag sij kxvq huvb tiaj zx'q teij ninb Ripg Eei pwrng Dau zruj zivb Eeig pun taub ninb Eei pru, zyrug penj pru Eei pwrng Tauj puvj Gxi Eei Havj. Tauj uaq Havj xij zu'g Twij Rwrnj pun huvb tiaj. Kuvj huvb tiaj kanb Eei txn haib lovg naaiq teij Ripg Eei Dau zruj zivb Eeig penj kanb Ripg Eei pwrng Navq.
46.11: “+‘+“Jiaj zipq Eei Nxi Zauj tivg taaib Eei zipq fovg hxg, yetg taub vovb kruq xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g Zauj Jyenq. yetg taub pa'ki yuvb kruq xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g. weig pa'ki yuvb txn nx, ziuj myenb xij pun Eei fovg hxg. yetg Tovq levb laavb zi'g xij zu'g Jaa pua kxvg levb ka'lanq yrub.
46.5: yetg taub pa'ki yuvb kruq xij zu'g fovg hxg yetg Tovq Bwrnq zruj txij. pa'ki yuvb txn nx, ziuj myenb xij pun Eei fovg hxg. yetg Tovq Bwrnq xij zu'g cvj Jaa pyei kxvg ka'lanq yrub zruj txij ziag.
46.9: “+‘+“Tauj tivg taaib Eei zipq, kua'q ka'Euad Eei pc'g fivj taaib yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen paaij Eei zyavb hog, haiq taub myenb yavb pa'q puv kcvb pia'g, paaij liud xij zu'g yavb naamb puv kcvb Zwrtq. haiq taub myenb yavb naamb puv pia'g, xij zu'g yavb pa'q puv Zwrtq. maiq tuvq pun haiq taub yavb ninb pia'g Eei kcvb Zwrtq. xij zu'g yavb ninb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj uaq taub Zwrtq.
46.16: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “sij kxvq huvb tiaj zx'q teij kanb Ripg Eei Dau zruj zivb Eeig pun taub ninb kanb Eei txn, zyrug penj ninb Eei txn Eei mig a'q. ziuj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng penj ninb Bua Eei Dau a'q.
46.4: tivb kov Nxi tovb huvb tiaj xij zu'g fovg hxg puaq ziag pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq, se Ju'q taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj yetg taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb Eei pa'ki yuvb kruq.
46.10: pc'g fivj pia'g Eei zyavb hog huvb tiaj xij zu'g Zauj Jyenq pia'g. pc'g fivj Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog huvb tiaj yaag xij zu'g Zauj Jyenq Zwrtq.
46.22: naaiq teij pyei nxm weib Eei txvj kaub faij teij, Daauq feij zyepg Dx'g, Javq faab zyepg Dx'g. nxmb nxm kx'q weib Eei txvj fib lomb Eei.
46.12: huvb tiaj haiq zang Zwrtq fim fovg hxg, maiq kunq puaq ziag Eei fai ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei, xij zu'g weig ninb Kxi Win tov puv uaq taub kcvb. ninb zyrug ziuj tivb kov Nxi ziag Eei Jauq fovg hxg puaq ziag fai ziag weig Jiu Tov. ziag liud ninb xij zu'g Zwrtq. Zwrtq liud xij zu'g cvj kwrn uaq taub kcvb.
46.15: Navq naaig xij zu'g Dxmb Dxm Beng taub pa'ki yuvb txn Zauj ziag Eei laavb zi'g Zauj ka'lanq yrub weig zanb zang zruj fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq.”
46.13: “+‘+“ninb xij zu'g Nxib Nxi pun taub maiq maaib txvj Gemb, txij Havj Eei pa'ki yuvb txn, fovg hxg pun zyruq weig zruj puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq. xij zu'g Dxmb Dxm fovg hxg pun.
46.1: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Win mivb tov puv Eei kcvb yem zruj kov Eei Ju'q Nxi xij zu'g kwrn. mq paag Tauj tivb kov Nxi Zauj syavb Laaj Eei scvb yetq xij zu'g Kxi Gxi.

13.18: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. “meib Bua msia'q txn xij zu'g Kruq a'q. meib Bua lunb maaib faatq Eei puab Kru yaag zruj Byxvd mGxvq Dia Pwij myenb Lav myenb aiq, weig zx'q yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei mcvg. meib Bua xij maaib hatg maad kunq yia Eei pc'g fivj, pun ninb Bua navb fai taig, weig trub kanb tu'q lovj fai?
13.8: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “weig zu'g meib Bua trug waag myenb kxvq waag Jaaq yaag pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig se kxvb pc'g Navq, yia zyrug Zauj meib Bua txib tekg.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
13.3: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “ninb Bua Vovj haig Eei trug waag myenb xij zu'g Kruq a'q. ninb Bua ei kanb Eei Hruq trug waag mq paag maiq tu'q pwatg haiq Euvg hing yaavb Eei sig.
13.21: yia yaag xij Ziaq kwavg meib Bua Byxvd mGxvq Eei Dia, Fruj yia Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. yem naaiq mivb ninb Bua maiq yem meib Bua Eei puab Diaq penj zu'g zx'q Eei ka'naaiq. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
13.14: yia xij Zc'q meib Bua Raatq Wib pc'g Eei zivb laatg Fiag, yaag Zc'q Fiag Tauj Dau pun kxnb Do'q Zwrtq taaib. zivb laatg Baav Fiag Eei zyavb hog meib Bua zyrug yem naaig Bu'Dovj zu'g myetg. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
13.23: weig naaiq meib maiq tu'q cvj pwatg Jaaq hing yaavb Eei sig yaag maiq tu'q cvj Bruq kwaaj. yia xij Fruj yia Eei pc'g fivj pyauj Dutq meib Bua Eei puab Diaq. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
13.6: ninb Bua pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Jaaq Eei. ninb Bua Bruq kwaaj penj kxvb pc'g Eei waag Navq. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘se zyruq kxvq,’ mq paag maiq zeid zyruq Paaiq ninb Bua. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Bua Zxg funj ninb xij ei ninb Bua kxvq Eei waag zruj zyavj.
13.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq i-saa-laa-en Eei trug waag myenb. xij zu'g trug waag Buaj tovb ziuj kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq waag kxvq uaq teij, ‘mwavj zyruq Eei waag maa'b!
13.20: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yia xij zruj pun meib maaib faatq Eei puab Kru, tovb meib Bua lovg kunq myenb Eei mcvg Navq Lopq nx'g nx. yia xij Lutq naaiq teij puab Kru Zwrtq meib Eei puad. yia xij puvj tovb meib Bua zx'q uaq teij myenb Eei mcvg Navq puvj nx'g nx.
13.7: meib Bua haiq zang kxvq, ‘zyruq kxvq,’ maiq kunq yia maiq tu'q kxvq, meib Bua tu'q pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Jaaq Eei yaag Bruq kwaaj kxvb pc'g Eei waag.”
13.19: meib Bua weig i ziaj Eau Byaub Baa-li Zauj ti'q tyen Fuaq pun yia yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Bu'Dovj zu'g myenb mavg Piaj. meib Bua kxvb pc'g Duaq pc'g fivj mwavj meib kxvb pc'g Duaq Eei waag. maiq hxpg zu'g taig Eei myenb, meib Bua pun ninb zu'g taig mig a'q. maiq hxpg zu'g maaib mcvg zyavb uaq teij, meib Bua yaag lyrub ninb Eei mcvg.
13.17: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win Myen txij meib Eei pc'g fivj Eei sia'q, se ei kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib trug waag uaq teij. meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq ninb Bua.
13.11: weig naaiq xij zu'g Buaj lovg Wib pc'g Raatq zivb laatg uaq teij myenb, laatg xij Baav a'q. xij twib tomb Byuvg Fiag, twib tomb px'g yaag pxvd tomb Ryaauj.
13.5: zivb laatg Tov Eei txvj meib Bua maiq tu'q faauj mivb zxg, yaag maiq tu'q weig i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Zeij zivb laatg, pun ninb Bua Tauj zyruq Eei Nxi Bx'q Jaaj Eei zyavb hog haib yem tu'q wrnq.
13.9: “yia Eei puad xij zruj pun pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig Jaaq Eei Zauj Bruq kwaaj kxvq kxvb pc'g Eei waag uaq teij trug waag myenb. ninb Bua zyrug maiq tu'q yem yia Eei pc'g fivj Eei wig ka'Euad yaag maiq maaib ninb Bua Eei Buaj yem i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei myenb hrud taan, yaag maiq tu'q pia'g i-saa-laa-en teib puv. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq Tinb huvb.
13.16: se maiq maaib i-saa-laa-en Eei trug waag myenb, tovb trug waag kxvq Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem yaag pwatg hing yaavb Eei sig kxvq pcvb xn Eei Jauq txij maiq maaib pcvb xn Eei zyavb hog.’+” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.’
13.4: i-saa-laa-en myenb aa'b! meib Bua Eei trug waag myenb Navq yem Baav waaig Eei txvj Eei Yiab Juq.
13.10: “+‘+“naaiq teij trug waag myenb Duaq yia Eei pc'g fivj. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘pcvb xn’ mq paag maiq maaib yetg teij pcvb xn. pc'g fivj Zeij zivb laatg Eei zyavb hog, naaiq teij trug waag myenb lovg Wib pc'g Raatq Jyenq.
13.22: yia maiq pun Kuq myenb Hruq mun mq paag meib Bua lovg kxvb pc'g Eei waag pun ninb Bua Hruq namj. meib Bua yaag Tevj Jyenq x'q myenb, maiq pun ninb Win Gaav Rwrnj, leib Gxi x'q sig, Fruj ninb Eei mcvg.
13.12: zivb laatg Baav Eei zyavb hog, myenb zyrug naaig, ‘meib Bua Raatq zivb laatg uaq teij Wib pc'g yem haaij?’+”
13.15: yia xij pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pywib Zwrtq Revg, zruj pun naaiq nxm zivb laatg Zauj Raatq Wi zivb laatg Eei myenb. yia zyrug kxvq Buaj meib Bua, ‘zivb laatg maiq maaib a'q. lovg Wib pc'g Raatq zivb laatg Eei myenb yaag maiq maaib a'q.
13.13: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia xij Qiaj Jiad Jyenq Eei pun tomb Ryaauj pwrng, nrud Jyenq pun twib tomb Byuvg, yaag Qiaj Jiad Jyenq pun twib tomb px'g myetg naaiq nxm zivb laatg.
13.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

26.18: ib zang yem meib Baav Eei Nxi Kxib Rru Eanb Eanb Eei. yem Kxiq Eei zwavj Kxib Rru kamb Riaj haig weig zu'g meib Jiaj mig a'q.”+’
26.3: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘o Tai-la'q zivb aa'b! ib zang yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq a'q. yia zyrug txb Zamb kua'q myenb taaib Bx'q meib, Navq Kxiq Jiad laavg nx.
26.8: ninb xij lovg Ru'g Daauq yem Dau Javq Eei txvj taij meib Eei myenb. ninb xij zruj laatg weib Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj, wetq nia Dwi Jyenq, prub Txvb paaib Txvq Jyenq mGxvq taaib Bx'q meib.
26.19: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘Tai-la'q zivb aa'b! yia pun meib penj zivb Waav, Navq maiq maaib myenb yem Eei zivb. yia txb Kxiq Eei uam taaib yemj meib, cvj pun tomb uam komq Jyenq meib.
26.9: ninb xij lyepg zov zivb laatg Eei Jaab sig zov Tov zivb laatg, yaag lovg Lia'g Jaab sig Bx'q meib Eei zivb laaub Fiag.
26.7: “weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia xij txb Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, se maang huvb Eei huvb, taaib Bx'q Tai-la'q. ninb xij txb Jyenq maad Zauj maab Zia Zauj keb maab pcv Zauj Junb pcv kwanb Zamq Eei yem pa'q puv taaib.
26.5: ninb zyrug penj yem Kxiq ka'Euad Pwi muvd Eei txvj. ninb yaag penj maang kua'q myenb taaib luq Eei txvj, weig zu'g yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, kxvq liud a'q.
26.16: uaq zang pavg Kxiq Eei zwavj Jyen zyrug Fiag ninb Bua Eei weig, Jaiq Gxi ninb Bua maaib Eei lwib Daauq, Jaiq Gxi Zovj taaib Eei lwib pyavb, sin zinj Eanb Eanb Eei. ninb Bua zyrug zweid Fiag Dau sin zinj Jyenq maiq tivb, yaag Tevj meib kamb Riaj haig.
26.20: uaq zang yia xij fovq meib Fiag pia'g yemb ken, pun meib Zauj lob Nxi Eei myenb yem Daub Diaq Do Eei txvj, yem Jyenq lob Nxi Baav waaig Eei txvj, se Zauj Jyenq Fiag mivb yem yemb ken uaq teij myenb yem, weig maiq pun haiq taub yem meib ka'Euad. meib yaag maiq tu'q yem yaavb ken.
26.17: ninb Bua xij weig meib paauj tiub naang zivb Ruv kxvq Tauj meib, zyrug Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“meib naaiq nxm maaib mevb hog Eei zivb aa'b! meib yem uaq Kxiq zu'g myetg Revg. meib yem Kxiq zruj wrnq Eei txvj. meib Zauj meib Eei myenb zruj pun yem uaq Kxiq Eei yetg zuvq myenb kamb Riaj haig.
26.14: yia xij pun meib penj Fav Eei la'pyeib zxv, zruj Pwi muvd Eei txvj. meib yetg liud maiq tu'q cvj Zeij Jiad, weig zu'g yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.’
26.4: ninb Bua xij Bx'q waaig Tai-la'q Eei zivb laatg, yaag Zc'q Revg ninb Eei zivb laaub. yia xij kwaaib Revg ninb Eei nia pun penj Fav Eei la'pyeib zxv.
26.21: yia xij pun meib Eei setq mweid Nxi Kruq. yavb naaiq Jiaj zyrug maiq maaib meib a'q. maiq kunq myenb lxd meib, ninb Bua yetg liud lxd maiq pwatg meib.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
26.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! weig zu'g Tai-la'q kxvq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb, ‘aaq haab! maang fivj Eei zivb kcvb waaig mig a'q, se txv Jyenq yia Kxi Gxi mig a'q. ninb penj paaig Waav Eei txvj, yia zyrug tu'q lovj Jyenq faauj.’
26.6: Tai-la'q Eei myenb, tovb yem Dau Javq Eei txvj, xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
26.13: yia zyrug pun meib paauj Ruv Eei Qiaj sekq. meib Eei taanb paab Eei Qiaj maiq tu'q cvj haid.
26.12: meib Eei zinb zxib xij zu'g Zaavq mivb. meib Eei huaj zu'g luq Revg. meib Eei zivb laatg yaag xij zu'g Bx'q waaig. meib Rweig haig Eei pyauq yaag zu'g Zc'q waaig. meib Eei la'pyeiq Zauj Dyavj Zauj Bx'q huq Eei ka'naaiq zuvq zu'g zxi Fiag Kxiq ka'Euad.
26.15: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq Buaj Tai-la'q, ‘yem meib Bu'Dovj zu'g taij zu'g mun Eei myenb Funb Jyenq uaq zang, laaij meib zu'g Baav Eei Qiaj, Kxib Len zuvq xij zu'g Dang tovd maiq zeid?
26.11: ninb Eei maad Eei teib xij Zaaiq meib Eei yetg zuvq Jauq. ninb xij lovg Ru'g Daauq taij meib Eei pc'g fivj. meib wrnq haig Eei Dyrub zuvq xij Baav Fiag Dau.
26.1: yem yia Bua zu'g Zaavq mivb zyepg yetq Havj, zyepg yetq Laaj, scvb yetq uaq Nxi, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
26.10: ninb Eei maad Zamq! haig, zuvq pun niab Buv faauj taaib opq Jyenq meib. ninb pia'g zivb kcvb uaq zang Navq yavb zov Tov Eei Kwrtq pia'g. keb maad pcv Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia Zauj Tx ka'naaiq Eei maab Zia Eei Qiaj Bwi, zuvq Dang tovd meib Eei zivb laatg.

28.18: laaij meib Eei zwid Zamq haig, meib yaag zruj scvb eij maiq pcvb fim, meib zyrug pun meib Eei Zivb Revg txvj maaib wij. Navq naaig yia zyrug pun trud yem meib Bu'Dovj Zwrtq puaq Qwi meib, pun meib txv Jyenq yetg zuvq mavg meib Eei myenb, yem Daub peib penj saaiq.
28.8: ninb Bua xij zx'q meib zxi Fiag yemb ken, meib zyrug Navq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb yem uaq Kxiq ka'Euad taig.
28.3: peiq Daa-ni-en, meib kaub maaib Zovb mevb fai? maiq maaib haiq Euvg haib pivj tu'q meib Jyenq fai?
28.21: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win Myen huvj Jyenq sai-Dxn zivb trug waag kxvq uaq nxm zivb.
28.14: yia xn meib zruj Ke-lu-Bim, kruj Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg Bov. meib yaag yem cvq Fav Navq trud Eei la'pyeib Jaaij Bu'Dovj yavb mivb yavb taaib.
28.23: yia xij pun uaq nxm zivb putq tomb wrnb pcvg, yaag pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq zivb Eei Jaaib hxvg. yia xij pun winb wavq nanq Ru'g Daauq yem faamb puv feij lrug taaib. zu'g taij taig Eei myenb zyrug yem zivb ka'Euad Kiv Fiag taig. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
28.6: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “+‘+“weig zu'g meib Namq taaib meib maaib Zovb mevb Dovg taub zyenb,
28.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! xij zu'g kxvq Buaj Tai-la'q Eei huvb, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“weig zu'g meib Hruq mauj meib kxvq, ‘yia penj taub zyenb. yem Kxiq Bu'Dovj yia zweid Jyenq zyenb Eei weig.’ mq paag meib penj paamb myenb maiq zeid zyenb, maiq kunq meib funj kanb maaib Zovb mevb Dovg taub zyenb.
28.20: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
28.24: “+‘+“yem naaiq mivb mavg Piaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun weib kxmj Eei zwavj myenb zuvq maiq cvj Navq Fimb Zru Fimb mwrng pa'q fai hxig ninb Bua mun. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq Tinb huvb. ”
28.7: weig naaiq yia xij txb kanb fivj myenb taaib Bx'q meib. yem zwavj kua'q Bu'Dovj se Zyruq Jiaj Eei myenb. ninb Bua xij pcv Zwrtq Ru'g Daauq, Va'q waaig meib lovg Zovb mevb lxd taaib Rweig Eei ka'naaiq, pun meib Eei Favb laavg maaib wij.
28.19: yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj hiuq tu'q meib Eei myenb zyrug weig meib kamb Riaj haig. meib setq mweid Eei Nxi za'kevb! kamb Riaj, meib yetg liud yaag maiq tu'q cvj yem a'q.”+’+”
28.17: weig zu'g meib Rweig meib Eei Hruq zyrug mauj. laaij meib Eei Favb laavg meib zruj pun meib Eei Zovb mevb waaig mig a'q. yia zyrug zx'q meib zov Fiag Dau, pun meib zu'g yem Zamb taub huvb Eei Ra'Myen, pun ninb Bua Qa'q mavg meib.
28.11: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
28.5: meib Kauj kanb kwai haig Eei Zovb mevb zruj scvb eij tu'q zinb zxib Zamq Jyenq faauj. weig zu'g meib putq zxib meib Eei Hruq zyrug zruj mauj.”
28.9: meib yem taij meib uaq teij myenb Eei Ra'Myen uaq zang meib Zxg kxvq, ‘yia penj taub zyenb’ fai? meib yem pun meib zu'g mun uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq, meib Kuvj penj paamb myenb Navq, maiq zeid zyenb.
28.16: laaij meib maaid maaig Eei Jauq puvb zua'g meib zyrug maaib Zyruq Eei Jauq pwavq Hruq, meib yaag paamd zwid. yia zyrug zx'q meib Navq zx'q maaib wij Eei ka'naaiq zung meib Zwrtq Tinb huvb Eei Bov. kruj Jyenq meib uaq taub Ke-lu-Bim, zung meib Zwrtq cvq Fav Navq trud Eei la'pyeib Jaaij Bu'Dovj.
28.4: meib Kauj kanb Eei Zovb mevb Zauj wrnb zaav trub kanb lxd zinb zxib Zamq. meib syru Jyem Eaanb pia'g meib Eei Eaanb lamd.
28.10: meib xij zu'g yem kanb fivj myenb Eei puab Diaq taig, Navq maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb zu'g taig uaq nx. “+‘+“yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, kxvq liud a'q.”+’+”
28.22: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“sai-Dxn zivb Eei myenb aa'b! yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq. yia xij yem meib Bu'Dovj piuj mevb yia Eei Favb laavg. yia tivg naaiq nxm zivb Eei zwid uaq zang, yaag yem ninb ka'Euad piuj mevb yia Zivb Revg Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
28.12: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g weig Tai-la'q Eei huvb paauj naang zivb Ruv kxvq Buaj ninb, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“meib se tunb yunb myenb Eei Euvg zeiq, maaib Zovb mevb pwavq Revg yaag Rweig Tauj taaub.
28.15: yem zeij meib taaib uaq Nxi, meib zruj Eei Jauq maiq lamb Gemb a'q, Tauj Ga'haaq pwatg x'q sig yem meib ka'Euad.
28.13: meib yem Tinb huvb Eei Wivj, e-Den. maaib Euvb Euvg Jaaij Eei la'pyeiq zxv Jyenq meib, maaib yavb si'q Eei la'pyeib Jaaij, yavb uvq Eei, mcvb koj Eei, mcvb Byaan Eei, mcvb Buaq Eei, Jia'g pc'g pen Eei, Banq Buaq Rav Eei, si'g koj Eei, Zauj Dyemb mcv Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij. meib lovg Jyem Zi'q lx'g lx'g Jyenq yaag Divb Jyenq pyavb. zeij meib taaib uaq Nxi naaiq teij liug leid zyavj.
28.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
28.26: ninb Bua zyrug tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem naaiq nxm teib puv yaag tu'q komq pyauq, zruj Wivj zwavj a'vung pyruq. yia tivg weib kxmj, mavg Piaj ninb Bua uaq teij Eei zwid uaq zang, i-saa-laa-en myenb tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.”+’+”
28.25: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia zx'q i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, tovb zu'g Raanj mivb yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj uaq teij, kapq zunq taaib. yia zyrug yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia se Zivb Revg. uaq zang ninb Bua tu'q yem ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv, se yia Jiu pun yia Eei pru, yaa-Kopq, Eei teib puv.

8.18: weig naaiq yia xij Qiaj Jiad Jyenq zruj pun ninb Bua. yia Eei mziv mavg ninb Bua yaag maiq Kxb fi'q yaag maiq Kxb lyenb ninb Bua. maiq kunq ninb Bua Qa'q heug Qiaj Bwi pia'g yia Eei mnxmb, yia maiq mwavj ninb Bua.”
8.3: ninb suv Zwrtq pwatg Navq puad nx, nanq Jyenq yia Eei yetg zeiq Ba'pyei. sivj livb prub yia faauj Tauj luvb Zauj Dau Bu'Dovj, cvj yem Tinb huvb pun yia laaug yaavb Eei sig txb yia mivb ye-lu-saa-lem, Tauj Win pa'q puv pia'g Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg kcvb. yem uaq lyepg nxm Zua'q Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad Eei miub favj, Zua'q Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad haig.
8.8: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! wetq Tov zivb laatg maa'b!” yia zyrug wetq Tov nxm Kwrtq, pwatg maaib taub kcvb.
8.9: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “pia'g maa'b! pia'g mivb mavg ninb Bua yem naaiq zruj kamb Riaq haig Eei x'q sig.”
8.7: ninb cvj txb yia Tauj pia'g zivb laatg ka'Euad Eei kcvb Daavg. yia mavg pwatg yem uaq zivb laatg maaib nxm Kwrtq.
8.5: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! ib zang Zau Myen mavg pa'q puv.” yia zyrug Zau Myen mavg pa'q puv, pwatg yem ziab txvb Eei laatg kcvb pa'q puv maaib Zua'q Tinb huvb Qiaj Jiad Eei miub favj.
8.16: ninb cvj txb yia pia'g zyruq Eei pyauq Eei laatg ka'Euad uaq Kav. yem zyruq Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg, pivj laavb txvj Zauj ziab txvb Bu'Dovj, maaib leib maiq ko Eig zyepg Mmd laanb myenb. ninb Bua Eei ti'g taand Win zyruq Eei pyauq uaq puv. ninb Bua Eei Myen Win tov puv. ninb Bua yaag paaij yem tov puv Eei Ba'Nxi.
8.17: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib pwatg naaiq teij sig fai? yu-Daa Eei zeib fun yem naaiq zruj naaiq teij kamb Riaq Eei sig se faib fiuq sig fai? ninb Bua yem pwavq teib puv zruj Zyruq Eei sig Zua'q yia kaub fatq Qiaj Jiad. ninb Bua zx'q Dyavb Gwaab an ninb Bua Eei Ba'zxv.
8.14: ninb cvj txb yia mivb Tauj zyruq Eei pyauq pia'g pa'q puv Eei kcvb. yem uaq maaib Zamb taub msia'q txn zweid Jyenq Raub Eyemq weig zu'g Tam-mutq zyenb taig.
8.4: yem uaq maaib i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg Navq yia yem Daub pcvb pwatg uaq nx.
8.2: yia Zau Myen mavg, pwatg maaib favj zeiq Navq paamb myenb Eei favj zeiq nx. yem ninb Eei Jaaiq ka'Diaq mcvj pwatg mru zeiq Navq trud. yem Jaaiq kub vwaaig Fav Eei, Navq tovb si'q yrub yrug uaq.
8.6: Tinb huvb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib pwatg ninb Bua zruj haiq Euvg fai? se i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun yem naaiq zruj Dovg naaiq Lo, kamb Riaq Eei sig, zung yia leib ko yia Eei sivj ting. mq paag meib Zxg haib tu'q pwatg kamb Riaq Eei sig kaub Lo Jiaj naaiq.”
8.13: Tinb huvb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “meib Zxg haib tu'q pwatg ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig kaub Lo Jiaj naaiq.”
8.12: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib pwatg i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei myenb koj yem Mwavj zov zruj Eei sig fai? kx'g myenb yem kx'g myenb kanb maaib miub favj uaq Qovj txvj weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq mavg maiq pwatg yia Bua. zyruq kwavg naaiq nxm teib puv mig a'q.’+”
8.15: ninb cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib pwatg Eei fai? meib Zxg haib tu'q pwatg kamb Riaq Eei sig kaub Lo Jiaj naaiq.”
8.11: yem naaig maaib Zyetq zyepg taub i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei myenb koj sruq Jyenq uaq teij ka'naaiq Eei favj Eei Ra'Myen. yaag maaib saa-faan Eei txn, yaa-aa-san-yaa, yem uaq teij myenb Bu'Dovj. mrud laanb myenb Eei puad prub Jyenq huvb lrub. huv Eei Qiaj Zauj syruj Zutg Zutq Eei faauj kub vwaaig.
8.1: yia Bua zu'g Zaavq ta'lua'g Havj, lua'g Laaj, scvb Mmd, yia zweid Jyenq yia Eei pyauq ka'Euad. yu-Daa Eei myenb koj Bua zweid Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen uaq zang, zyruq Tinb huvb Eei Qa'q Fiag taaib yem yia.
8.10: yia zyrug pia'g mivb mavg, pwatg weib kxmj Eei Fovg maaib Euvb Euvg Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq Eei favj, Zauj kamb Riaq haig Eei scvb Kuq Eei favj, cvj Zauj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Eei yetg zuvq miub favj.

9.3: i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg leib Gxi Ke-lu-Bim, tovb ninb Eei Favb laavg zinb Daavg yem Eei txvj, faauj mivb Tauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg. zyruq heug zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng, maaib fiaq Ravg Eei Jaab sig fapq Jyenq puab seib Diaq uaq taub.
9.8: txij ninb Bua taij Eei zyavb hog yia kanb yem uaq. yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag, Myen Tauj Dau, heug Jyenq kxvq, “zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! Kruq a'q. meib za'kevb xij pun meib Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq myetg Revg yem ye-lu-saa-lem zevg Fiag Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb fai?”
9.4: zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “Zwrtq mivb yavb kxmj ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. maaib myenb Tauq Qiab Do'g, Raub Eyemq weig yem zivb ka'Euad zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig uaq teij. xij zu'g mivb zruj Javb hog an Jyenq Raub Eyemq uaq teij myenb Eei pyxvb.”
9.2: maaib Ju'q laanb myenb yem uaq Jiaj puv Eei kcvb, se huvj pa'q puv uaq taub kcvb taaib. kx'g myenb nanq Jyenq taij myenb Eei Jaab sig. yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj maaib laanb myenb zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng txb Jyenq fiaq Ravg Eei Jaab sig Zipq Jyenq Jaaiq. ninb Bua pia'g mivb sruq Jyenq tovb si'q ziab txvb ka'Len.
9.6: xij zu'g taij mJavg txn maiq kunq koj lunj, sia'g txn, fu'Jweiq Zauj msia'q txn. mq paag ta'faanb maaib Javb hog Eei myenb maiq tuvq mua'q. xij zu'g yem yia Eei sivj ting Jiad kxn taij.” ninb Bua zyrug Fiag puad taij yem Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Ra'Myen mcvj uaq teij myenb koj.
9.9: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj yia, “i-saa-laa-en Zauj yu-Daa Eei zeib fun Eei zwid za'kevb! Lo haig. teib puv maaib taij myenb lyrug Zwrtq Eei Ryaamq pwavq Revg. maiq pcvb fim Eei sig yaag pwavq Revg zivb weig zu'g ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq leib Gxi naaiq nxm teib puv mig a'q. zyruq yaag maiq pwatg a'q.’
9.11: zu'q la'maab Diab mwrng yaag maaib fiaq Ravg Eei Jaab sig Zipq Jyenq Jaaiq uaq laanb Rwrnj taaib yaag kxvq Buaj zyruq, “yia ei Jyenq meib Paaiq Eei waag zruj liud a'q.”
9.5: yia cvj haid Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj zevg Fiag uaq teij, “kan Jyenq uaq laanb myenb mivb kxmj zivb Fiag puad taij. meib Bua Eei mziv mavg maiq tuvq Kxb fi'q yaag maiq tuvq Kxb lyenb.
9.7: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “meib Bua Zwrtq mivb maa'b! zruj pun zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq maaib wij. zx'q zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Dwi pwavq naaiq laatg ka'Euad.” ninb Bua zyrug Zwrtq mivb uaq zivb taij myenb.
9.1: zyruq huvj Jyenq yia Eei mnxmb heug Qiaj Bwi Eei kxvq, “meib Bua yem zivb zruj taij zwib myenb Eei myenb, kx'g myenb Eei puad nanq Jyenq myetg myenb Eei Jaab sig taaib maa'b!”
9.10: yia kanb c'q, yia Eei mziv mavg yaag maiq Kxb lyenb, maiq Kxb fi'q ninb Bua. mq paag yia xij ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei winb pun ninb Bua.”

32.18: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g weig i-yipq Eei myenb maanb Raub Eyemq. xij zu'g zx'q ninb Bua Zauj maaib mevb hog Eei kua'q Eei myenb zxi Fiag yemb ken, se Fiag yem Jyenq Daub Diaq Eei Kwrtq uaq teij.
32.8: yia xij pun yem luvb kub vwaaig ziuj Fav Eei yetg zuvq yem meib kub vwaaig Mwavj mivb, yaag pun meib Eei teib puv Mwavj Revg. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
32.3: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘yia xij lovg ziaj kua'q Eei myenb maanb, lovg yia Eei muvd pxvd zaauj Jyenq meib. ninb Bua zyrug zx'q meib yem yia Eei muvd Tx faauj taaib.
32.32: maiq kunq yia pun yem yaavb ken Eei myenb kamb Riaj faa-lo, ninb Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb Zamq Zxg xij zu'g Zauj maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb Zauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb yetg Fiag pweij. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
32.21: maaib henq haig Eei pcv xij yem yemb ken kxvq Tauj i-yipq huvb Zauj Tevj ninb uaq teij, ‘ninb Bua maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij, Fiag taaib pweij Jyenq naaiq.”
32.14: yia zyrug pun i-yipq Eei uam Rav, pun ninb Eei yetg zuvq Daaib lyrug Navq yrub nx. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
32.23: ninb Bua Eei zruq yem uaq nxm Kwrtq Do Jiaj Eei txvj. ninb Eei kwanb yem weib kxmj ninb Eei zruq. taub taub zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig, yaag pun yaavb ken Eei myenb kamb Riaj haig.
32.6: yia xij pun meib lyrug Zwrtq Eei Ryaamq saamj pia'g Dau Dxn, lyemb Tauj Bov, yaag pun meib Eei Ryaamq pwavq Revg yetg zuvq Do'g zwrnj.
32.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g zog tiub naang zivb Ruv paauj kxvq i-yipq teib puv Eei huvb, faa-lo, yaag zunb Buaj ninb, “+‘meib funj kanb yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj Navq taub syenb lunj mq paag meib Navq yem Kxiq ka'Euad Eei Juvb huvb. meib yem meib Eei Do'q pctq Zwrtq taaib, lovg meib Eei zauj Qruq uam, pun Do'q Eei uam Fo'g.
32.20: ninb Bua yem zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig Eei myenb Bu'Dovj Kiv Fiag. Ru'g Daauq zuvq pcv Zwrtq taaib a'q. kunq zx'q i-yipq Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb Zamq Tx mivb.
32.24: “e-laam yaag yem naaig. ninb Eei zwavj myenb Zamq yaag yem weib kxmj ninb Eei zruq. ninb Bua taub taub zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig. maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid ninb Bua Fiag Tauj yemb ken. ninb Bua yem yaavb ken uaq zang, ninb Bua zruj pun myenb kamb Riaj haig. ninb Bua zyrug xij zu'g Zauj Fiag uaq nxm Kwrtq Eei yetg zuvq myenb tiaq Eaiq.
32.28: “faa-lo aa'b! meib fib Navq Eei xij zu'g huq mwrng zyrug Zauj maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb yetg Fiag pweij, se Zauj Jyenq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb.
32.7: yia pun meib taig Eei zyavb hog yia xij Txvq Jyenq luvb, pun Leij mwavb mivb. yia xij pun Bwrnj Txvq Jyenq Ba'Nxi, Laab Eutg yaag maiq tu'q ziuj Fav.
32.29: “e-Dom yaag yem uaq. ninb Eei huvb Zauj yetg zuvq pyeiq zeiq, maiq kunq ninb Bua maaib Qa'q henq, ninb Bua Zauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig Eei myenb yetg Fiag pweij. ninb Bua Zauj maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb, se Fiag uaq nxm Kwrtq Eei myenb pweij.
32.19: xij zu'g Buaj ninb Bua, ‘peiq taub taub, meib Bua kaub Rweig Jiaj fai? Fiag mivb maa'b! Fiag mivb Zauj maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb yetg Fiag pweij.’
32.17: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb zyepg Eeig Havj, zyepg Eeig Laaj, zyepg Mmd uaq Nxi, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
32.31: “zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘faa-lo Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv kwanb pwatg naaiq teij myenb ninb zyrug weig ninb Eei myenb Zamq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig tu'q xn Hruq.
32.30: “maaib yem pa'q puv Eei zwavj pyeiq zeiq Zauj sai-Dxn Eei yetg zuvq myenb, maiq kunq ninb Bua maaib Qa'q henq zruj pun myenb kamb Riaj haig, zyrug zu'g Eaiq yaag Zauj zu'g taij taig Eei myenb Fiag uaq nxm Kwrtq. ninb Bua maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid ninb Bua Zauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb yetg Fiag pweij yaag yem yemb ken lomb Rxib tiaq Eaiq.
32.27: ninb Bua maiq tu'q Zauj maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid uaq teij henq Eei myenb pweij. uaq teij myenb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king Fiag yemb ken. mGxvq Romd Jyenq Ru'g Daauq. Txvb paaib lxvj Jyenq ninb Bua Eei Buvq. weig zu'g yem yaavb ken uaq zang naaiq teij myenb zruj pun myenb kamb Riaj haig.
32.11: “+‘weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘meib Bua zuvq xij zu'g Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei Ru'g Daauq taij.
32.5: yia xij zx'q meib Eei xq zxi kwavg uaq Bov kub vwaaig, yaag pun meib Eei sei pwavq nxmb nxm hxvd.
32.9: “+‘yia pun meib yem ziaj fivj myenb Bu'Dovj zu'g myetg Eei zyavb hog, se yem tovb meib maiq hiuq Eei kua'q, yia zyrug pun Zamb fivj myenb Eei Hruq weig meib Raub faanb.
32.16: “naaiq se myenb xij paauj Eei naang zivb Ruv. maang kua'q Eei sia'q xij paauj naaiq tiub Ruv. ninb Bua xij weig i-yipq teib puv Zauj ninb Eei myenb maanb paauj. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
32.4: yia xij zx'q meib kwavg ka'Diaq Dau, zx'q meib zxi Fiag lomb Waav. yia xij pun Daamb luvb Eei nx'g Fiag taaib Ropg Jyenq meib, yaag pun yem kxmj Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib taaib Eang meib peuq.
32.10: yia yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen fevj yia Eei Ru'g Daauq uaq zang, yia zyrug hc'q ziaj kua'q myenb kamb Riaj haig, yaag pun ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj weig meib sin zinj. yem meib zu'g paaig uaq Nxi, kx'g myenb weig Raub kx'g myenb Eei mcvg sin zanb zang zinj Jyenq yem.
32.22: “atg-si-lia Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb yem uaq yaag maaib ninb Eei zruq weib kxmj. ninb Bua yetg zuvq zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig.
32.12: yia xij pun henq haig Eei myenb, se yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj yetg zuvq kaub Zyruq Jiaj Eei myenb Eei Ru'g Daauq, zruj pun meib Eei myenb Zamq zu'g myetg. ninb Bua zyrug pun i-yipq zruj mauj Eei Jauq zutg Revg. ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb Zamq yaag zu'g myetg.
32.15: “+‘yia pun i-yipq penj Daub Waav, yem teib puv yetg zuvq ka'naaiq zu'g luq Revg, yia yaag pun yem teib puv Eei yetg zuvq myenb taig Revg uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q, yia se zyruq. ’
32.13: yia xij yem i-yipq Eei uam Zamq ka'Len myetg Revg ninb Eei yetg zuvq scvb Kuq Yiab zxib. yem naaiq mivb maiq maaib paamb myenb Eei zauj Qruq naaiq teij uam penj uamb pamg, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub scvb Kuq Eei teib pun uam Fo'g.
32.1: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb zyepg Eeig Havj, zyepg Eeig Laaj, scvb yetq uaq Nxi, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
32.26: “me-sekq Zauj Tu-Ban Zauj ninb Bua Eei myenb Zamq yem naaig. ninb Bua Eei zruq Wiv kxmj ninb Bua i laanb. yetg zuvq maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig weig yem yaavb ken uaq zang ninb Bua zruj hc'q myenb kamb Riaj haig.
32.25: ninb Bua zruj txvj pun ninb Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb maanb pweij, maaib ninb Bua Eei zruq weib kxmj. yetg zuvq maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid yaag zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. weig zu'g yem yaavb ken Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zruj pun myenb kamb Riaj, ninb Bua xij zu'g Zauj Fiag uaq nxm Kwrtq Eei myenb tiaq Eaiq. ninb Bua zyrug tu'q txvj Zauj zu'g taij taig Eei myenb yem.

21.18: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
21.8: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
21.3: xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en teib puv, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq a'q. yia xij pcv yia Eei Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq Paiq, yaag xij yem meib Bu'Dovj lyemb Kuq myenb Zauj x'q myenb Pai kwavg.
21.32: meib zyrug penj zaavb puaq trud. meib Eei Ryaamq xij zu'g lyrug Zwrtq yem meib Eei teib puv. yem naaiq mivb maiq maaib haiq taub Javj tu'q meib, weig zu'g yia, zyruq, kxvq.”+’+”
21.21: weig zu'g Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb sruq Jyenq Jaub Zaaj, i tiub Jauq Bu'Dovj, Bruq kwaaj, Jrub Zim, naaig ninb Eei miub favj yaag zaab mavg scvb Kuq Eei Lan.
21.14: “paamb myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Baij Jyenq puad trug waag. kunq pun Ru'g Daauq Va'q Fiag i Rung, zuvq Va'q Fiag pua Rung. se taij myenb Eei Ru'g Daauq, zuvq xij taij myenb Zamq Eei, yaag fevj Wiv kxmj ninb Bua.
21.23: ye-lu-saa-lem myenb haid Navq naaiq teij trug Eei waag se Jaaq Eei, weig zu'g ninb Bua Zauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb lcvd Jiaj vcvg waag. mq paag naaiq teij trug Eei waag pun ninb Bua Javj zu'g ninb Bua zruj txvg zwid, zyrug zu'g zx'q mivb.
21.6: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Tauq tomb Qiaj. xij zu'g yem ninb Bua Eei Ra'Myen Tauq tomb Qiaj Navq Ba'Riu haib Baaij, Raub tu'q Kruq haig.
21.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Win meib Eei Myen huvj Jyenq ye-lu-saa-lem trug waag zunb kxvq sivj ting, yaag xij zu'g trug waag kxvq i-saa-laa-en teib puv.
21.20: yetg tiub Jauq xij zu'g zruj weig pun Ru'g Daauq mivb Tauj am-mon myenb Eei lapq-Baa zivb. yetg tiub mivb yu-Daa Zauj weib wrnq Eei zivb, ye-lu-saa-lem.
21.24: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua paamd zwid Gcvg Eei, pun yia Javj meib Bua zruj txvg Eei zwid. Navq naaig yem meib Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig meib Bua Eei zwid piuj mevb Zwrtq taaib. weig zu'g meib Bua pun yia Javj, meib Bua zyrug zu'g zx'q mivb a'q.
21.28: “paamb myenb Eei txn aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq Tauj am-mon myenb Zauj ninb Bua taanb Eei waag. “+‘+“maaib Ru'g Daauq, maaib Ru'g Daauq, pcv Zwrtq taaib Raatq Fav weig taij myenb, na'q myenb, yaag Fapg Fapg Eei Navq Ba'livg.
21.7: ninb Bua haiq zang naaig, ‘meib weig haiq tiug Tauq tomb Qiaj?’ meib xij zu'g tau, ‘laaij uaq teij Zyruq Eei fyenj. fyenj Tauj Eei zyavb hog, mrud taub myenb Eei Ba'Riu xij yu'g Revg, yetg zuvq puad yaag mau, taub taub Eei Hruq waaig Revg, nxmb nxm Zivb Bx'g yaag mau.’ mavg maa'b! naaiq teij fyenj xij Tauj, yaag za'kevb xij Navq naaig Zwrtq taaib a'q. zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.”
21.29: myenb pwatg hing yaavb Eei Jaaq sig, yaag kxvq zinb hod waag penj kxvb pc'g Eei waag Buaj meib. x'q myenb xij zu'g taij, Ru'g Daauq xij Fiag meib Eei Jaav. meib Eei zyavb hog Tauj, se meib zu'g tivg zwid Ga'haaq laai uaq Rung.
21.19: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kwetq i tiub Jauq pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb txb Ru'g Daauq taaib. naaiq teij i tiub Jauq yem yetg nxm teib puv Zwrtq. xij zu'g zruj nxm Javb hog an Jyenq pun Ziv pia'g zivb Eei Jaub Kuq.
21.17: yia kanb yaag xij Baij puad, xij pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj fiu mivb. yia, zyruq, kxvq naaiq teij waag.”
21.31: yia Eei ka'Qiaj xij pctq Zwrtq pun meib, nrud meib Navq Fopg trud. yia xij zx'q meib Jiu pun myenb to'g myenb taij, se haib taij myenb, myetg myenb lyrug Eei myenb.
21.30: zx'q Ru'g Daauq Tapq Jyenq Paiq maa'b! yem zeij meib taaib Eei txvj, se yem meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv, yia xij syemq meib.
21.27: paaig waaig a'q, paaig waaig a'q, yia xij zruj pun naaiq nxm zivb zu'g paaig waaig. mq paag zuaq Tauj hxpg zu'g tu'q uaq taub taaib Tauj, yia zyrug Jiu pun ninb.’
21.11: “+‘+“naaiq zuv Ru'g Daauq Jiu pun myenb Raatq Fav, weig haib nanq Jyenq. Ru'g Ryruj laig yaag Raatq Fav mig a'q, weig Jiu pun taij myenb Eei myenb nanq Jyenq.
21.5: yetg zuvq maang myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, pcv yia Eei Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq Paiq, maiq tu'q cvj Tapq.”+’
21.9: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq, ‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“maaib zuv Ru'g Daauq, maaib zuv Ryruj laig, Raatq Fav Eei Ru'g Daauq.
21.16: o Ru'g Daauq aag, Va'q mivb Byaaug puv cvj Baib Jyenq Va'q zaaij puv. meib Eei Ra'Myen Win haiq puv, xij zu'g Va'q uaq puv.
21.4: weig zu'g yia xij yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, lyemb Kuq myenb Zauj x'q myenb Pai kwavg. yia Eei Ru'g Daauq zyrug zu'g pcv Zwrtq Paiq, yem naamb puv Tauj pa'q puv taij yetg zuvq paamb myenb.
21.10: Ryruj laig weig taij myenb, Raatq Fav zcvb zcvb Eei Navq Ba'livg nx. “+‘+“yia Bua haib xnb lx'g Eei fai? yia Eei txn aa'b! meib mavg Piaj yetg zuvq tonq Eei waag Zauj tivg zwid Eei Jauq.
21.22: Byaaug Jia'q puad nanq Eei Zim pun Ziv Dxtq zu'g ye-lu-saa-lem, weig pun lyepg zov zivb Eei Jaab sig, weig Gxi Rwib heug myenb taij, weig naug Bx'q Jaaj Eei Qiaj Bwi, zyrug yem uaq lyepg zov zivb kcvb Tov Eei ka'naaiq, yaag wetq nia Dwi Jyenq, cvj zruj laaub weib kxmj.
21.12: paamb myenb aa'b! Qa'q heug, Qa'q Eyemq, weig zu'g Ru'g Daauq xij hxig yia Eei pc'g fivj, se hxig i-saa-laa-en zruj Lo Eei yetg zuvq myenb. ninb Bua Zauj Jyenq yia Eei pc'g fivj zu'g Jiu pun Ru'g Daauq taij. weig naaiq xij zu'g Baij meib Eei Zamb zwib.
21.15: se weig pun ninb Bua Eei Ba'Riu yu'g, yaag maaib myenb Zamq Di'q zu'g Dxpg. yia pun taij myenb Eei Ru'g Daauq yem ninb Bua Eei yetg zuvq zivb kcvb. aa, naaiq zuv Ru'g Daauq Navq Ba'livg, yaag Raatq Fav liug leid taij myenb.
21.13: “+‘+“zu'g seij Eei sig Dovg haaij zuvq xij maaib. sij kxvq mavg Piaj pyaaq, naaiq teij sig maiq zeid xij Zwrtq Eei fai?” se zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.’
21.1: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
21.26: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, zx'q ninb Eei mGxvb peu Zauj huvb nivq mwrnj Zwrtq. Euvb Euvg xij Tiuq Revg, maiq Navq zinb Daavg a'q. aiq Eei xij zu'g Taaib Lav, Lav Eei xij zu'g pun Fiag aiq.
21.25: “+‘o i-saa-laa-en maiq Zivb Revg, x'q haig Eei huvb aa'b! meib zu'g tivg zwid Ga'haaq laai uaq Rung Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj a'q.

23.18: ninb Yenj Eei Jauq ninb zruj tu'q Gcvg, sweib myenb mavg ninb lcvb kcvq Eei sin. yia zyrug yruj ninb Navq zinb Daavg yia yruj ninb Eei txg nx.
23.45: mq paag Kuq myenb xij tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid ziuj tivg Yenj Goj Eei msia'q txn Eei zwid, Zauj taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei msia'q txn Eei zwid, weig zu'g ninb Bua penj Yenj Goj Eei msia'q txn. puad yaag kua'q Jyenq taij myenb Eei Ryaamq.
23.3: ninb Bua yem i-yipq maaig sin. yem Havb Jeiq lunj Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zuvq maaig sin a'q. yem naaig maaib myenb Qam ninb Bua Eei la'Kwrtq. sia'g lunj Eei zyavb hog myenb mua'q ninb Bua Eei Exj.
23.43: yia zyrug kxvq Tauj naaiq taub laaij Yenj Eei Jauq Dxtq Jaaj Eei msia'q txn, ‘myenb Zxg Yenj ninb Eei fai?’
23.14: “mq paag o-ho-li-Baa Jaa zruj ninb Yenj Eei Jauq Zamq Jyenq faauj. ninb pwatg myenb Eei favj waad Jyenq uaq Fovg, se lovg setq si'q waad Ken-Dia myenb Eei favj.
23.48: “+‘Navq naaig, yia zyrug yem naaiq nxm teib puv pun Yenj Eei Jauq tavj, weig tonq yetg zuvq msia'q txn maiq tuvq zwrtg meib Bua Yenj Eei Jauq.
23.34: meib xij zu'g hopq naaiq nxm zaanq yaag hopq Tauj Revg. zx'q zaanq Bx'q huq, lovg yetg Levj yetg Levj kwetq kanb Eei Exj.’ naaiq se yia, zyruq Tinb huvb, kxvq liud a'q.
23.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! maaib i taub msia'q txn, penj i muab sia'q Jwavg maa.
23.36: zyruq cvj kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij syemq o-ho-laa Zauj o-ho-li-Baa fai? Navq naaig xij zu'g zx'q ninb Bua zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig kxvq Buaj ninb Bua,
23.35: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘weig zu'g meib la'Ku'q yia, zx'q yia zxi kwavg meib Eei Ga'haaq Gaav, meib zyrug xij zu'g Daamb txv meib Yenj Eei, maaig sin Eei sig.’+”
23.24: ninb Bua zyrug yem pa'q puv taaib Zauj meib Bx'q Jaaj, yaag txb Jyenq Bx'q Jaaj Eei maab Zia, Tx ka'naaiq Eei Zia, Zauj ziaj fivj myenb Zamq. ninb Bua Dovj Jyenq Lia'g muag, nanq Jyenq tomb Txvb paaib fiub Txvb paaib Baib Jyenq yem meib Eei pyei puv Bx'q meib. yia xij zx'q meib Jiu pun ninb Bua syemq, ninb Bua zyrug ziuj ninb Bua syemq Eei leid tivg meib Eei zwid.
23.7: o-ho-laa zyrug Yenj ninb Bua, Yenj yetg zuvq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei atg-si-lia myenb. ninb lovg tovb ninb xij haig naaiq teij myenb Eei yetg zuvq miub favj zyrug pun kanb maaib wij.
23.17: Baa-Bi-lon myenb zyrug taaib Zauj ninb pweij, ziuj ninb Bua hang Eei Jauq zruj, zyrug pun ninb maaib wij. zu'g maaib wij liud, ninb yruj mig a'q, maiq mavg ninb Bua a'q.
23.49: ziuj meib Bua Yenj Eei Jauq yia xij winb pun meib Bua. meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Daamb txv paaij miub favj Eei zwid. uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq Tinb huvb. ’+”
23.11: “ninb Eei Riad, o-ho-li-Baa, pwatg liud, mq paag ninb Zxg zruj kaub waaig Jiaj ninb Eei txg a'q. yem ninb pa'la'g scv Yenj Eei Jauq ninb zuvq zruj Jiaj ninb Eei txg.
23.33: meib zuvq hopq Gwin yaag zu'g Raub Kruq, naaiq nxm zaanq pun myenb kamb Riaj yaag zu'g paaig Waav. se meib Eei txg, saa-maa-lia, Eei zaanq.
23.16: o-ho-li-Baa pwatg liud, haid xij haig ninb Bua, zyrug Paaiq myenb mivb Ken-Dia lxd ninb Bua.
23.40: “maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. ninb Bua Paaiq trug fyenj myenb mivb ko Eei txvj lxd myenb taaib. uaq teij myenb yaag za'kevb taaib a'q. meib zyrug Raauj sin, lovg setq Raatq mziv, zxv Rweig Eei syrub setq zipq ninb Bua.
23.37: weig zu'g ninb Bua Yenj Goj, puad yaag maaib taij myenb Eei Ryaamq kua'q Jyenq. ninb Bua paaij miub favj, lyemb ninb Bua yuvd pun yia Eei fu'Jweiq lovg trud puaq ziag zruj miub favj Eei Eang hopq.
23.4: txg Eei Buaj heug o-ho-laa, Riad Eei Buaj heug o-ho-li-Baa. ninb Bua i taub taaib penj yia Eei. i taub zuvq yuvd txn yuvd sia'q. kxvq Tauj ninb Bua Eei Buaj, o-ho-laa peiq saa-maa-lia zivb, o-ho-li-Baa peiq ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
23.12: ninb xij haig atg-si-lia myenb, se scvb zyruq, tomb pcvb pyeiq, zu'q lwib hruj Rweig Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv, Zauj keb maad Eei pcv, yetg zuvq Havb Jeiq lunj, se myenb xij Eei myenb.
23.46: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘txb myenb Zamq taaib Bx'q ninb Bua, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj yaag zu'g myenb luq.
23.13: yia yaag pwatg ninb zu'g maaib wij mig a'q. ninb Bua i muab sia'q Jwavg tiub Jauq yavb.
23.26: ninb Bua xij Ziaq Revg meib Eei lwib hruj yaag zx'q meib Rweig haig Eei syrub setq.
23.28: “weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia xij zx'q meib Jiu pun yem meib Rxv uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq, se meib yruj uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq.
23.8: ninb maiq kwavg ninb yem i-yipq Eei zyavb hog maaig sin Eei Jauq, weig zu'g ninb Havb Jeiq lunj uaq zang maaib myenb Zauj ninb pweij yaag mua'q ninb Eei Exj yaag ziuj ninb Bua hang Eei Jauq Yenj.
23.9: “weig naaiq yia zx'q ninb Jiu pun Namq ninb uaq teij myenb Eei puab Diaq, se Jiu pun atg-si-lia myenb, tovb ninb xij haig Eei myenb.
23.32: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘meib xij zu'g hopq meib Eei txg hopq Eei zaanq. naaiq nxm zaanq yrug Do yrug Lo. meib xij zu'g myenb Jyetq, zu'g myenb Wrtq, weig zu'g naaiq nxm zaanq tapq tu'q Zamq.
23.21: Navq naaig meib haid feij tu'q Navq meib Havb Jeiq lunj Eei zyavb hog meib yem i-yipq maaig sin. maaib myenb Qam meib Eei la'Kwrtq. sia'g lunj Eei zyavb hog yaag mua'q meib Eei Exj.
23.23: yia txb Baa-Bi-lon myenb, Ken-Dia Eei zwavj myenb, pe-Kotg myenb, Qo-aa myenb, Ko-aa myenb, lyemb atg-si-lia Eei zwavj myenb, se Havb Jeiq lunj, tovb myenb xij Eei myenb. yetg zuvq penj scvb zyruq Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq fiub pcvb pyeiq Zauj Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv, yetg zuvq keb Jyenq maad.
23.6: se zu'q lwib hruj lua'g Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Zauj zruj scvb zyruq Zauj tomb pcvb pyeiq, yetg zuvq Havb Jeiq lunj, se myenb xij Eei myenb, Zauj keb maad Eei pcv.
23.44: weig zu'g myenb Zxg pia'g mivb lxd ninb Navq pia'g mivb lxd maaig sin Eei msia'q txn nx. ninb Bua zyrug pia'g mivb lxd o-ho-li Zauj o-ho-li-Baa Yenj.
23.20: yem uaq ninb xij haig Namq ninb uaq teij. ninb Bua Yenj Eei Jauq henq Navq lxb kruq maab kruq scv nx.
23.5: “o-ho-laa penj yia Eei uaq zang ninb zruj pwavb lyrub Eei sig. ninb xij haig Namq ninb uaq teij atg-si-lia myenb,
23.19: mq paag ninb Zxg Jaa Yenj Zamq Jyenq faauj, Javj Tauj ninb Havb Jeiq lunj Eei zyavb hog yem i-yipq teib puv maaig sin uaq zang a'q.
23.38: maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. ninb Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj pun yia. tovb uaq Nxi ninb Bua zruj pun yia Eei sivj ting maaib wij yaag pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maiq Zivb Revg.
23.31: meib yavb meib Eei txg yavb Eei Jauq. weig naaiq yia zx'q ninb Eei zaanq Jiu pun yem meib Eei puad.’
23.27: Navq naaig yia zyrug pun meib yem i-yipq txb taaib uaq teij Yenj Eei, maaig sin Eei Jauq tavj, weig pun meib maiq cvj Zau Myen mavg i-yipq myenb. yem naaiq mivb yaag maiq Javj ninb Bua.’
23.41: meib zweid Jyenq Rweig Eei Zruj yaag maaib tiab ton Jyenq meib Eei Ra'Myen. tiab kub vwaaig maaib yia Eei huv Zauj yia Eei ka'lanq yrub.
23.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
23.39: se ninb Bua taij ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud fovg hxg ziag miub favj, tovb uaq Nxi ninb Bua pia'g yia Eei sivj ting, pun yia Eei sivj ting maaib wij. ninb Bua yem yia Eei pyauq Navq naaiq nx zruj.
23.47: naaiq teij myenb xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov ninb Bua yaag lovg Ru'g Daauq taij. lyemb ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud yaag taij yaag puvj trud puaq ninb Bua Eei pyauq.
23.10: naaiq teij myenb Ziaq Fav ninb Eei lwib hruj, Zaavq ninb Eei naamb Erud mivb, yaag lovg Ru'g Daauq taij ninb. ninb zu'g tivg liud zwid, Ga'haaq yem msia'q txn Bu'Dovj ninb penj kruq kxvq.
23.25: yia nrud haig meib, xij pun ninb Bua Qiaj Jiad Jyenq zruj pun meib. ninb Bua xij kaatq meib Eei Ba'zxv Zauj meib Eei mnxmb kwavg. yem meib zevg Fiag Eei myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. ninb Bua xij zx'q meib Eei txn Zauj meib Eei sia'q. lyrub Fiag Eei myenb xij zu'g trud puaq Qwi.
23.22: “o-ho-li-Baa aa'b! weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia xij pun zinb Daavg Namq meib mq paag Ga'haaq meib yruj uaq teij myenb taaib Bx'q meib. yia xij txb ninb Bua yem pyei puv taaib Zauj meib txib tekg.
23.42: “Zauj ninb yem uaq maaib yetg tomb kwanb maiq hiuq tu'q yrub Raub Eei myenb Eei Qiaj Bwi. cvj maaib myenb yem teib puvb Waav txb tiuq Gwin Eei myenb Zauj Jyenq Prub Tov Eei myenb taaib. uaq teij myenb zx'q Jyemb pun uaq teij msia'q txn tavb Jyenq yaag zx'q Rweig haig Eei nivq pun ninb Bua Dovj Jyenq.
23.15: Jaaiq sai Jyenq hrub Laav, mGxvq Eatq Jyenq Dia cvj Ncv Fiag. taub taub Navq pcvb pyeiq. favj zeiq pwatg Navq Baa-Bi-lon myenb, se Ken-Dia teib puv Eei myenb.
23.29: ninb Bua zyrug Rxv Jyenq zruj pun meib, zx'q Revg meib laaub lwig tu'q taaib Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq pun meib Fav sin lcvb kcvq Eei yem. maaig sin Zauj pwavb lyrub Eei Jauq zyrug Zwrtq taaib Gcvg Eei.
23.30: meib Yenj Eei, maaig sin Eei Jauq pun meib zu'g naaiq teij sig, weig zu'g meib maaig sin pun maang kua'q myenb, yaag laaij ninb Bua Eei miub favj pun kanb maaib wij a'q.

6.3: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj Bov aa'b! xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Tinb huvb Eei waag kxvq tomb zxv fiub Bov, Do'g zwrnj Zauj hxvd. ninb kxvq, “yia xij pun meib Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq yaag myetg Revg meib Bua yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj.
6.8: “+‘+“mq paag yia xij lyrub teij meib Bua, weig zu'g meib Bua zu'g Raanj mivb yem ziaj kua'q ziaj fivj Bu'Dovj uaq zang, meib Bua maaib teij pyauj Dutq Ru'g Daauq.
6.9: Navq naaiq yem yia pun ninb Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei kua'q Bu'Dovj ninb Bua zyrug Javj yia. yia tivg ninb Bua Eei zwid pun ninb Bua Eaiq laaij ninb Bua kanb maaib Yiab Hruq leib yia. ninb Bua Eei mziv mavg miub favj cvj hang haig. ninb Bua zyrug Rxv ninb Bua kanb laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei x'q sig Zauj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq haig Eei sig.
6.7: zu'g taij Eei myenb xij Kiv Fiag yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
6.5: yia xij zx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei sei an Jyenq ninb Bua Eei miub favj Ra'Myen cvj zx'q meib Bua Eei Buvq faatq Raanj Wiv kxmj meib Bua Eei ziab txvb.
6.14: yia zyrug suv puad Bx'q ninb Bua, pun ninb Bua yetg zuvq yem Eei txvj penj Daub Waav, yem teib puvb Waav mivb Tauj Dipg-laa zivb. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
6.4: meib Bua Eei ziab txvb xij zu'g paaig Waav. meib Bua Eei puaq huv tiab yaag xij zu'g Bx'q huq. yem meib Bua uaq zu'g taij taig Eei myenb yia yaag xij zxi Fiag meib Bua Eei miub favj Eei Ra'Myen.
6.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win Myen mivb i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj Bov yaag trug waag kxvq uaq teij Bov.
6.6: meib Bua yem haaij, meib Bua Eei zivb xij zu'g paaig Waav, meib Bua yem Lav zavg zyenb Eei txvj yaag zu'g Bx'q waaig. Navq naaig meib Bua Eei ziab txvb zyrug paaig Waav zu'g myetg. meib Bua Eei miub favj yaag zu'g Bx'q huq myetg Revg. meib Bua Eei puaq huv tiab xij zu'g Bx'q huq. meib Bua zruj Eei kov zyrug paag Revg mig a'q.
6.13: ninb Bua zu'g taij Eei myenb Eei sei pweij Jyenq Wiv kxmj ninb Bua Eei ziab txvb, ninb Bua Eei miub favj Bu'Dovj, yem nxmb nxm Bovb Lav Bovb nivq Zauj tiub tiub Eyemd Eei Dyavj Zauj tiub tiub maaib nxmb Zamq Eei tomb Ba'ov zwei Dyavj ka'Diaq, ta'faanb puaq huv pun ninb Bua Eei miub favj Eei txvj, uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
6.12: yem ko Eei txvj ninb Bua xij zu'g wrnb pcvg taig. yem fatq uaq teij xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. zevg Fiag maiq kcvb taig uaq teij zuvq xij zu'g vxg Naavj taig. yia zyrug Navq naaiq nx nrud ninb Bua Tauj yia Eei ka'Qiaj fiu.
6.11: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib xij zu'g Baij puad, Damg Dau kxvq, ‘Kruq a'q!’ laaij i-saa- laa-en Eei zeib fun zruj Eei yetg zuvq kamb Riaq haig Eei x'q sig, ninb Bua zuvq xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq, zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g wrnb pcvg taig.
6.1: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
6.10: ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. yia kxvq xij pun ninb Bua zu'g ze'g naang se maiq zeid kxvq Kuvb waag.”

44.18: meib Bua xij zu'g peu Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng Eei mGxvb peu, yaag zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng Eei hruj. yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua sai haiq Euvg pun ninb Bua Zwrtq hang Eei Dia.
44.8: meib Bua yaag maiq kruj yia Eei Zivb Revg ka'naaiq. taauj Rwrnj meib Bua Paaiq kanb fivj myenb kruj yia Eei sivj ting.”
44.3: Kuvj huvb tiaj kanb Navq haib pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg kcvb zweid Jyenq yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Eang. ninb xij zu'g yavb kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj pia'g cvj yavb kcvb ka'Euad uaq Qovj Zwrtq.”
44.21: haiq taub sai myenb pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eei zyavb hog maiq tuvq hopq a'vung tiuq.
44.14: maiq kunq Navq naaig, yia xij Paaiq ninb Bua kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, liug leid yem naaig ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq Jauq yaag zruj Qyemj zu'g zruj Eei Euvb Euvg kov.
44.23: ninb Bua xij zu'g Faauj yia Eei pc'g fivj hiuq tu'q pun Gxi haiq Euvg Zivb Revg, haiq Euvg Prub Tov Eei, yaag pun ninb Bua zia'q tu'q Zivb Revg Eei Zauj maaib wij Eei Navq haiq nx kanb Euvg.
44.6: meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj uaq teij Hruq vcvg Eei myenb, i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! Toq kwavg Gxi meib Bua zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig.
44.2: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “naaiq taub kcvb xij zu'g yetg liud kwrn, maiq tuvq Kxi, yaag maiq tuvq pun haiq taub yavb naaiq taub kcvb pia'g. zyruq, i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb, kan naaiq taub kcvb pia'g. weig naaiq xij zu'g kwrn Jyenq.
44.20: “+‘+“sai myenb maiq hxpg zu'g Teij mGxvq, yaag maiq hxpg zu'g lyrub Ba'pyei Daauq. Kuvj xij zu'g Japq suv Eei.
44.24: “+‘+“sij kxvq myenb maaib sig sai myenb xij zu'g zruj yia Eei tunj sig myenb, ei Jyenq yia Eei leid tunj sig. ninb Bua Jiaj yia tivg taaib Eei yetg zuvq zipq Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua xij zu'g ei yia Eei leib latg Zauj leid zruj. yaag xij zu'g syru yia Eei tivb kov Nxi penj Zivb Revg Nxi.
44.28: “+‘+“sai myenb maiq maaib ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. yia se ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. yaag maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua yem i-saa-laa-en maaib ninb Bua Eei pwrng. yia penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng mig a'q.
44.7: meib Bua zx'q yia Eei Eang hopq, se uaq teij Mei Zauj Ryaamq, fovg hxg pun yia Eei zyavb hog, meib Bua pun lyemb Hruq lyemb sin maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei kanb fivj myenb yem yia Eei sivj ting pun sivj ting maaib wij. laaij meib Bua zruj yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig meib Bua zruj pun yia Eei vcvg waag Dxtq.
44.29: ninb Bua tu'q Eang Eei se fovg hxg ziag Eei laavb zi'g, ziag fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zruj txvg zwid ziag Eei ka'naaiq. i-saa-laa-en myenb fuvj tavj pun Tinb huvb Eei yetg zuvq ka'naaiq yaag penj sai myenb Eei mig a'q.
44.19: ninb Bua Zwrtq Tauj ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg, Tauj pc'g fivj uaq, ninb Bua xij zu'g Jaiq Gxi ninb Bua zu'q Jyenq fub suj Eei lwib hruj. ninb Bua xij zu'g an Jyenq Zivb Revg Eei Qovj cvj zu'q kanb teij lwib hruj. Raub heij ninb Bua Eei lwib hruj haib txb Zivb Revg Eei Jauq mivb Jiaj pc'g fivj.
44.17: “+‘+“ninb Bua pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg kcvb Eei zyavb hog, ninb Bua xij zu'g zu'q la'maab Diab mwrng Eei lwib hruj. ninb Bua yem ka'Euad uaq Kav zivb laatg Eei Tiv fai zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad fub suj Eei zyavb hog, maiq tuvq pun ninb Bua zu'q pa'ki yuvb pyei Eei lwib hruj.
44.31: maiq kunq nx'g fai scvb Kuq, ta'faanb ninb kanb taig fai ka'naaiq petq taig, sai myenb maiq tuvq Eang.
44.30: zua'g Daavg Eei Euvb Euvg taaub Txvj ka'naaiq Zauj yetg zuvq fovg hxg Eei Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq penj sai myenb Eei. meib Bua zua'g Daavg taaub Txvj Eei laavb zi'g xij mxg taaib pun sai myenb, yia zyrug Zeij fu'q pun meib Bua Eei pyauq.
44.27: ninb pia'g ka'Euad uaq Kav zivb laatg Tauj Zivb Revg Eei txvj weig yem Zivb Revg txvj fub suj uaq Nxi, xij zu'g weig kanb fovg hxg ziag fi'q zwid.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
44.11: ninb Bua xij zu'g yem yia Eei sivj ting fub suj, xij zu'g kruj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei laatg kcvb yaag yem uaq nxm pyauq fub suj. ninb Bua xij zu'g taij puaq ziag Eei Zauj weig pc'g fivj ziag Eei scvb Kuq yaag sruq Jyenq pc'g fivj Eei Ra'Myen fub suj ninb Bua.
44.5: zyruq kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g lyepg tivg Hruq, lovg mziv mavg, pcv mnxmb mwavj lovj yia xij Buaj meib Eei yetg zuvq waag, se yia xij zx'q zavg zyruq Eei pyauq Eei yetg zuvq leid Zauj leib Eeig Buaj meib. xij zu'g lovb lovj mavg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei txvj Zauj Zwrtq sivj ting Eei nxmb nxm txvj.
44.9: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Eei yetg zuvq kanb fivj myenb, se tovb sin Zauj Hruq maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei kanb fivj myenb, maiq tuvq pun pia'g yia Eei sivj ting.”
44.16: “+‘+“ninb Bua xij zu'g pia'g yia Eei sivj ting. ninb Bua haib taaib nitq fatq yia Eei tiab yem yia Eei Ra'Myen fub suj yia yaag ei yia Paaiq Eei zruj.
44.4: uaq laanb myenb cvj txb yia yavb pa'q puv kcvb taaib Tauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj. yia mavg, pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg pwavq zyruq Eei pyauq. yia zyrug Pua'q Fiag, Myen Tauj Dau.
44.10: “+‘zyruq kxvq, “i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb txvg Jauq uaq zang, le-wi myenb leib ko yia mivb kan ninb Bua Eei miub favj, zyrug xij zu'g weig ninb Bua zruj Eei zwid Daamb txv.
44.22: sai myenb maiq tuvq lovg aub kwaaq fai aub leib. Kuvj xij zu'g lovg maiq pweij Jiaj txn Eei i-saa-laa-en fivj Eei sia'q fai sai myenb Eei aub kwaaq.
44.12: laaij le-wi myenb yem miub favj Eei Ra'Myen fub suj pc'g fivj zyrug pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Di'q zu'g Dxpg, paamd zwid. weig naaiq yia hruq waag kxvq ninb Bua xij zu'g laaij ninb Bua zruj Eei zwid Daamb txv. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
44.15: “+‘+“i-saa-laa-en myenb mivb txvg Jauq, leib yia Eei zyavb hog, le-wi fivj, saaj-Dokg Eei zeib fun Eei sai myenb, zyepg zua'q Eei kruj yia Eei sivj ting. weig naaiq yia pun ninb Bua taaib nitq fatq yia, fub suj yia, weig zx'q Mei Zauj Ryaamq fovg hxg pun yia.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
44.13: ninb Bua maiq tu'q taaib nitq fatq yia weig zruj sai myenb fub suj yia. ninb Bua yaag maiq tu'q mivb nitq fatq yia Eei haiq Euvg Zivb Revg ka'naaiq fai kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj Eei ka'naaiq. mq paag ninb Bua xij zu'g tiaq Eaiq, laaij ninb Bua zruj uaq teij kamb Riaq Eei sig.
44.1: uaq laanb myenb cvj txb yia Rwrnj Tauj Win mivb tov puv Eei laatg kcvb ka'Eiag mcvj. uaq taub kcvb kwrn Jyenq Eei.
44.26: ninb saaj Zivb Revg liud, xij zu'g zuaq siag Nxi.
44.25: “+‘+“ninb Bua maiq tuvq mivb nitq fatq taig mivb Eei myenb pun kanb maaib wij, Zwrtq liud weig kanb Eei tiaj maag, txn sia'q kanb Eei muab txig kxb yrud fai maiq maaib Jaa Eei txg fai muag pun kanb zu'g maaib wij.

20.18: yia yem teib puvb Waav Buaj ninb Bua Eei naamb Erud, “maiq tuvq ei meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei leib Eeig, yaag maiq tuvq kan ninb Bua Eei leid. maiq tuvq laaij ninb Bua Eei miub favj pun kanb zu'g maaib wij.
20.45: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
20.3: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei myenb koj, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib Bua taaib se weig naaig yia fai?” zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, yia zuvq maiq pun meib Bua naaig yia.”+’
20.43: yem uaq meib Bua zyrug Javj zu'g meib Bua Eei Jauq Zauj meib Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq sig, tovb meib Bua zruj pun kanb maaib wij. meib Bua zyrug Rxv meib Bua kanb laaij meib Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq x'q sig.’
20.14: mq paag yia weig yia kanb Eei mevb maiq Navq naaig zruj. maiq xij pun yia Eei mevb yem tovb yia txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq teij fivj Eei Ra'Myen zu'g maaib wij.
20.48: yetg zuvq paamb myenb zyrug zia'q tu'q se yia, zyruq, tyemq zia'g trud, yaag maiq maaib haiq taub nxig tu'q trud taig.”+’+”
20.34: yia zuvq xij suv yia henq haig Eei puad, lovg tomb Qa'q, yaag pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun meib Bua faatq Raanj Eei yem maang kua'q maang fivj Bu'Dovj txb meib Bua Zwrtq taaib kapq zunq.
20.2: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
20.36: yia yem i-yipq Eei teib puvb Waav syemq meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei zwid Navq haiq nx, yia zyrug Navq uaq nx syemq meib Bua Eei zwid.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
20.35: yia xij txb meib Bua pia'g mivb yem maang kua'q Eei teib puvb Waav. yem naaig yia zyrug Zauj meib Bua Myen txij Myen syemq meib Bua Eei zwid.
20.24: weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq kan yia Eei leid, zuvq Gemb yia Eei leib latg yaag pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maaib wij. ninb Bua Eei mziv Kuvj mavg Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eei miub favj.
20.7: yia yaag kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘meib Bua kx'g myenb xij zu'g kwavg tovb meib Bua Eei mziv a'Neiq mavg uaq teij kamb Riaq Eei miub favj. maiq tuvq laaij i-yipq myenb Eei miub favj pun kanb maaib wij. yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’
20.17: maiq kunq Navq naaig, yia mavg Jyenq ninb Bua, Kxb lyenb ninb Bua, zyrug maiq myetg ninb Bua, maiq pun ninb Bua yem teib puvb Waav zutg Revg.
20.49: yia zyrug kxvq, “aaq, zyruq Tinb huvb aa'b! myenb zyavq Jyenq yia kxvq, ‘ninb maiq zeid Kuvj kxvq waab peiq fai?’+”
20.11: yia zx'q yia Eei leib latg Jiu pun ninb Bua yaag pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia Eei leid. sij kxvq myenb ei Jyenq zruj zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
20.33: “zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, yia xij suv yia henq haig Eei puad, lovg tomb Qa'q, yaag pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq. yia yaag xij zruj huvb kunq meib Bua.
20.16: weig zu'g ninb Bua vcvg yia Eei leid, maiq kan yia Eei leib latg yaag pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maaib wij, laaij ninb Bua Eei Hruq kan Jyenq ninb Bua Eei miub favj.
20.40: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yem yia Eei Zivb Revg Bov, se i-saa-laa-en Eei Bovb Lav Eei txvj, i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun, se taub taub, xij yem uaq nxm teib puv fub suj yia. yem uaq yia xij zipq ninb Bua. yem uaq yia xij lovg meib Bua fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq Zauj meib Bua kinq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei zivb Eeig Zauj Jyenq meib Bua fovg hxg ziag Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq.
20.37: ‘yia xij pun meib Bua Run Jiaj yia Eei pyaaq ka'Diaq, pun meib Bua xij zu'g ei Jyenq Zauj yia lcvd Jiaj Eei vcvg waag.
20.4: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij syemq ninb Bua fai? meib xij syemq ninb Bua fai? meib xij zu'g pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij zruj uaq teij kamb Riaq haig Eei sig.
20.12: yia cvj zx'q yia Eei tivb kov Nxi Jiu pun ninb Bua weig zruj Javb hog yem yia Zauj ninb Bua Bu'Dovj, weig pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q se yia, zyruq, pun ninb Bua Zivb Revg.
20.46: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win Myen mivb naamb puv zunb kxvq naamb puv mcvj yaag trug waag kxvq naamb puv Eei Dyavb lomg.
20.13: “+‘mq paag i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun yem teib puvb Waav vcvg Jyenq yia. ninb Bua maiq ei yia Eei leib latg, zuvq vcvg Jyenq yia Eei leid. sij kxvq myenb ei Jyenq naaiq teij leid zruj, zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq. ninb Bua yaag zruj pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maaib wij Lo haig. yia zyrug kxvq yia xij yem teib puvb Waav pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq zruj pun ninb Bua zu'g myetg Revg.
20.26: yia pun ninb Bua laaij ninb Bua fovg hxg ziag Eei ka'naaiq pun kanb maaib wij. yia pun ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei taub taub txnb la'kauq lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg. naaiq se weig pun ninb Bua yruj! haig. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
20.28: yia txb ninb Bua pia'g yia hruq Jyenq pun ninb Bua Eei teib puv uaq zang, ninb Bua pwatg haiq nxm Bovb Lav fai haiq tiub maaib nxmb Zamq Eei Dyavj, ninb Bua yem uaq fovg hxg ziag yaag fovg hxg Zua'q yia Qiaj Jiad Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua yem uaq pun Daav Eei Qiaj faauj yaag yem uaq Ziaq ziag.
20.8: “+‘mq paag ninb Bua vcvg yia, maiq Kavq mwavj yia. ninb Bua yaag maiq kwavg tovb ninb Bua Eei mziv a'Neiq uaq teij kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq, yaag maiq kwavg i-yipq myenb Eei miub favj. yia zyrug kxvq, yia xij yem i-yipq teib puv nrud ninb Bua, pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq zruj pun ninb Bua.
20.9: mq paag yia weig yia kanb Eei mevb maiq Navq naaig zruj. maiq xij pun yia Eei mevb yem tovb yia Eei myenb yem uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb Eei Ra'Myen zu'g maaib wij. yia txv Jyenq naaiq teij nxmb nxm kua'q Eei myenb pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia, weig zu'g yia txb yia Eei pc'g fivj Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv.
20.32: “+‘meib Bua yem Hruq Namq taaib, “yia Bua xij Navq kanb fivj myenb Zauj kanb kua'q myenb paaij Dyavj Zauj la'pyeiq.” mq paag naaiq teij sig yetg liud maiq haib maaib.’
20.21: “+‘mq paag uaq teij naamb Erud vcvg yia. ninb Bua maiq kan yia Eei leib latg, yaag maiq mwavj yia Eei leid, maiq ei Jyenq zruj. sij kxvq myenb ei Jyenq naaiq teij leid zruj zyrug tu'q zyavb Jyenq. ninb Bua yaag pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maaib wij. yia zyrug kxvq yia xij yem teib puvb Waav nrud ninb Bua, pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq zruj pun ninb Bua.
20.23: yia yaag yem teib puvb Waav Zauj ninb Bua hruq waag kxvq yia xij pun ninb Bua faatq Raanj, pun ninb Bua yem ziaj fivj ziaj kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj,
20.6: uaq Nxi yia hruq Jyenq lcvd waag Buaj ninb Bua, yia xij txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq, txb ninb Bua pia'g yia weig ninb Bua lxd Eei teib puv, se Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv. peiq maang kua'q, naaiq nxm teib puv kaub Rweig Jiaj.
20.44: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia weig yia kanb Eei mevb zruj, maiq zeid ei meib Bua zruj Eei waaig sig Zauj zruj Eei x'q sig zruj pun meib Bua. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’+”
20.20: syru yia Eei tivb kov Nxi penj Zivb Revg Nxi. naaiq Nxi yem yia Zauj meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj Javb hog weig pun meib Bua hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.”
20.5: Buaj ninb Bua, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. “tovb yia kinq i-saa-laa-en uaq Nxi, yia hruq Jyenq Zauj yaa-Kopq Eei trub zov Eei zeib fun lcvd waag, yaag pun ninb Bua yem i-yipq teib puv hiuq tu'q yia. yia hruq Jyenq Buaj ninb Bua, ‘yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb.’
20.19: yia se zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb. xij zu'g kan yia Eei leib latg, mwavj yia Eei leid yaag ei Jyenq zruj.
20.38: yia xij zx'q Zwrtq Revg yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Hruq vcvg Eei myenb. lyemb Byenq Hruq pun yia uaq teij, yia xij zx'q ninb Bua Zwrtq ninb Bua yem Eei teib puv mq paag ninb Bua maiq tu'q pia'g i-saa-laa-en teib puv. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
20.31: meib Bua fovg hxg Eei zyavb hog yaag zx'q meib Bua Eei zivb Eeig, se meib Bua Eei txn, lovg trud puaq ziag, meib Bua laaij naaiq teij miub favj zruj pun kanb maaib wij Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi. o i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! yia hxpg zu'g pun meib Bua taaib naaig yia fai?”+’ zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg kxvq, yia maiq pun meib Bua taaib naaig yia.
20.27: “paamb myenb aa'b! weig naaiq xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yem naaiq teij sig meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij cvj Ki yia, weig zu'g ninb Bua Byenq Hruq pun yia.
20.41: yia yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj txb meib Bua Zwrtq taaib uaq zang, yaag yem meib Bua zu'g faatq Raanj Eei yem kanb kua'q, txb meib Bua taaib kapq zunq. yia zyrug zipq meib Bua Navq penj hxpg Hruq Eei Qiab Daav. yia yaag xij yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj txv Jyenq maang fivj pun Ziv yia Zivb Revg.
20.1: yem zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei ta'Zyetq Havj, Mmd Laaj scvb zyepg, maaib teij i-saa-laa-en Eei myenb koj taaib naaig zyruq zyrug zweid Jyenq yia Eei Ra'Myen.
20.39: “i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun aa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘meib Bua taub taub c'q, sij kxvq meib Bua maiq mwavj yia, yem naaiq mivb kunq mivb paaij meib Bua Eei miub favj maa'b! mq paag meib Bua maiq tu'q cvj lovg meib Bua fovg hxg Eei ka'naaiq fai miub favj pun yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj maaib wij.’
20.47: xij zu'g kxvq Buaj naamb puv Eei Dyavb lomg, ‘xij zu'g mwavj zyruq Eei waag. zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia xij yem meib ka'Euad tyemq zia'g trud, zyrug puaq Qwi yem meib Bu'Dovj Eei tiub tiub Dyavb Eyemd Zauj tiub tiub Dyavb Gaai. zia'g Jyenq Yaavj haig Eei trud yaag maiq nxig tu'q taig. yem naamb puv Tauj pa'q puv, taub taub Eei Myen xij zu'g trud puaq laaud.
