20.10: Navq naaig yia txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv cvj txb ninb Bua pia'g teib puvb Waav.
20.25: yia zyrug zx'q maiq penj Eei leib latg pun ninb Bua, se maiq haib pun myenb maaib mcvg zyavb Eei leid.
20.22: mq paag yia weig yia Eei mevb Lwrtq puad, maiq Navq naaig zruj. yia maiq xij pun yia Eei mevb yem tovb txb ninb Bua Zwrtq i-yipq teib puv uaq teij kua'q Eei myenb Eei Ra'Myen, zu'g maaib wij.
20.42: yia txb meib Bua pia'g i-saa-laa-en teib puv, se yia hruq pun meib Eei ovb Taaij Eei teib puv uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
20.15: yia cvj yem teib puvb Waav Zauj ninb Bua hruq waag kxvq, yia maiq txb ninb Bua pia'g yia Zeij pun ninb Bua uaq nxm Daub Truq lovj Eei teib puv, se peiq maang kua'q, kaub Rweig Jiaj Eei kua'q,
20.29: yia kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, meib Bua mivb uaq teij Lav Eei txvj se haiq Euvg?”+’+” (uaq teij Lav Eei txvj heug Baa-maa Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.)
20.30: “weig naaiq meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “meib Bua xij Navq meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij pun kanb maaib wij zyrug mivb txvg Jauq paaij ninb Bua kamb Riaq haig Eei miub favj fai?

5.3: meib yaag xij zu'g zx'q i ziaj tiub naaiq teij Ba'pyei Eatq Jyenq lwib Jua'q.
5.8: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia, se yia kanb, xij Zauj meib txib tekg. yia xij txv Jyenq maang kua'q myenb yem meib Bu'Dovj pun meib zu'g tivg zwid.
5.9: laaij meib zruj Eei yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig, yia xij yem meib Bu'Dovj zruj pun meib Navq yia maiq zruj Jiaj. yia yetg liud yaag maiq cvj Navq naaiq nx zruj.
5.7: “laaij naaiq, zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, meib zruj lung kaub Zamq weib kxmj meib uaq teij kua'q. meib maiq ei yia Eei leid yaag maiq kan yia Eei leib latg, Kuvj ei Jyenq weib kxmj uaq teij kua'q Eei leid zruj Navq.
5.5: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. ‘naaiq se ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. yia lyepg naaiq nxm zivb yem maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj yaag maaib ziaj nxm kua'q weib kxmj.
5.16: uaq zang yia xij pun meib zu'g vxg Naavj, zu'g myetg, Navq pwrnq fxvb Zav mivb myetg meib Bua nx. yia xij pun meib Bua kunq zruj kunq vxg Tauj meib Bua Kauj Eei laavb zi'g tavj Revg.
5.17: yia xij pun meib Bua vxg, pun Yiab zxib taaib hxig meib Bua. myetg meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq. meib Bua xij zu'g wrnb pcvg, zu'g taij taig, Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig. yia xij pun meib Bua zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. naaiq se yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q.’+”
5.14: “+‘maiq taan Bua'g naaiq. yia xij pun meib zu'g paaig Waav, pun Wiv kxmj Eei kua'q Eei myenb Zauj Jiaj Jauq Eei myenb mavg Piaj.
5.4: yem naaiq teij Ba'pyei ka'Euad cvj zx'q i ziaj tiub zxi pia'g trud puaq. yem naaig maaib trud xij Zwrtq taaib mivb kxmj i-saa-laa-en Eei yetg zuvq zeib fun.
5.2: zuaq weib kxmj zivb Eei Nxib Eia'g pwavq, meib xij zu'g zx'q Ba'pyei Zauj syaam pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yem zivb Bu'Dovj lovg trud puaq. zx'q pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yem zivb ka'Eiag lovg Ru'g Daauq Va'q Ba'pyei Wiv kxmj zivb. cvj zx'q pua kruq Eei yetg kruq faatq pun Ryaauj pwrng Raanj mivb. yia zyrug pcv Ru'g Daauq zung Jyenq mivb.
5.6: mq paag ye-lu-saa-lem vcvg yia Eei leid kaub Zamq Jiaj kanb kua'q myenb. ninb yaag vcvg yia Eei leib latg kaub Zamq weib kxmj Eei kua'q, weig zu'g ninb Gemb yia Eei leid yaag maiq kan yia Eei leib latg.’
5.13: “+‘Navq naaig yia Eei ka'Qiaj zyrug fiu. yia Qiaj Jiad, nrud Eei Jauq yia zruj pun ninb Bua Tauj taaub, Tauj yia Hruq Gaai a'q. yia Eei ka'Qiaj zruj pun ninb Bua Tauj fiu mivb, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, kxvq liud Eei waag se weig zu'g yia Rcv Jyenq ninb Bua.
5.12: meib Eei pc'g fivj pua kruq Eei yetg kruq xij zu'g wrnb pcvg taig yaag yem meib Bu'Dovj zu'g vxg Naavj taig. pua kruq Eei yetg kruq xij yem meib weib kxmj Eei txvj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig. pua kruq Eei yetg kruq yia xij pun faatq Raanj mivb Tauj luvb Diaq nxmb nxm txvj. yia yaag xij pcv Zwrtq yia Eei Ru'g Daauq zung ninb Bua.
5.15: yia Qiaj Jiad nrud Jyenq tivg meib Eei zwid Niaq Eei zyavb hog, meib zyrug zu'g Wiv kxmj Eei kua'q Eei myenb mavg Piaj, Wrtq meib, yaag tonq zu'g ninb Bua, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj. naaiq se yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q.
5.11: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia zyavq Jyenq yia kanb Eei mcvg hruq waag, weig zu'g meib lovg yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei ka'naaiq Zauj yetg zuvq yruj haig Eei sig pun yia Eei sivj ting maaib wij, yia xij pun meib Eei myenb sruj zo'g Revg. yia Eei mziv zuvq maiq Kxb fi'q meib. yia yaag maiq Kxb lyenb meib.
5.1: zyruq kxvq, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g zx'q zuv Ru'g Daauq laig Eei. xij zu'g lovg Navq Japq Ba'pyei zavg Eei Teib to Teij meib Eei Ba'pyei Zauj syaam. lovg Tinb pcvb tavq Ryav Ba'pyei Zauj syaam pun Gxi.
5.10: yem meib Bu'Dovj tiaj maag xij Eang kanb Eei txnb Jweiq, txnb Jweiq yaag xij Eang kanb Eei tiaj maag. yia xij tivg meib Eei zwid. haiq taub yem meib Bu'Dovj tu'q mcvg Zwrtq, yia xij pun faatq Raanj mivb pyei puv.’

19.3: ninb txb taub txn Lo taaib, penj taub syenb lunj. ninb ho'g zx'q ka'naaiq Eang, yaag Eang myenb.
19.8: ziaj kua'q myenb, se weib kxmj Eei scvq, taaib Zauj ninb pxvd. ninb Bua zx'q muvd zaauj Jyenq ninb. ninb zu'g zx'q yem ninb Bua zcv Eei Kwrtq ka'Euad.
19.9: ninb Bua lovg tomb tiuj Tx ninb pia'g lovb ka'Euad, txb ninb mivb Tauj Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb. ninb Bua zx'q ninb wrnj Jyenq nxm wrnq Eei txvj, weig pun yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov, maiq tu'q cvj haid ninb Eei Qiaj.
19.7: ninb myetg ninb Bua wrnq Eei txvj, paaig waaig ninb Bua Eei zivb. haid ninb Funb Eei Qiaj Bwi, zyavb nxm teib puv Zauj teib puv ka'Euad Eei myenb kamb Riaj haig.
19.5: “+‘syenb maa zuaq kau, maiq lamb Namq a'q. ninb cvj zx'q taub ninb Eei txn, txb Lo taaib penj taub syenb lunj.
19.14: trud yem Meib maag Zwrtq, lyemb Gwaab lyemb pyruq puaq Qwi Revg, maiq zevg yetg tiub vcvg Eei Gwaab, haib zruj tu'q huvb Eei pyaaq.’ naaiq se naang zivb Ruv, yaag lovg penj naang zivb Ruv.”
19.4: maang kua'q haid kxvq Tauj ninb zyrug yem ninb Bua zcv Eei Kwrtq zx'q ninb. ninb Bua lovg tomb tiuj Kwavj Jyenq, txb ninb Tauj i-yipq.
19.2: xij zu'g kxvq, “+‘meib Eei maa se Navq yem syenb Bu'Dovj kaub henq Jiaj Eei syenb Eeid. ninb pweij Jyenq syenb lunj Bu'Dovj txb ninb Eei txn.
19.6: ninb yem syenb Bu'Dovj mivb mivb taaib taaib, penj syenb lunj. ninb ho'g zx'q ka'naaiq Eang, yaag Eang myenb.
19.13: ib zang uaq tiub Mei zu'g pcv Zwrtq zwavj teib puvb Waav, se teib puvb haand, maiq maaib uam Eei txvj.
19.12: mq paag yia Qiaj Jiad! pcv naaiq tiub a'vung Mei Zwrtq zxi kwavg ka'Diaq Dau. tov puv Eei Ryaauj pwrng ninb Eauj mivb. ninb Eei pyruq zu'g Lutq Revg. vcvg Eei Gwaab yaag Eauj mig a'q, zu'g trud puaq Qwi Revg.
19.11: ninb Zwrtq Eei Gwaab vcvg Eei, henq Eei, Pwij tu'q zruj huvb Eei pyaaq. yem hod Eei, Yaavj Eei Gwaab Bu'Dovj ninb pctq Zwrtq Lav. haiq taub yaag pwatg ninb Zwrtq faauj Lav, Gwaab yaag zyavb tu'q Yaavj.
19.1: “meib xij zu'g weig i-saa-laa-en Eei huvb paauj tiub naang zivb Ruv.
19.10: “+‘meib Eei maa zinb Daavg Navq zuvb a'vung Mei yem a'vung Wivj, zx'q taaib zwavj uaq Do'g Len, zyavb pyruq kitq, Gwaab yaag Yaavj, weig zu'g maaib uam Zamq.

38.18: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, kokg taaib Bx'q i-saa-laa-en myenb uaq Nxi, yia Eei ka'Qiaj xij pctq Zwrtq.
38.8: Jiaj liud Zamb Nxi meib zyrug zu'g tiug Rxib. cvj Ga'haaq ziaj Havj meib xij zu'g pia'g mivb Bx'q nxm teib puv, se Bx'q liud Jaaj cvj Zeij Jiad taaib Eei teib puv. uaq nxm teib puv Eei pc'g fivj yem ziaj kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj kapq zunq taaib yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov, tovb kwavg Waav laub Eei Bov. uaq teij pc'g fivj yem ziaj kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj Zwrtq taaib, ib zang ninb Bua yetg zuvq pcvb xn Eei yem.
38.3: xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “me-sekq Zauj Tu-Ban Eei tomb pyeiq zeiq, kokg aa'b! yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq.
38.21: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia xij lovg Euvb Euvg ze'g naang hc'q kokg kamb Riaj. taub taub zuvq xij lovg Ru'g Daauq hxig kanb Eei kxb yrud.
38.14: “paamb myenb aa'b! weig naaiq meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq Buaj kokg, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “Tauj uaq Nxi, yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, pcvb xn Eei yem uaq zang, meib xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb.
38.23: yia zyrug Navq naaiq zruj weig pun Ziv yia Lo haig, Zivb Revg haig, yaag xij txv Jyenq Zamb kua'q myenb Eei mziv pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia. uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
38.6: maaib ko-maa Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv Zauj yem pa'q puv ko Jiaj Eei txvj, Betg-To-kaan-maa, Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv. maaib ziaj kua'q myenb Zamq Eei Zauj meib yem.
38.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! xij zu'g Win Myen mivb maa-kokg teig, me-sekq Zauj Tu-Ban Eei tomb pyeiq zeiq, kokg uaq, trug waag kxvq ninb.
38.20: Kxiq ka'Euad Eei Byaud, Daamb luvb Eei nx'g, lomb Waav Eei scvb Kuq Yiab zxib, Zauj yetg zuvq Exv Dau Eei ka'naaiq, Zauj yem luvb Diaq Daub peib Eei zwavj myenb, xij yem yia Eei Ra'Myen sin zinj. Bov xij Baav, Bcvj yaag xij huq mwrng Revg, Pevb Pev zivb laatg yaag xij Baav Fiag Tauj Dau.’
38.7: “+‘+“meib cvj Zauj meib yem Eei yetg zuvq pcvb kwanb xij zu'g Beng Rxib, liug leid zyavj. meib kanb yaag xij zu'g zruj ninb Bua Eei pyeiq zeiq.
38.19: yia hang haig, Qiaj Jiad haig Navq Fopg trud nx, zyrug kxvq uaq Nxi yem i-saa-laa-en teib puv Eei Dau xij tovd tu'q seij haig.
38.17: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “yia lob Nxi lovg yia Eei pru, i-saa-laa-en Eei trug waag myenb, kxvq uaq taub se meib maiq zeid? uaq zang ninb Bua trug waag Zamb Havj kxvq yia xij txb meib taaib Bx'q ninb Bua.”
38.11: meib kxvq, ‘yia xij pia'g nxm maiq maaib zivb laatg weib Jyenq laavd Eei teib puv. yia xij Bx'q Ria'g Rivd, pcvb xn yem Eei pc'g fivj. yetg zuvq maiq maaib zivb laatg, maiq maaib kcvb, maiq maaib kcvb sxn.
38.5: pe-sia myenb, Kutq myenb Zauj Putq myenb yaag Zauj ninb Bua taaib. taub taub nanq Jyenq Txvb paaib. mGxvq yaag Dovj Jyenq Lia'g muag.
38.9: meib Zauj meib Eei zwavj Junb pcv cvj Zauj meib mivb Eei ziaj kua'q myenb xij Zwrtq mivb Navq tomb Ryaaub Jia'q. meib Bua zyrug Navq Bwrnj om Jyenq Daub peib.”
38.16: meib xij taaib Bx'q yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Navq Bwrnj om Daub peib nx. o kokg aa'b! Ga'haaq Eei Nxib Eia'g yia xij txb meib taaib Bx'q yia Eei teib puv, zyrug txv Jyenq maang kua'q myenb lovg meib, kokg, piuj mevb yia Zivb Revg weig pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia.”
38.4: yia xij zx'q meib kwinb Rwrnj, cvj lovg tomb tiuj Kwavj Jyenq meib Eei haab paab, txb meib Zauj meib Eei zwavj Junb pcv Zwrtq taaib. se meib Eei maad, meib Eei keb maad pcv, yetg zuvq pwij Rxib Bx'q Jaaj Eei ua'g king, penj tomb kwanb pcv txb Jyenq tomb Txvb paaib, fiub Txvb paaib, taub taub nanq Jyenq Ru'g Daauq.
38.10: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “Tauj uaq Nxi meib Eei Hruq xij Namq Zwrtq ziaj Euvg. meib zyrug taaq x'q Eei za'eij.
38.22: yia xij lovg tomb wrnb pcvg Zauj taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig tivg ninb Eei zwid. yia xij pun twib tomb Byuvg Zauj px'g Zauj trud Zauj zia'g Jyenq trud Eei huvb Fiag ninb kanb Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv cvj Zauj ninb kapq txig Eei ziaj kua'q myenb.
38.12: yia xij Zaavq, xij luq ka'naaiq, cvj mivb Rcv tovb zinb Daavg kwavg Waav, ib zang maaib myenb yem Eei txvj. ninb Bua yem ziaj kua'q kapq zunq taaib Eei myenb, se ninb Bua tu'q scvb Kuq Zauj ka'naaiq Zamq yaag yem paamb ken Eei Bu'Dovb fim.’
38.15: meib xij yem kanb Eei teib puv, se yem pa'q puv ko Jiaj Eei txvj taaib, yaag maaib ziaj kua'q myenb Zauj Jyenq meib taaib. yetg zuvq keb Jyenq maad, penj yetg tomb kwanb Junb pcv, maaib Qa'q henq Eei pcvb kwanb.
38.13: Qe-Baa Zauj De-Daan Zauj Taan-sitq Eei scvb eij myenb Zauj ninb Eei yetg zuvq laavd Eei myenb xij naaig meib, ‘meib taaib weig luq ka'naaiq fai? meib pun meib Eei Junb pcv kwanb kapq zunq taaib weig Zaavq ka'naaiq xij pyenb Jyem Eaanb, pyenb scvb Kuq Zauj ka'naaiq mivb yaag xij Zaavq ka'naaiq mivb Zamq Eei fai?”+’
38.1: yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

31.18: “+‘yem e-Den Wivj maaib haiq tiub Dyavj Dovg meib Lo, maaib Favb laavg? ib zang meib xij Zauj e-Den Eei yetg zuvq Dyavj zu'g Fiag Tauj yemb ken, yem maiq Jiaj kaatq Eei leid Eei myenb Bu'Dovj, se Zauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij taig uaq teij yetg Fiag pweij. “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, naaiq se faa-lo huvb Zauj ninb Eei myenb maanb.’+”
31.3: mavg maa'b! meib se Navq le-Baa-nxn Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj, maaib Gwaab Rweig Ria Jyenq lomg. za'kevb Lav haig, Dyavb tweiq Zunj pia'g kub vwaaig Eei Bwrnj.
31.8: Tinb huvb Eei Wivj ka'Euad Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj saaij maiq hivb ninb. zovb Dyavj Eei Gwaab yaag maiq Dovg uaq tiub Dyavj Eei. Pa'len Dyavj yaag peiq maiq Tauj ninb Eei Gwaab. yem Tinb huvb Eei Wivj ka'Euad Eei Dyavj maiq maaib yetg tiub Dovg ninb Rweig.
31.9: yia pun ninb Rweig, maaib Dyavb Gwaab Zamq. yem Tinb huvb Eei e-Den Wivj ka'Euad Eei yetg zuvq Dyavj mweig Jia'q ninb.
31.7: za'kevb penj Rweig haig Eei tomb Dyavj, Gwaab yaag Zwrtq taaib Daauq, weig zu'g ninb Eei Ruvb Fiag Do pia'g Tauj uam Zamq Eei txvj.
31.5: Navq naaig ninb kaub Lav Jiaj yetg zuvq lomg Eei Dyavj, Dyavb Gwaab yrug Yaavj yrug Daauq, weig zu'g ninb tu'q uam Zamq.
31.16: yia zx'q ninb zxi Fiag yemb ken, se Zauj myenb Fiag Daub Diaq Eei Kwrtq uaq zang, yia pun maang kua'q myenb haid ninb Dxtq Eei Qiaj Bwi, zyrug sin zinj Eanb Eanb Eei. uaq zang yem e-Den Wivj Eei yetg zuvq Dyavj, se kinq Zwrtq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei Dyavj Zauj yem le-Baa-nxn kaub lovj, kaub Rweig Eei Dyavj, tovb yetg zuvq tu'q uam kauj yuvd Eei Dyavj, zyrug yem Daub Diaq tu'q xn Hruq.
31.17: ninb Bua yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Fiag yemb ken, Tauj zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij Eei myenb. yem maang kua'q Kauj ninb uaq teij yaag Zauj ninb zu'g myetg.
31.14: Navq naaig se weig pun yem uamb Len Eei haiq tiub Dyavj maiq haib Dovg uaq tiub Lo Lav, maaib Dyavb tweiq Zunj pia'g kub vwaaig Eei Bwrnj. maiq kunq tu'q uam kauj yuvd Eei Dyavj, maiq maaib yetg tiub Dovg ninb Lav, weig zu'g yetg zuvq xij zu'g taig mivb Zauj Jyenq paamb myenb yem yemb ken, se Zauj taig mivb Eei myenb yem uaq nxm Kwrtq.”
31.4: maaib uam Zamq Tevj ninb haib Lo, Daub Diaq Do Eei uam pun ninb Lav Jyenq faauj, maaib Do'q lyrug Wiv kxmj zwavj Eei txvj, Do'q Eei Zaaj pun uam mivb Tauj lomg Eei yetg zuvq Dyavj.
31.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g kxvq Buaj i-yipq Eei huvb, faa-lo, Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb, “+‘meib Dovg naaig Lo, yia haib zx'q haiq Euvg peiq tu'q meib?
31.6: Daamb luvb Eei yetg zuvq nx'g taaib fruj laud yem ninb Eei Gwaab. lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq Yiab zxib yem ninb Eei Gwaab ka'Diaq Fiag txn. yetg zuvq zruj Lo Eei kua'q Eei pc'g fivj yaag yem ninb ka'Diaq pivj laavb.
31.13: Daamb luvb Eei nx'g xij Ropg Jyenq nauq Fiag Eei Dyavj. lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq Yiab zxib yaag xij yem ninb Eei Gwaab kub vwaaig.
31.12: kanb fivj myenb, se kaub Zyruq Jiaj Eei myenb, xij kxij ninb nauq, kwavg Jyenq uaq. ninb Eei Gwaab zyrug Dxtq Fiag Bov kub vwaaig Zauj yetg zuvq hxvd ka'Euad. ninb Eei Gwaab yaag nauq Dxtq Fiag teib puv Eei tiub tiub Do'g Len. luvb Diaq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug yem ninb Eei pivj laavb txvj Zwrtq mivb, kwavg ninb yem uaq a'q.
31.15: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq, “Tauj uaq tiub tomb Dyavj zu'g Fiag yemb ken uaq zang, yia xij pun uaq teij Daub Diaq Do Eei uam weig ninb Raub. yia yaag xij tavq Jyenq ninb Eei Daaib, yaag pun uam Zamq Eei tivb. laaij uaq tiub Dyavj taig, yia xij pun Mwavj om Jyenq le-Baa-nxn Bov, yaag pun yem lomg Eei yetg zuvq Dyavj weig ninb mwavq Revg.
31.11: yia zyrug Jiu ninb pun maang kua'q ka'Euad Eei yetg taub henq Eei myenb. naaiq taub Dovg haaij zuvq xij ziuj ninb zruj Eei x'q sig winb pun ninb. yia zung ninb Zwrtq mig a'q.
31.1: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb zyepg yetq Havj faab Laaj scvb yetq uaq Nxi, yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
31.10: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “weig zu'g ninb Lav haig, Dyavb tweiq yem Bwrnj ka'Euad. weig ninb Lav, ninb Eei Hruq yaag mauj.

27.18: “+‘+“Daa-matq-katg myenb Zauj meib zruj scvb eij, weig zu'g meib maaib maaid maaig Eei ka'naaiq Zamq, Euvb Euvg maaib Rxib. ninb Bua lovg hen-Bon taaib Eei a'vung tiuq Zauj pa'ki yuvb pc'g Eei pyei yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.8: sai-Dxn Zauj aan-watq myenb zruj meib Eei Rcv Ravq myenb. o Tai-la'q aag, meib Eei zavg myenb yem meib Eei Ravq zruj meib Eei Ravb Jyen.
27.33: meib yem Kxiq kan Ravq fuvj Zwrtq maaid maaig Eei ka'naaiq. meib pun ziaj kua'q myenb pwavq Hruq. meib Eei zinb zxib Zauj huaj Zamq haig pun luvb Diaq Eei huvb tiaj putq zxib.
27.3: Tai-la'q yem pia'g Kxiq Eei txvj yaag maaid maaig pun yem Zamb nxm Kxib Len Eei ziaj fivj myenb. xij zu'g kxvq Buaj Tai-la'q, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“o Tai-la'q aag, meib Zev kanb kxvq, ‘yia Rweig Tauj taaub a'q.’
27.32: ninb Bua Raub Eyemq meib Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua weig meib paauj tiub naang zivb Ruv kxvq, ‘maaib haiq taub Navq Tai-la'q yem Kxiq ka'Euad zu'g myetg?’
27.21: “+‘+“aa-laa-Bia myenb Zauj Ke-Daa Eei yetg zuvq zruj Lo Eei myenb, zanb zang Zauj meib zruj scvb eij. ninb Bua lovg pa'ki yuvb txn, pa'ki yuvb kruq Zauj yuvb yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.35: yem Kxib Len Eei zwavj myenb weig meib kamb Riaj haig. ninb Bua Eei huvb tiaj kamb Riaj kau, Myen zuvq Byeng Revg.
27.14: “+‘+“Betg-To-kaan-maa myenb lovg maad Zauj Bx'q Jaaj Eei maad Zauj lxb yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.23: “+‘+“haa-laan myenb, Kaan-ne Zauj e-Den myenb, Qe-Baa Eei scvb eij myenb, atg-su Zauj Kin-maatq myenb Zauj meib maaid maaig.
27.6: ninb Bua lovg Baa-saan Eei tomb Ba'ov zwei Dyavj zruj meib Eei Ravb zeib. ninb Bua lovg sai-patg Kxib Rrub Len Eei zovb Dyavj tiu taaib, cvj zx'q zaavb Eaab fapq Jyenq zruj meib Eei Ravb Paavb.
27.34: ib zang meib yem Kxiq Do Eei txvj zu'g Kxiq Bx'q huq Revg. meib Eei huaj Zauj yem Ravq Eei yetg zuvq myenb Zauj Jyenq meib zemb Fiag Kxiq.
27.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g weig Tai-la'q paauj tiub naang zivb Ruv.
27.36: nxmb nxm kua'q Eei scvb eij myenb Zwrtq Qiaj pun Ziv a'Neiq meib pwavb zu'g Kruq. meib Eei setq mweid kamb Riaj! haig, yetg liud maiq maaib meib a'q.”+’+”
27.20: “+‘+“De-Daan myenb lovg timg maab keb xn Eei swavj yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.24: naaiq teij txvj Eei myenb lovg kaub lovj, kaub Rweig Jiaj Eei lwib hruj, lovg Diab Buaq Zauj Zovj Jyenq pyavb Eei lwib hruj, lovg ziaj Euvg setq zruj taaib timg pyauq Eei Dia, yaag lovg kitq taaib zyetg Eei Laav Zauj meib maaid maaig.
27.28: Ravb Jyen heug Zwrtq Fruj mcvg Eei Qiaj, yem uaq Byenj zuvq Dang tovd.
27.7: meib Eei Diab Bwavb lovg i-yipq taaib Eei la'maab Diab mwrng Zovj Jyenq pyavb, lovg txvj meib Eei keb. meib Bc'g kub vwaaig Eei Dia, se yem e-li-se-aa Kxib Len Eei Diab Buaq Diab lua'g zruj taaib.
27.29: ta'faanb Rcv Ravq myenb Zwrtq ninb Bua Eei Ravq. yem Kxiq Eei Ravb nrub Zauj yetg zuvq Ravb Jyen taaib sruq Jyenq uaq Byenj.
27.19: “+‘+“ninb Bua txb a'vung tiuq yem u-saan taaib yeng meib Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua lovg toj zyavj Eei Lia'q Zauj kaan-Bun Zauj zaab Gaan yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.17: “+‘+“yu-Daa myenb Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Zauj meib zruj scvb eij. ninb Bua lovg min-nitq Eei Byaub witq, ka'lanq pyruq, mweib txvb, ka'lanq yrub Zauj Diab Daav yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.31: weig meib ninb Bua Teij mGxvq Fav Revg, yaag zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab Zru. ninb Bua Hruq mun Jyenq puvb siv puvb Qiaj Eei Eyemq tu'q Kruq haig, Ba'Riu zuvq haib Baaij.
27.30: ninb Bua puvb siv puvb Qiaj Hruq mun Eei Raub Eyemq meib. ninb Bua haad niab Buv an ninb Bua Eei mGxvq, zuvq Favj uaq saaib Dwi.
27.27: meib Eei zinb zxib, meib Eei huaj, meib maaid maaig Eei ka'naaiq, meib Eei Ravb Jyen Ravb nrub, Ravq Eei Dyavb zavg, meib Eei scvb eij myenb Zauj yem meib ka'Euad Eei Bx'q Jaaj pcv Zauj yetg zuvq myenb, tovb meib zu'g Bx'q waaig uaq Nxi, yetg zuvq zyrug zemb Fiag Kxiq.
27.11: aan-watq myenb Zauj he-lekg myenb yem kxmj meib Eei zivb laatg kub vwaaig. kaa-matq myenb yaag yem meib Eei laaub. ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei Txvb paaib Kwavj Jyenq weib kxmj meib Eei zivb laatg. ninb Bua pun meib Rweig Tauj taaub.
27.5: ninb Bua lovg sej-ni Eei zovb Dyavj zruj meib Eei yetg zuvq Dyavb penq. ninb Bua lovg tiub le-Baa-nxn Eei sij-Daa zovb Dyavj zruj meib Eei Zxv Diab Bwavb Eei Dyrub.
27.9: ke-Baan Eei myenb koj Zauj maaib puab taub Eei zavg myenb yem meib ka'Euad Biaq meib Eei Ravb kapq Eei txvj. Kxiq Eei yetg zuvq Ravq Zauj ninb Bua Eei Ravb nrub taaib yem meib Eei ka'Len Zauj meib zruj scvb eij yeng huaj.
27.16: “+‘+“si-lia myenb mivb mivb taaib taaib Zauj meib maaid maaig, weig zu'g meib maaib huaj Zamq. ninb Bua lovg Dyemb mcv, Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij Zauj Diab lua'g, lovg Zovj Jyenq pyavb Eei Dia, la'maab Diab mwrng, yem Kxiq Jaaij Eei la'pyeiq Zauj si'q Eei la'pyeib Jaaij yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.4: meib Eei kapg Jaaij yem Kxiq Bu'Dovj. Zeij meib taaib uaq teij pun meib Rweig Tauj taaub a'q.
27.10: “+‘+“pe-sia myenb, lu-De myenb, Zauj Putq myenb yem meib Eei Junb pcv kwanb zruj meib Eei Bx'q Jaaj pcv. ninb Bua zx'q ninb Bua Eei Txvb paaib Zauj Lia'g muag Kwavj Jyenq meib Eei zivb laatg, ninb Bua pun meib tu'q Favb laavg.
27.22: “+‘+“Qe-Baa myenb Zauj laa-aa-maa myenb Zauj meib zruj scvb eij. ninb Bua lovg yetg zuvq kaub lovj Jiaj Eei laapg liug, Euvb Euvg la'pyeib Jaaij Zauj Jyem yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.12: “+‘+“Taan-sitq myenb taaib Zauj meib maaid maaig weig zu'g meib maaib Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq Zamq. ninb Bua lovg Eaanb, Lia'q, yavb Tiag Zauj Juvd Tevj meib yeng huaj.
27.15: “+‘+“De-Daan myenb Zauj meib maaid maaig. Kxib Len Eei txvj Zamq Eei penj meib maaid maaig Eei hei. ninb Bua txb zaavb Eaab Zauj vcvg Eei Dyavb Jia'q yeng huaj.
27.13: “+‘+“yaa-waan myenb, Tu-Ban myenb Zauj me-sekq myenb Zauj meib Tiuq ka'naaiq. ninb Bua zx'q myenb Zauj tovb si'q Jaab sig yeng meib Eei huaj.
27.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
27.26: Rcv Ravq Eei myenb txb meib mivb Kxiq Do Eei txvj. tov puv Eei Ryaauj yem Kxiq ka'Euad pun meib huq Revg.
27.25: “+‘+“Taan-sitq Eei Ravq Tevj meib Tx meib Eei huaj. Navq naaig meib yem Kxiq ka'Euad Tx ka'naaiq Niaq, zuvq pwavq Ravq.

41.18: Navq Ke-lu-Bim Zauj taaub Dyavj Eei favj. i taub Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj maaib zuvb taaub Dyavj. taub taub Ke-lu-Bim maaib i nxm Myen.
41.8: yia yaag pwatg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Wiv kxmj Eei txvj tinb faauj. weib kxmj uaq teij Qovj Eei kxnb Do'q Lav Dovg yetg tiub Dx'g Eei pyaaq, se Ju'q Dx'g.
41.3: ninb cvj pia'g ka'Euad uaq Qovj. pia'g Eei Jauq i puv ka'Len Eei Dyrub Javq i Dx'g. pia'g Eei Jauq Javq Ju'q Dx'g. Jauq pia'g Eei i puv ka'Len Eei Fovg Javq siag Dx'g.
41.21: pia'g tomb Tiv uaq taub kcvb Eei kcvb zrug feib puv fib Fyetq Eei. yem kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj Ra'Myen mcvj maaib Euvg ka'naaiq
41.14: zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq tov puv mcvj, lyemb pyauq lyemb laatg ka'Euad Eei Kuvb txvj, Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g.
41.23: tomb Tiv Zauj kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj Eei kcvb, yetg Kav maaib yetg txij.
41.6: naaiq teij Qovj maaib pua Ravb. yetg Ravb lapq yetg Ravb. Ravb Ravb maaib faab zyepg Qovj. zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Fovg maaib teij pctq Zwrtq Eei txvj weig sevb ka'Eiag uaq teij Qovj, pun naaiq teij Zapq Zwrtq Eei txvj maiq zu'g pavg zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Fovg.
41.2: pia'g tomb Tiv Eei Jauq Javq zyepg Dx'g. i puv ka'Len pyaa Dx'g. ninb yaag Dx'g tomb Tiv ka'Euad Daauq feij zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Dx'g.
41.20: yem ka'Diaq Dau Tauj kcvb kub vwaaig maaib Ke-lu-Bim Zauj taaub Dyavj tiu Jyenq Fovg.
41.24: yetg taub kcvb maaib i Kwaaiq. yetg Kwaaiq Ripq Jyenq haib Kxi mivb Kxi taaib.
41.7: weib kxmj ka'Len naaiq teij Qovj yetg Ravb Javq teij, yetg Ravb Javq teij. yetg Ravb pavg yetg Ravb faauj. naaiq teij Qovj yetg zei Lav yetg zei Javq. yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Len maaib Tei. Navq naaig, haiq taub yem ka'Diaq uaq Ravb xij faauj kub vwaaig uaq Ravb xij zu'g kan naaiq teij Tei yavb Bu'Dovj uaq Ravb faauj.
41.19: myenb Eei Myen Win mivb uaq puv taaub Dyavj. syenb lunj Eei Myen Win naaiq puv taaub Dyavj. zyavb nxm pyauq ka'Euad maaib naaiq teij favj tiu kxmj.
41.17: lyemb kcvb kub vwaaig Kuvj Eei txvj, maiq kunq yem ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj fai ka'Eiag uaq Qovj, yem ka'Euad Jiaj uaq Qovj Zauj tomb Tiv weib kxmj Eei Fovg maaib tiu taaib Eei favj,
41.11: Zapq Zwrtq ka'Len uaq teij Qovb Qovj Eei kcvb Win mivb tinb taaib zevg Fiag Eei Dau. maaib yetg taub kcvb Win mivb pa'q puv, maaib yetg taub Win mivb naamb puv. weib kxmj zevg Fiag Eei Dau maaib pyaa Dx'g Javq.
41.5: ninb cvj Dx'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Fovg, hod Ju'q Dx'g. Zapq Wiv kxmj ka'Eiag uaq teij Qovb Qovj Javq pyei Dx'g.
41.9: uaq teij Qovj ka'Eiag mcvj Eei Fovg hod pyaa Dx'g. tinb taaib zevg Fiag Eei Dau Zxg maaib pyaa Dx'g. yem naaiq teij Zapq Zwrtq Eei txvj
41.16: maaib Dyavb penq nctq Jyenq Fovg. pua Qovj zuvq maaib fov mwrnb weib kxmj yaag maaib fov mwrnb Eei Qxv Do Eei. txij Jyenq kcvb Daavg maaib Dyavb penq nctq Jyenq yem ka'Diaq Dau Tauj fov mwrnb. naaiq teij fov mwrnb maaib ka'naaiq Bc'g Jyenq.
41.4: ninb cvj Dx'g naaiq Qovj Daauq Eig zyepg Dx'g, Javq Eig zyepg Dx'g. naaiq Qovj yem tomb Tiv Eei uaq Daavg mcvj. ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “naaiq se kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj uaq Qovj.”
41.10: mivb Tauj sai myenb uaq teij pyauq Bu'Dovj Kuvj Eei txvj maaib Eig zyepg Dx'g Javq weib kxmj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq.
41.22: Navq lovg Dyavj zruj taaib Eei ziab txvb. se pua Dx'g Lav, i Dx'g Daauq, i Dx'g Javq. naaiq nxm ka'naaiq Eei kx'q Zauj sevb Eei ka'naaiq, lyemb weib kxmj tiab Eei ka'naaiq lovg Dyavj zruj. uaq laanb myenb Buaj yia, “naaiq se yem zyruq Eei Ra'Myen Eei tiab.”
41.12: maaib nxm pyauq Win mivb zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq fai puv mcvj uaq teij Kuvb txvj. uaq nxm pyauq Javq Zyetq zyepg Dx'g, Daauq Juaq zyepg Dx'g. weib kxmj Eei Fovg hod pyaa Dx'g.
41.15: ninb cvj Dx'g yem fai puv Win zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Ga'haaq Gaav uaq nxm pyauq, lyemb i puv ka'Len Eei Fovg, maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g Daauq. zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj Zapq Zwrtq pyauq ka'Eiag Ra'Myen mcvj Eei txvj, ka'Euad Eei tomb Tiv Zauj kaub Zivb Revg Jiaj Eei txvj
41.13: uaq laanb myenb cvj Dx'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g Daauq. zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Zauj Ga'haaq mcvj Eei Kuvb txvj Zauj pyauq cvj Zauj uaq nxm pyauq Eei Fovg maaib yetg pc'q Dx'g Daauq.
41.1: uaq laanb myenb cvj txb yia pia'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, tomb Tiv uaq. ninb zyrug Dx'g Dyrub. puvb puv Javq Ju'q Dx'g.
41.26: naaiq Qovj i puv maaib fov mwrnb, fov mwrnb Eei Qxv Do Eei. i puv Fovg ka'Len tiu Jyenq taaub Dyavj.
41.25: pia'g tomb Tiv Eei kcvb tiu Jyenq Ke-lu-Bim Zauj taaub Dyavj Navq tiu Jyenq Fovg uaq nx. Zapq Zwrtq Ra'Myen mcvj uaq Qovj ka'Eiag maaib Dyavj Bc'g Jyenq kub vwaaig.

1.18: Ziab yenb Eei Kwiv Lav haig, Bua'g hxvb haig. naaiq teij Kwiv yaag maaib mziv pwavq Revg.
1.8: yem ninb Bua Eei pyei puv, pyei Kwaaiq Daatq ka'Diaq mcvj maaib myenb Eei puad. naaiq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei Myen Zauj Daatq se Navq naaiq.
1.3: yem Baa-Bi-lon myenb Eei teib puv, Ke-Baa Daaib Len, Bu-si Eei txn, e-sej-Ken sai myenb, tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag. yem uaq zyruq Eei Qa'q Fiag taaib yem ninb.
1.21: uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq mivb, naaiq teij yenb yaag mivb. uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq tivb, naaiq teij yenb yaag Zauj Jyenq tivb. uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq yem Dau faauj, yenb yaag Zauj Jyenq faauj, weig zu'g navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei mcvg yem uaq teij yenb ka'Euad.
1.14: naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Fapg Jiaj naaiq, Fapg Jiaj uaq Navq Ba'livg nx.
1.23: yem naaiq nxm luvb ka'Diaq, naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei Daatq yav Jyenq za'g Eei, yetg taub Zauj yetg taub Eei Daatq txij Jyenq Jaaj. taub taub yaag maaib i Kwaaiq Daatq pwav Jyenq sin.
1.6: mq paag taub taub maaib pyei nxm Myen, pyei Kwaaiq Daatq.
1.2: Tauj scvb Mmd uaq Nxi, se ye-ho-yaa-Kin huvb zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei ta'Mmd Havj uaq Havj,
1.20: Hruq xij mivb haaij, navb Eei ka'naaiq zyrug mivb uaq. yenb yaag kan Jyenq navb Eei ka'naaiq mivb, weig zu'g navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei mcvg yem uaq teij yenb ka'Euad.
1.24: mivb Eei zyavb hog yia haid Navq tomb uam Bwi, Navq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub Eei Qiaj Bwi, yaag Navq tomb pcvb kwanb Eei Qiaj. naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq tivb Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua puvj ninb Bua Eei Daatq Fiag.
1.28: weib kxmj ninb uaq teij Fav se Navq twib Byuvg Eei Nxi yem uaq Bwrnj hing Zwrtq Juv Eei mru zeiq. pwatg zyruq Eei Favb laavg Eei mru zeiq se Navq naaiq. yia pwatg uaq zang, yia Pua'q Fiag Dau yaag haid yetg taub kxvq waag Eei Qiaj.
1.7: ninb Bua Eei zauj za'g Eei. zaub penq Navq vovb txn Eei teib yaag cvq Zwrtq Fav Navq tovb si'q yrub yrug uaq.
1.19: uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq haiq zang mivb, naaiq teij yenb kan Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len mivb. naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq haiq zang yem Dau faauj, naaiq teij yenb yaag Zauj Jyenq faauj.
1.17: haiq zang mivb, pyei puv zuvq mivb tu'q Eei. maiq zu'g kwinb Rwrnj.
1.27: yia pwatg yem ninb Eei Jaaiq faauj mcvj Navq tovb si'q yrub yrug Eei, mru zeiq Navq trud weib kxmj sin. cvj pwatg yem ninb Eei Jaaiq ka'Diaq, mru zeiq Navq trud nx, yaag maaib Fav haig Eei Fav weib kxmj.
1.11: ninb Bua Eei Myen Navq uaq nx. ninb Bua Eei Daatq yav Zwrtq faauj kub vwaaig. taub taub maaib i Kwaaiq Daatq txij Jyenq Jaaj, maaib i Kwaaiq pwav Jyenq sin.
1.5: yem trud ka'Euad pwatg Navq pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua Eei mru zeiq se Navq naaiq. favj zeiq Navq myenb,
1.9: ninb Bua Eei Daatq yav Zwrtq Zamj Jyenq Jaaj. taub taub Daij huvj Jyenq uaq Daavg mivb. mivb Eei zyavb hog yaag maiq Win Rwrnj.
1.16: naaiq teij yenb Eei favj zeiq Zauj Euvg zeiq se Navq naaiq. nxmb nxm cvq Zwrtq Fapg Fapg Eei, Navq Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij. pyei nxm yenb yaag fib Navq Eei. nxmb nxm pwatg maaib kanb nxm yenb kuvb kavg fapq pia'g ka'Euad.
1.4: yia Zau Myen mavg, pwatg Ryaaub Jia'q yem pa'q puv pwrng taaib. maaib txq Bwrnj Lo Eei, maaib Fav haig Eei Fav weib kxmj, yaag maaib trud Zwrtq Jyenq Fapg Fapg Eei. yem trud ka'Euad pwatg Navq tovb si'q yrub yrug Eei cvq Zwrtq Fav.
1.10: naaiq teij pyei taub navb Eei ka'naaiq taub taub maaib pyei nxm Myen. pyei taub Eei Ra'Myen mcvj maaib Myen Navq myenb Eei Myen. taub taub Eei Byaaug puv Myen Navq syenb, zaaij puv Navq vovb Eei Myen, taub taub Eei Ga'haaq Gaav Eei Myen Navq tomb Jaavq Eei Myen.
1.22: yem uaq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig maaib Navq luvb Eei favj zeiq, yaag Navq Rav haig Eei kivj cvq Zwrtq Fav Fapg Fapg Eei, Zxv Jyenq yem ninb Bua Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig.
1.12: taub taub pcv za'g huvj Jyenq uaq Daavg mivb. ninb Bua Eei Hruq xij mivb haaij zyrug mivb uaq a'q, yaag maiq Win Rwrnj.
1.15: yia mavg Jyenq naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq uaq zang, pwatg taub navb Eei ka'naaiq ka'Len taub taub maaib nxm yenb yem uaq Dau, yetg taub yetg nxm.
1.13: yem naaiq teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Bu'Dovj pwatg Navq zia'g Jyenq trud Eei trub Taanj, yaag Navq trub paaq yem naaig teij navb Eei ka'naaiq Bu'Dovj mivb mivb taaib taaib. naaiq teij trud Fav haig yaag maaib Ba'livg yem trud Zwrtq Fapg Fapg Eei.
1.1: yem faab zyepg uaq Havj, feij Laaj scvb Mmd uaq Nxi, yia Zauj zu'g kwaatq mivb Eei myenb yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len uaq zang, luvb zyrug Gxi. yia tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb yem laaug yaavb Eei sig.
1.26: yem ninb Bua Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig Eei luvb kub vwaaig pwatg Navq nxm weig, lovg Banq Buaq, Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij zruj taaib. zweid Jyenq weig kub vwaaig maaib taub, favj zeiq Navq myenb nx.
1.25: cvj maaib Qiaj yem ninb Bua Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig Eei luvb. ninb Bua sruq Jyenq tivg Eei, ninb Bua yaag puvj Daatq Fiag.

39.18: meib Bua tu'q Eang henq haig Eei pcv Eei xq, hopq luvb Diaq Eei tomb pyeiq zeiq Eei Ryaamq, Navq ninb Bua penj pa'ki yuvb kruq Zauj pa'ki yuvb txn, yuvb Zauj vovb kruq. naaiq teij yetg zuvq penj Baa-saan Jung Eei scvb Kuq.
39.8: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “uaq nxm Nxi xij Tauj. Dovg haaij zuvq xij Zwrtq taaib. naaiq se yia kxvq Eei Nxi.”
39.3: yia xij Bx'q meib Eei zaaij Jia'q puad nanq Eei Jwavb zinj Dxtq yaag pun yem meib Eei Byaaug Jia'q puad Eei fxv Dxtq mivb.
39.21: “zyruq kxvq, ‘yia xij pun yia Eei Favb laavg hing Zwrtq yem maang kua'q Bu'Dovj. maang fivj myenb zyrug pwatg yia Navq haiq nx tivg zwid yaag lovg Qa'q zruj pun ninb Bua.
39.14: “+‘ninb Bua xij Paaiq teij myenb zanb zang yrub mivb yrub taaib kxmj teib puv pyopq tovb zevg Fiag yem Jyenq Daub peib Eei sei, weig saaj teib puv Zivb Revg. uaq teij siag Laaj Eia'g Jiaj liud, ninb Bua xij zu'g Zwrtq mivb lxd.
39.23: maang kua'q myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zu'g kwaatq mivb se laaij ninb Bua Eei zwid, weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yia. yia zyrug pwav Myen maiq mavg ninb Bua, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Jiu pun yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei puab Diaq. ninb Bua yetg zuvq zyrug zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
39.6: yia xij pun trud Fiag maa-kokg Zauj pcvb xn yem Kxib Len Eei myenb. uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
39.2: yia xij kwinb meib Rwrnj, zung meib huvj Jyenq uaq Daavg mivb. yia xij txb meib yem pa'q puv ko Jiaj Eei txvj mivb Tauj i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov.
39.20: yem yia Beng Eei tiab meib Bua tu'q Eang maad Zauj keb maad pcv, Zauj henq haig Eei myenb Zauj Euvb Euvg Bx'q Jaaj henq Eei pcv Eei xq.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
39.24: yia ziuj ninb Bua maiq Zivb Revg Eei Jauq Zauj ninb Bua zruj txvg Eei sig zruj pun ninb Bua. yia yaag pwav yia Eei Myen, maiq mavg ninb Bua.
39.28: uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb, weig zu'g maiq kunq yia pun ninb Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb maang kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj, Ga'haaq yia cvj syru zunq ninb Bua, txb ninb Bua Rwrnj ninb Bua Eei pwrnb teib puv. yia maiq lyrub yetg taub yem kanb kua'q myenb Bu'Dovj.
39.7: “+‘+“yia xij yem yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Bu'Dovj pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj. yem naaiq mivb yia maiq pun yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj zu'g maaib wij. maang kua'q myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, se yem i-saa-laa-en Bu'Dovj zruj Zivb Revg uaq taub.”
39.29: yia toj yia Eei sivj livb Fiag i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun uaq zang, yia maiq cvj pwav yia Eei Myen maiq mavg ninb Bua.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
39.19: meib Bua Eang tovb yia weig meib Bua liug leid fovg hxg ziag Eei, meib yaag tu'q Eang xb Jung peuq Tauj zuvj yaag hopq Ryaamq Tauj Gwin.
39.17: “paamb myenb aa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. meib xij zu'g heug Euvb Euvg nx'g Zauj lomb Waav Eei yetg zuvq Yiab zxib. xij zu'g kxvq, ‘meib Bua kapq zunq taaib maa'b! yem faamb puv feij lrug taaib Eang yia weig meib Bua liug leid ziag liud Eei xq, se yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov tomb ziag. yem uaq meib Bua tu'q Eang xq hopq Ryaamq.
39.27: yia yem maang fivj txb ninb Bua Rwrnj yaag yem ninb Bua Eei winb wavq Eei teib puv syru ninb Bua zunq uaq zang, yia xij lovg ninb Bua txv Jyenq ziaj kua'q myenb piuj mevb yia Zivb Revg.
39.11: “+‘Tauj uaq Nxi yia xij pun kokg yem i-saa-laa-en maaib zrub kemb, se yem Kxiq Eei tov puv mcvj, myenb Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib Eei hxvd. zrub kemb zyrug tavq Jyenq Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib Eei myenb, weig zu'g kokg Zauj ninb Eei zwavj myenb Zamq zuvq zavj Jyenq uaq. myenb xij Zwrtq Buaj heug uaq nxm txvj penj haa-mon kokg hxvd.
39.5: meib xij zu'g yem lomb Waav Kiv Fiag weig zu'g yia kxvq liud a'q. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
39.9: “+‘yem i-saa-laa-en Eei nxmb nxm zivb Eei myenb xij Zwrtq mivb zx'q ua'g king puaq trud, se zx'q tomb Txvb paaib, fiub Txvb paaib, Jwavb zinj Zauj fxv, Dyavb Donj Zauj Zav, lovg txvj zaavb puaq pwavq siag Havj.
39.16: (yem naaig cvj maaib nxm zivb heug haa-mo-naa.) ninb Bua zyrug Navq naaig saaj teib puv.
39.4: meib Zauj meib Eei yetg zuvq Junb pcv, lyemb Zauj meib kapq txig Eei ziaj kua'q myenb, xij yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Bov zu'g taig. yia xij zx'q meib Jiu pun Euvb Euvg tomb Jaavq Zauj lomb Waav Eei Yiab zxib zruj Eang Eei ka'naaiq.
39.10: ninb Bua maiq zu'g yem lomb Waav fai kemb kc'q zaavb, weig zu'g ninb Bua maaib uaq teij ua'g king txvj zaavb puaq. ninb Bua zyrug Zaavq tovb Zaavq ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq uaq teij, yaag luq tovb luq ninb Bua uaq teij myenb. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
39.22: yem naaiq Nxi mivb, Ga'haaq i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq, ninb Bua Eei Tinb huvb.
39.12: “+‘i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun xij zu'g lovg siag Laaj Eia'g pyopq ninb Bua weig saaj teib puv Zivb Revg taaib.
39.15: uaq teij myenb yem teib puv Jiaj mivb Jiaj taaib Eei zyavb hog, ta'faanb pwatg tiub myenb Eei Buvq, ninb zyrug zruj nxm Javb hog yem Buvq Eei ka'Len. Ga'haaq zavj sei Eei myenb taaib txb mivb zavj yem haa-mon kokg Eei hxvd.’
39.13: teib puv Eei zwavj myenb zyrug pyopq ninb Bua. tovb yia pun myenb pwatg yia Eei Favb laavg uaq Nxi, ninb Bua zyrug tu'q mevb taub. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
39.1: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq kokg. xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “me-sekq Zauj Tu-Ban Eei tomb pyeiq zeiq, kokg, aa'b! yia Zauj meib zruj winb wavq a'q.
39.26: ninb Bua tu'q pcvb xn Eei yem ninb Bua kanb Eei teib puv yaag maiq maaib haiq taub hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug la'Ku'q zinb Daavg ninb Bua maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yia Zauj ninb Bua kanb zu'g Eaiq Eei Jauq a'q.
39.25: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘ib zang yia xij pun yaa-Kopq Eei zeib fun tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx. ta'faanb i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun yia xij Kxb lyenb, yaag xij peu Jyenq yia Eei Zivb Revg Buaj.

47.18: “tov puv Eei kapg Jaaij yem hau-laan Zauj Daa-matq-katg, yem ki-le-aatg Zauj i-saa-laa-en Bu'Dovj, se kan Jx-Dcn Daaib mivb Tauj tov puv Eei Kxiq cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj Taa-maa. naaiq se tov puv Eei kapg Jaaij.
47.8: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “naaiq teij uam lyrug huvj Jyenq tov puv Eei Dau mivb Tauj aa-laa-Baa, cvj Fiag mivb pia'g Kxiq. uaq teij uam lyrug pia'g Kxiq, uamb Raaib zyrug Tiuq penj uamb zaamq.
47.3: uaq laanb myenb nanq Jyenq Dx'g Eei Laav yavb tov puv mivb Dx'g yetg Zin Dx'g. ninb txb yia yavb uam mivb. uam Bcvg zaub mweig Navq.
47.21: “meib Bua xij zu'g ziuj i-saa-laa-en Eei fivj Paaiq naaiq teij Dau.
47.14: xij zu'g pun fib Bua'g Eei. yia hruq Jyenq zx'q naaiq teij Dau pun meib Bua Eei ovb Taaij. naaiq teij Dau zyrug penj meib Bua Ripg Eei pwrng.
47.23: kanb fivj myenb yem meib Bua haiq fivj myenb Bu'Dovj, yem uaq meib Bua xij zu'g Paaiq Dau pun ninb Bua Ripg.” naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
47.6: ninb kxvq Buaj yia, “paamb myenb aa'b! meib pwatg naaiq fai?” ninb cvj txb yia kan Do'g Len Rwrnj.
47.2: ninb cvj txb yia Zwrtq pa'q puv Eei kcvb, txb yia yem ka'Eiag mcvj Wiv mivb Tauj Win mivb tov puv ka'Eiag uaq Kav kcvb. pwatg uam yem naamb puv lyrug Zwrtq.
47.20: “fai puv maaib tomb Kxiq zruj kapg Jaaij mivb Tauj pia'g haa-matq Eei Jauq txib vaang Eei txvj. naaiq se fai puv Eei kapg Jaaij.
47.7: Rwrnj Eei zyavb hog yia pwatg i puv Do'g Len, naaiq puv Zauj uaq puv, maaib Dyavj Zamq haig.
47.19: “naamb puv Eei kapg Jaaij yem Taa-maa mivb Tauj me-li-Batg-Kaa-Detg Eei uam, kan i-yipq Eei Do'g txn mivb Tauj tomb Kxiq. naaiq se naamb puv Eei kapg Jaaij.
47.17: Navq naaig pa'q puv Eei kapg Jaaij yem Kxiq mivb Tauj haa-saa-e-non, kan Daa-matq-katg pa'q puv Eei kapg Jaaij yaag maaib haa-matq Eei kapg Jaaij yem pa'q puv. naaiq se pa'q puv mcvj Eei kapg Jaaij.
47.11: mq paag uamb Faavb Zauj Dxvb Eei txvj maiq haib zaamq. xij zu'g kwavg Jyenq uaq penj Rauq.
47.5: ninb cvj Dx'g yetg Zin Dx'g, uam zyrug penj Do'q mig a'q. yavb Jiaj maiq tu'q weig zu'g uam faauj Tauj Do kauj haib zyrub tu'q a'q.
47.9: naaiq tiub Do'q lyrug mivb Tauj haaij, maaib mcvg Eei ka'naaiq kapq zunq yem uaq Zamq Eei, yaag maaib Byaud Zamq Eei. weig zu'g naaiq teij uam lyrug Fiag naaiq, Kxiq Eei uam zyrug zaamq mivb. Navq naaig, Do'q mivb Tauj haaij, Euvb Euvg zyrug maaib mcvg a'q.
47.16: Be-lo-Taa, sipg-laa-im (se yem Daa-matq-katg Zauj haa-matq Bu'Dovj Eei kapg Jaaij), mivb Tauj yem hau-laan Eei kapg Jaaij, haa-se-hatq-Ti-Kon uaq nxm txvj.
47.4: ninb cvj Dx'g yetg Zin Dx'g yaag pun yia yavb uam mivb. uam Do Tauj Zivb Bx'g. ninb cvj Dx'g yetg Zin Dx'g yaag pun yia yavb uam mivb. uam zyrug Bcvg Jaaiq.
47.10: maaib pxvd Byaud myenb sruq uaq Kxib Len. yem en-ke-Di mivb Tauj en-ekg-laa-im zyrug maaib Pwi muvd Eei txvj. maaib ziaj! ziaj Euvg Byaud, Dovg yem tomb Kxiq Eei Byaud.
47.22: naaiq teij Dau xij zu'g Paaiq pun Gxi penj meib Bua kanb Ripg Eei pwrng Zauj yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb, se tovb yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj tu'q fu'Jweiq funb fa'q Eei myenb tu'q Ripg Eei pwrng. meib Bua xij zu'g funj ninb Bua Navq yem i-saa-laa-en Bu'Dovj Zwrtq seij Eei myenb. xij zu'g pun ninb Bua yem i-saa-laa-en fivj ka'Euad tu'q Zauj Jyenq meib Bua Ripg ninb Bua Eei pwrng.
47.12: yem i puv Do'g Len maaib Euvb Euvg Dyavj Eei pyruq weig zruj Eang hopq. nxmb yaag maiq Gaai, pyruq yaag maiq tavj. Laab Laaj Zwrtq syavb pyruq weig zu'g yuvd naaiq teij Dyavj Eei uam yem sivj ting lyrug Zwrtq taaib. Dyavj Eei pyruq lovg penj Eang Eei ka'naaiq. Dyavj Eei nxmb lovg zruj Dia.”
47.15: “naaiq se teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij. “pa'q puv Eei kapg Jaaij yem tomb Kxiq mivb hetq-lon zivb Eei Jauq Jiaj haa-matq Eei Jaub Kuq cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj sej-Datg,
47.13: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “naaiq se meib Bua xij zu'g ziuj Dau Eei kapg Jaaij Paaiq pun Gxi penj zyepg Eeig fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb Ripg Eei pwrng. yo-sepq tu'q i kruq.
47.1: uaq laanb myenb cvj txb yia Rwrnj Tauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg. yia pwatg kcvb ka'Diaq maaib uam lyrug Zwrtq mivb tov puv (weig zu'g zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Win tov puv). naaiq teij uam yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg ka'Diaq lyrug Zwrtq naamb puv, ziab txvb Eei naamb puv ka'Len.

10.18: Ga'haaq zyruq Eei Favb laavg leib Gxi zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg mivb yem Ke-lu-Bim Eei kub vwaaig.
10.8: (yem uaq teij Ke-lu-Bim Eei Daatq ka'Diaq pwatg maaib puad Navq myenb Eei puad nx.)
10.3: uaq laanb myenb pia'g Eei zyavb hog, Ke-lu-Bim sruq Jyenq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei naamb puv. maaib txq Bwrnj yem pwavq ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg.
10.21: taub taub Ke-lu-Bim maaib pyei nxm Myen, pyei Kwaaiq Daatq. yem ninb Bua Eei Daatq ka'Diaq maaib Navq paamb myenb Eei puad.
10.14: naaiq teij Ke-lu-Bim maaib pyei nxm Myen. ta'yetq nxm Myen penj Ke-lu-Bim Eei Myen. ta'Eeig nxm myenb Eei Myen, ta'faam nxm syenb Eei Myen, ta'feij nxm tomb Jaavq Eei Myen.
10.6: zyruq Paaiq zu'q Jyenq la'maab Diab mwrng uaq laanb myenb kxvq, “zx'q yem uaq teij yenb Bu'Dovj, se yem Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj Eei trud” uaq zang, uaq laanb myenb zyrug pia'g mivb sruq Jyenq yetg nxm yenb ka'Len.
10.2: Tinb huvb kxvq Buaj zu'q la'maab Diab mwrng uaq laanb myenb, “meib pia'g mivb yem Ke-lu-Bim ka'Diaq uaq teij yenb Eei Bu'Dovj zx'q yetg Pwavq yem Ke-lu-Bim ka'Diaq zia'g Jyenq trud Eei trub Taanj haad pwavq zivb.” yia mavg Jyenq uaq zang ninb pia'g yenb Bu'Dovj mig a'q.
10.20: naaiq se yia yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len pwatg yem i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb ka'Diaq navb Eei ka'naaiq. yia zyrug hiuq tu'q penj Ke-lu-Bim.
10.7: maaib taub Ke-lu-Bim yem uaq teij Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj suv puad Zwrtq Tauj yem Ke-lu-Bim Bu'Dovj Eei trud, zx'q teij trud an Jyenq zu'q la'maab Diab mwrng uaq laanb Eei puad. uaq laanb myenb zx'q taaib zyrug Zwrtq mig a'q.
10.19: Ke-lu-Bim Zwrtq Eei zyavb hog zyrug yav Daatq txv Jyenq yia yem ka'Diaq Dau faauj. yenb yaag kan ninb Bua Eei ka'Len mivb. ninb Bua tivb Fiag zavg zyruq Eei pyauq tov puv Eei kcvb. i-saa-laa-en Eei Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg yaag yem ninb Bua kub vwaaig.
10.17: Ke-lu-Bim yem tivg, yenb yaag yem tivg. Ke-lu-Bim faauj, yenb yaag Zauj Jyenq faauj, weig zu'g navb Eei ka'naaiq Eei mcvg yem naaiq teij yenb ka'Euad.
10.11: yenb mivb Eei zyavb hog, pyei puv zuvq mivb tu'q Eei. maiq zu'g kwinb Rwrnj. mGxvq Win haiq puv zyrug mivb uaq puv a'q, maiq zu'g kwinb sin.
10.5: maaib uaq teij Ke-lu-Bim Eei Daatq Eei Qiaj Bwi, yem ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg zuvq mwavj tu'q haid, yaag haid Navq nrnb Jiaj uaq taub kxvq waag Eei Qiaj Bwi.
10.9: yia cvj mavg, pwatg Ke-lu-Bim Eei ka'Len maaib pyei nxm yenb. yetg taub Ke-lu-Bim maaib yetg nxm yenb yem ka'Len. yenb yaag pwatg Fapg Fapg Navq Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij.
10.16: Ke-lu-Bim haiq zang mivb, yenb yaag kan Jyenq ninb Bua Eei ka'Len mivb. Ke-lu-Bim yav Daatq weig yem ka'Diaq Dau faauj, uaq teij yenb yaag Zauj Jyenq ninb Bua faauj.
10.4: zyruq Eei Favb laavg yem Ke-lu-Bim faauj Tauj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei kcvb Daavg. pyauq zyrug maaib Bwrnj pwavq Revg. weib kxmj Eei laatg ka'Euad yaag maaib zyruq Eei Favb laavg pwavq Revg.
10.10: naaiq teij pyei nxm yenb Eei favj zeiq fib Navq Revg, Navq yetg nxm yenb maaib kanb nxm yenb kuvb kavg fapq pia'g ka'Euad.
10.22: ninb Bua Eei Myen Eei mru zeiq, lyemb Myen lyemb sin Eei mru zeiq, Navq yia yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len pwatg uaq nx. ninb Bua taub taub pcv za'g Eei mivb uaq Daavg.
10.12: ninb Bua Eei zyavb sin, lyemb ti'g taand, puad, Zauj Daatq maaib mziv pwavq Revg. uaq teij pyei nxm yenb yaag maaib mziv pwavq Revg.
10.15: Ke-lu-Bim faauj mig a'q. naaiq se yia yem Ke-Baa Daaib Len pwatg navb Eei ka'naaiq.
10.13: naaiq teij yenb yia kanb Eei mnxmb haid heug penj “haib kwinb Eei yenb.”
10.1: yia cvj Zau Myen mavg, pwatg Ke-lu-Bim Eei mGxvq kub vwaaig Eei luvb maaib Euvg hing Zwrtq Navq Banq Buaq Rav Eei la'pyeib Jaaij, favj zeiq Navq nxm weig.

25.3: xij zu'g Buaj am-mon myenb, ‘mwavj zyruq Tinb huvb Eei waag maa'b! zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq. “yia Eei sivj ting zu'g maaib wij, i-saa-laa-en teib puv zu'g paaig Waav, yu-Daa Eei zeib fun yaag zu'g kwaatq mivb uaq zang, meib Bua kxvq, ‘aaq haab!’
25.8: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘weig zu'g mo-apg Zauj sej-i kxvq, “mavg maa'b! yu-Daa Eei zeib fun Zauj nxmb nxm kua'q Eei myenb fib Navq Eei.”
25.9: weig naaiq yia xij pun mo-apg kapg Jaaij ka'Len Eei zivb Baaij, se mo-apg teib puv Eei Favb laavg zivb, Betg-ye-si-motq zivb, Baa-an-me-on zivb Zauj Ki-li-yaa-Taa-im zivb.
25.7: yia zyrug suv yia Eei puad zruj pun meib Bua. yia zx'q meib Bua Jiu pun maang kua'q penj luq Eei ka'naaiq. yia xij pun meib Bua yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj zu'g Pai kwavg, yaag pun meib Bua yem maang kua'q zu'g myetg. yia xij pun meib Bua zu'g paaig Revg. uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’
25.5: yia xij pun lapq-Baa zivb penj puvj lxb Txb Eei Zyavq, yaag pun am-mon teig Eei txvj penj yuvb kwanb, pa'ki yuvb kwanb Eei Zyavq. uaq zang meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.”
25.16: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! yia xij suv yia Eei puad zruj pun fi-li-saa-tia myenb. yia xij Pai kwavg Ke-le-Ti myenb yaag myetg Revg yem Kxib Len zevg Fiag Eei myenb.
25.17: yia xij Niab Niaq Eei Jaauq win pun ninb Bua, Qiaj Jiad Jyenq zruj pun ninb Bua. yia Jaauq win pun ninb Bua Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’+”
25.14: yia xij lovg yia Eei pc'g fivj, i-saa-laa-en myenb, Eei puad Jaauq win pun e-Dom myenb. ziuj yia Qiaj Jiad, nrud Eei, i-saa-laa-en myenb xij yem e-Dom zruj pun ninb Bua. e-Dom myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia Jaauq win.’ naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.”
25.4: weig naaiq yia xij zx'q meib Bua Jiu pun tov puv Eei fivj weig penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng. ninb Bua xij lyepg ninb Bua Eei Zyavq, Zxv ninb Bua Eei Dopg liub yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua zyrug Eang meib Bua Eei pyruq yaag hopq meib Bua Eei vovb Exj.
25.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win mivb am-mon myenb uaq, trug waag kxvq ninb Bua.
25.6: zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “weig zu'g meib Bua Baij puad Damg zauj a'Neiq maaib Hruq Rxv haig i-saa-laa-en teib puv,
25.13: zyruq Tinb huvb zyrug Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia xij suv yia Eei puad zruj pun e-Dom, lyemb myenb lyemb scvb Kuq myetg Revg. yia yaag xij pun e-Dom zu'g paaig Waav. yem Te-maan zivb mivb Tauj De-Daan zivb ninb Bua xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
25.12: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘weig zu'g e-Dom myenb Qiaj Jiad Jyenq Jaauq win pun yu-Daa Eei zeib fun, ninb Bua Jaauq win zruj txvg zwid Lo haig.’
25.15: “zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘laaij fi-li-saa-tia myenb Qiaj Jiad Jyenq, Rxv Jyenq Jaauq win, se yem lob Nxi nipg taaib Eei win,
25.11: yia yaag xij tivg mo-apg myenb Eei zwid, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ”+’+”
25.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
25.10: yia xij zx'q mo-apg myenb Zauj Jyenq am-mon myenb Jiu pun tov puv Eei fivj weig penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng, pun maang kua'q Bu'Dovj maiq mbaaib haiq taub Javj tu'q am-mon myenb.

22.18: “paamb myenb aa'b! ziuj yia mavg, i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun penj Dwi maiq lamb lovg Eei ka'naaiq. ninb Bua yem trub lrub penj tovb si'q, yavb Tiag, Lia'q Zauj Juvd Eei Gaiq. ninb Bua penj sinj Zwrtq Eei Eaanb Gaiq.
22.8: yem meib ka'Euad myenb mavg Piaj yia Eei Zivb Revg ka'naaiq yaag pun yia Eei tivb kov Nxi maaib wij.
22.3: meib xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “naaiq nxm zivb Eei myenb maaib taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq Eei sig pwavq zivb ka'Euad. ninb Bua yaag zruj miub favj pun kanb maaib wij zyrug pun zivb zu'g myetg Eei zyavb hog Tauj.
22.21: yia xij zx'q meib Bua kapq zunq cvj pun yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq Navq trud nx, zyrug puaq meib Bua yu'g.
22.14: Tauj yia zruj pun meib Eei Nxib Eia'g, meib haib tiaq tu'q Eei fai? meib Eei puad Zxg maaib Qa'q Eei fai? yia, zyruq, kxvq liud yaag za'kevb xij ei Jyenq zruj.
22.23: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
22.6: “+‘+“mavg maa'b! yem meib ka'Euad zruj Lo Eei i-saa-laa-en myenb lovg kanb Eei livg taij myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq.
22.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij syemq Eei fai? meib xij syemq naaiq nxm maaib Ryaamq kua'q pwavq Eei zivb fai? Navq naaig meib xij zu'g kxvq Revg pun naaiq nxm zivb Eei myenb hiuq tu'q ninb Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq kamb Riaq Eei sig.
22.20: Navq myenb zx'q Eaanb, tovb si'q, Lia'q, Juvd Zauj yavb Tiag kapq zunq tapq Jyenq lrub trud, Zwi trud puaq yu'g, yia xij Navq naaiq Qiaj Jiad, nrud Jyenq zx'q meib Bua kapq zunq yem zivb ka'Euad puaq yu'g.
22.24: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Buaj i-saa-laa-en teib puv, ‘meib se maiq tu'q saaj Zivb Revg Eei teib puv. yia Qiaj Jiad Eei Nxi yaag maiq maaib Byuvg twib Fiag.
22.28: teib puv Eei trug waag myenb lovg Wib pc'g Raatq Jyenq weig pwav pc'g fivj zruj Eei sig zyrug weig ninb Bua pwatg Jaaq hing yaavb Eei sig yaag Bruq kwaaj kxvq penj kxvb pc'g Eei waag. ninb Bua kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.’ mq paag zyruq maiq tu'q kxvq.
22.7: yem meib Bu'Dovj, myenb mavg Piaj tiaj maag. ninb Bua zeij yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb yaag Kwei kub hanb fu'Jweiq Zauj aub kwaaq.
22.29: teib puv Eei myenb nyruq myenb, luq myenb, zeij myenb Jomg myenb Zauj tavb tonj myenb yaag maiq lovg leid Eei nyruq yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj Eei kanb fivj myenb.
22.19: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘laaij meib Bua yetg zuvq penj naaiq Euvg ka'naaib Gaiq, yia zyrug zx'q meib Bua kapq zunq yem ye-lu-saa-lem.
22.17: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
22.31: weig naaiq yia Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun ninb Bua. yia Eei ka'Qiaj Navq trud nx puaq myetg ninb Bua. ziuj ninb Bua zruj Eei Jauq yia zuvq xij winb pun ninb Bua. zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq nx kxvq.”
22.30: “yia yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj lxd taub Zeij zivb laatg Eei myenb, xij pun ninb yem yia Eei Ra'Myen weig uaq nxm teib puv sruq Jyenq zivb laatg Baaij Tov Eei txvj, pun yia maiq myetg uaq nxm teib puv. mq paag lxd maiq tu'q yetg taub.
22.27: yem teib puv ka'Euad Eei pyeiq zeiq Navq Yiab Juq petq ka'naaiq Eang. ninb Bua taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, hxig myenb Eei mcvg, zruj maiq zivj weig tu'q ka'naaiq.
22.11: yem meib Bu'Dovj maaib taub zruj kamb Riaq Eei sig, Yenj Jwavg laavd myenb Eei auq. maaib taub Yenj ninb Eei Bwavd, maaib taub Yenj ninb Eei txg fai muag, se ninb Eei tia Eei sia'q.
22.5: mevb taub Dxtq, Zeuj lung Eei zivb aa'b! yem ko yem fatq Eei myenb xij Wrtq meib.
22.9: yem meib Bu'Dovj maaib myenb kxvq Jaaq Eei waag weig pun myenb zu'g taij pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq. yem meib ka'Euad maaib myenb yem Bov kub vwaaig Eang ziag pun miub favj Eei ka'naaiq yaag zruj laib Lopq, Eaiq haig Eei sig.
22.16: yem maang kua'q myenb Eei Ra'Myen meib pun kanb zu'g maaib wij. meib zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’+”
22.4: laaij meib Bua taij myenb pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq, meib Bua zyrug maaib zwid. meib Bua zruj Eei miub favj pun kanb maaib wij, pun zivb setq mweid Eei Nxib Eia'g Tauj fatq, yaag pun weig naaiq nxm zivb tivg zyavj Eei Havb taaub Tauj a'q. Navq naaig yia xij pun naaiq nxm zivb zu'g maang kua'q mavg Piaj yaag zu'g maang fivj Wrtq.
22.10: yem meib Bu'Dovj maaib teij myenb Zauj kanb Eei tia Eei aub txn pweij. yem meib ka'Euad maaib teij myenb Qavq maanb pweij maaib sinb yeng, maiq Zivb Revg Eei msia'q txn.
22.22: Eaanb Navq haiq nx yem lrub ka'Euad yu'g, meib Bua xij zu'g Navq uaq nx yem zivb ka'Euad yu'g. meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia, zyruq, Eei ka'Qiaj pctq Zwrtq pun meib Bua.’+”
22.12: yem meib Bu'Dovj maaib myenb zipq Eaanb Mwavj weig taij myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq. ninb puvj zc'q yaag lovg leig fai lovg kaub Zamq pwrnq, fai nyruq Jwavg laavd myenb Zwrtq Eaanb weig tu'q Eaanb Eang. meib la'Ku'q yia mig a'q.” zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq.
22.15: yia xij pun meib faatq Raanj yem maang kua'q maang fivj Bu'Dovj. yia xij myetg Revg yem meib ka'Euad laib Lopq Eei Jauq.
22.13: “+‘mavg maa'b! weig naaiq yia xij Baij puab zaavb Taatq, laaij yem meib Bu'Dovj tu'q maiq pcvb fim Eei Eaanb yaag taij myenb, pun Ryaamq lyrug Zwrtq.
22.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
22.26: teib puv ka'Euad Eei sai myenb zruj txvg yia Eei leib latg, yaag pun yia Eei Zivb Revg ka'naaiq maaib wij. haiq Euvg Zivb Revg, haiq Euvg maaib wij, ninb Bua maiq pun Gxi. ninb Bua yaag maiq Faauj myenb hiuq tu'q Zivb Revg Eei Zauj maiq Zivb Revg Eei, Navq haiq nx kanb Euvg. ninb Bua maiq kruj yia Eei tivb kov Nxi, zyrug pun yia yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zu'g myenb mavg Piaj.
22.25: teib puv ka'Euad Eei pyeiq zeiq Navq Funb Jyenq Eei syenb petq ka'naaiq Eang. ninb Bua taij myenb, Zaavq zinb zxib Zauj Jaaij Eei ka'naaiq, yaag pun teib puv maaib aub kwaaq Zamq.

42.18: ninb cvj Win mivb Dx'g naamb puv, ziuj pyaab Dx'g maaib Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
42.3: yaag taauj Jyenq ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eig zyepg Dx'g Javq, cvj Win mivb ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg Eei timg la'pyeiq Eei Dau penj pua Ravb, yetg Ravb lapq yetg Ravb.
42.8: weig zu'g yem nitq ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg uaq Baib pyauq Daauq Mmd zyepg Dx'g. mq paag yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq txib Myen uaq teij Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g.
42.19: ninb cvj Win mivb Dx'g fai puv, ziuj pyaab Dx'g maaib Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
42.9: uaq Baib pyauq ka'Diaq uaq Ravb, se yavb ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg pia'g Eei txvj tov puv mcvj maaib Jauq pia'g,
42.7: pia'g uaq Baib pyauq Eei Jauq maaib Pev Fovg Zauj pyauq txib Myen, Zauj pyauq yaag Zauj ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg pcvb paaid. Fovg Mmd zyepg Dx'g Daauq,
42.5: kub vwaaig uaq Ravb Eang pia'g teij ka'Euad zyrug kaub hepg Bu'Dovj Zauj ka'Diaq uaq teij i Ravb,
42.16: ninb lovg Dx'g Eei pyaaq Dx'g tov puv. ziuj pyaab Dx'g maaib Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
42.20: ninb Dx'g pyei puv Wiv kxmj Eei laatg, Daauq Mmd pc'q Dx'g, Javq Mmd pc'q Dx'g. naaiq se weig pun Gxi naaiq teij Zivb Revg Dau Zauj Prub Tov Eei Dau.
42.17: ninb cvj Win mivb Dx'g pa'q puv, ziuj pyaab Dx'g maaib Mmd pc'q Dx'g.
42.14: sai myenb pia'g Zivb Revg Eei txvj Eei zyavb hog ninb Bua maiq Kub Zwrtq Tauj ka'Eiag uaq Kav laatg. zuaq Tauj Jaiq liud zu'q Jyenq fub suj Eei lwib hruj Zivj Zwrtq weig zu'g naaiq teij lwib hruj se Zivb Revg. ninb Bua xij zu'g zu'q kanb Euvg lwib hruj Zivj taaib haib pia'g pc'g fivj yem Eei txvj.”
42.4: yem pyauq ka'Eiag Ra'Myen mcvj maaib tiub Jauq Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, Javq Mmd zyepg Dx'g. Qovb Qovj Eei kcvb Win mivb pa'q puv.
42.2: yem pa'q puv mcvj, naaiq Baib pyauq se Daauq yetg pc'q Dx'g, Javq Mmd zyepg Dx'g,
42.6: weig zu'g penj pua Ravb yaag maiq maaib Dyrub Navq yem ka'Eiag uaq Kav, laatg ka'Euad maaib Dyrub. weig naaiq kub vwaaig uaq Ravb Eang pia'g ka'Euad Do zyrug kaub hepg Bu'Dovj Zauj ka'Diaq uaq teij i Ravb.
42.13: uaq laanb myenb Buaj yia, “yem nitq Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Len Eei Kuvb txvj, pa'q puv Zauj naamb puv naaiq teij i Baib pyauq se Zivb Revg Eei pyauq. se mivb nitq fatq zyruq Eei sai myenb Eang kaub Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq Eei txvj. ninb Bua yaag syru fovg hxg kaub Zivb Revg Eei ka'naaiq, se fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g Zauj fi'q zwid Eei ka'naaiq Zauj zruj txvg zwid ziag Eei ka'naaiq, weig zu'g penj Zivb Revg Eei txvj.
42.12: yem naamb puv uaq Baib pyauq ka'Diaq uaq Ravb maaib Jauq yem tov puv pia'g tovb myenb pia'g uaq tiub Jauq Eei txvj. yem naaiq teij txvj txib Myen maaib Pev Fovg Genj Jyenq.
42.15: uaq laanb myenb Dx'g liud zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Euad Eei txvj, ninb txb yia Zwrtq Win mivb tov puv uaq taub laatg kcvb, cvj Dx'g Wiv kxmj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq Eei Dau.
42.11: naaiq Baib pyauq Ra'Myen mcvj maaib tiub Jauq. pyauq yaag fib Navq yem pa'q puv uaq Baib, Daauq Zauj Javq fib Navq Eei. pia'g Zwrtq Eei txvj, Javq Daauq fib Navq Eei. Qovb Qovj Eei kcvb Zauj pa'q puv uaq teij pyauq fib Navq Eei.
42.1: Jiaj taaib uaq laanb myenb cvj txb yia Zwrtq taaib Tauj ka'Euad uaq Kav laatg Eei pa'q puv mcvj, Tauj yetg Baib pyauq. uaq Baib pyauq txij zyavj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Len Eei Kuvb txvj, yaag txij zyavj pa'q puv uaq Kav pyauq.
42.10: tovb ka'Eiag uaq Kav Fovg Jiad kxn Eei txvj. yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq naamb puv, txij zyavj zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq ka'Len Eei Kuvb txvj, yaag maaib yetg Baib pyauq.

15.3: myenb txb a'vung Mei mivb lovg zruj haiq Euvg fai? haib lovg zruj Dyavb tiv Kwavj ka'naaiq fai?
15.8: zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, ‘yia xij pun uaq nxm teib puv zu'g paaig Waav Revg weig zu'g ninb Bua maiq zyepg zua'q Eei zruj pun yia.’+”
15.4: lovg zruj zaavb tapq trub Raug puaq, trud puaq i puv tweib mweid, Bu'Dovj penj trub kanj mig a'q, haib lovg zruj tu'q haiq Euvg maaib lamb lovg fai?
15.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! a'vung Mei se kaub lovj yem lomg Eei haiq Euvg Dyavj Eei Gwaab fai?
15.6: “weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, ‘yia Navq haiq nx yem lomg Eei Dyavj Bu'Dovj zx'q a'vung Mei lovg zruj zaavb puaq trud, yia zyrug pun ye-lu-saa-lem Eei pc'g fivj Navq uaq nx.
15.5: sij kxvq maiq kcvb puaq Eei zyavb hog se maiq lamb lovg, zu'g trud puaq penj trub kanj liud, fuvg haib lovg zruj haiq Euvg?
15.7: yia zyrug Byenq Myen Zauj ninb Bua txib tekg. maiq kunq ninb Bua yem trud pyauj Zwrtq taaib, trud Zxg puaq Qwi ninb Bua. yia Byenq Myen Zauj ninb Bua txib tekg Eei zyavb hog, meib Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. ’
15.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,

29.18: “paamb myenb aa'b! Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, pun ninb Eei Junb pcv kwanb zruj kov Niaq, Tauj ninb Bua yetg zuvq mGxvq Fav Revg. mrud taub pcv Eei Ba'taub yaag Taatq Revg. maiq kunq Navq naaig, ninb Bua Dxtq Qa'q Bx'q Tai-la'q uaq zang, ninb Zauj ninb Eei Junb pcv maiq tu'q haiq Euvg weig zruj ninb Bua Bx'q Tai-la'q Eei finb Kruq.
29.3: kunq kxvq a'q. xij zu'g kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘+“i-yipq Eei huvb, faa-lo aa'b! yia zruj meib Eei winb wavq a'q. meib se yetg taub tomb Juvb huvb  pweij Jyenq meib kanb Eei Do'q ka'Euad kxvq, “nai-aa Daaib se yia Eei, yia zeij taaib.”
29.8: “+‘weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, yia xij lovg Ru'g Daauq zruj pun meib. yia xij yem meib Bu'Dovj zx'q meib Eei myenb Zauj scvb Kuq Pai kwavg.
29.19: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, “yia xij zx'q i-yipq Jiu pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa. ninb xij pyenb Revg i-yipq Eei zinb zxib, luq Revg, Zaavq Revg ninb Bua Eei ka'naaiq, lovg zruj ninb Eei Junb pcv kwanb Eei finb Kruq.
29.9: i-yipq teib puv zyrug penj paaig waaig Eei Daub Waav. uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. “+‘meib  kxvq, “nai-aa Daaib se yia Eei. yia zeij taaib.”
29.7: ninb Bua lovg puad nanq Jyenq meib, meib zyrug nauq mig a'q. ninb Bua yetg zuvq Eei Ba'taub zu'g petq waaig.  ninb Bua pweig meib, meib zyrug nauq mig a'q, wrtq zu'g ninb Bua yetg zuvq Eei Jaaiq.
29.5: yia xij zx'q meib, lyemb meib Eei yetg zuvq Do'q Eei Byaud, zxi kwavg teib puvb Waav ka'Euad. meib xij Dxtq Fiag lomb Waav yaag maiq maaib haiq taub syru zunq pyopq meib. yia zx'q meib pun Daub peib Eei Yiab zxib Zauj Daamb luvb Eei nx'g zruj Eang hopq.”
29.16: yetg liud maiq haib penj i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun Kauj Eei kua'q. Navq naaig i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun haib Javj zu'g ninb Bua Win Rwrnj mivb Kauj i-yipq paamd zwid. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq Tinb huvb. ’+”
29.20: yia zx'q i-yipq teib puv Jiu pun ninb weig zruj ninb Bua Zwrtq Qa'q zruj Eei finb Kruq, weig zu'g ninb Bua Tevj yia zruj. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
29.17: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb Eig zyepg Zyetq uaq Havj, zib Laaj scvb yetq, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
29.14: yia xij pun i-yipq cvj tu'q lovj Navq lod uaq nx, yaag xij txb i-yipq myenb yem ninb Bua Eei pwrnb teig, patg-lotq uaq. yem uaq ninb Bua zyrug penj nxm mau Eei kua'q.
29.4: yia, Tinb huvb, xij lovg tomb tiuj Kwavj Jyenq meib Eei haab paab, cvj pun yem meib Eei Do'q Eei Byaud nctq Jyenq meib Eei Jiaj. meib Eei yetg zuvq Do'q Eei Byaud nctq Jyenq meib Eei Jiaj, yia zyrug yem meib Eei Do'q ka'Euad Tx meib Zwrtq taaib.
29.21: “Tauj uaq Nxi, yia xij pun i-saa-laa-en Eei zeib fun cvj henq Jiad taaib yaag pun meib, e-sej-Ken, yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj kxvq. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
29.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g Win Myen mivb trug waag kxvq i-yipq Eei huvb, faa-lo, Zauj kxmj i-yipq teib puv.
29.6: uaq zang yem i-yipq Eei zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq. “+‘+“meib weig i-saa-laa-en myenb Navq tiub lua'g ti'g pyaab Byaag.
29.13: “+‘weig zu'g zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, Jiaj liud feij zyepg Havj, yia xij syrug zunq zu'g Raanj mivb yem maang fivj Bu'Dovj Eei i-yipq myenb.
29.12: peiq paaig Waav Eei zwavj kua'q, yia xij pun i-yipq penj kaub paaig Waav Eei teib puv. peiq luvb Diaq yetg zuvq paaig Waav Eei zivb, i-yipq Eei zivb zuvq kaub paaig Waav Jiaj pwavq feij zyepg Havj. yia xij pun i-yipq myenb faatq Raanj mivb yem maang kua'q maang fivj Bu'Dovj.
29.15: peiq maang kua'q, i-yipq se kaub mau Jiaj Eei kua'q, yetg liud maiq haib Taaib kanb kaub Lo kanb nxm kua'q. yia xij pun ninb Bua penj nxm faij Eei kua'q zyrug yetg liud maiq haib cvj kunq kanb nxm kua'q.
29.11: maiq maaib myenb Eei zauj fai scvb Kuq Eei teib Jiaj uaq nxm teib puv. maiq maaib haiq taub yem naaig pwavq feij zyepg Havj.
29.1: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb ta'zyepg Havj, zyepg Laaj, zyepg Eeig uaq Nxi, yia tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
29.10: weig naaiq yia Zauj meib cvj Zauj meib Eei yetg zuvq Do'q zruj winb wavq. yia xij pun i-yipq teib puv penj paaig waaig Eei Daub Waav yem mikq-Don Tauj si-e-ne  cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj e-Ti-o-pia  Eei kapg Jaaij.

30.18: yia yem Taa-paan-hetg pun i-yipq kunq Eei Qa'q tavj uaq zang, luvb Nxi zang zyrug Mwavj mivb. ninb zruj mauj Eei Qa'q xij zitg mig a'q, maaib Bwrnj xij om Jyenq i-yipq, nxmb nxm zivb Eei myenb xij zu'g kwaatq mivb.
30.8: yia xij pun trud puaq i-yipq teib puv, Tevj ninb Eei yetg zuvq myenb yaag zu'g myetg Revg, uaq zang ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
30.3: weig zu'g uaq nxm Nxi Tauj fatq a'q,   zyruq Eei Nxi Tauj fatq. penj maaib Bwrnj Eei Nxi, maang kua'q zu'g tivg zwid Eei Nxi.
30.21: “paamb myenb aa'b! yia Bx'q nauq i-yipq huvb, faa-lo, Eei puad. puad yaag maiq tu'q peu. maiq maaib haiq taub peu weig zxg lovj, pun puad cvj henq taaib haib fevj Ru'g Daauq.
30.14: yia xij pun patg-lotq penj Daub Waav, xij pun trud puaq soj-an zivb, yaag syemq tivg Te-Betg zivb Eei zwid.
30.23: yia xij pun i-yipq myenb faatq Raanj mivb yem maang kua'q maang fivj Bu'Dovj.
30.6: “+‘zyruq Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘paaq Jyenq i-yipq teib puv uaq teij xij zu'g Baav. i-yipq zruj mauj Eei Qa'q xij zu'g Dxtq Fiag. yem mikq-Don Tauj si-e-ne ninb Bua yem i-yipq ka'Euad zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. naaiq se zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq Eei waag.
30.2: “paamb myenb aa'b! meib xij zu'g trug waag kxvq, ‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘meib xij zu'g Qa'q Eyemq Jyenq kxvq, “uaq nxm Nxi Kruq a'q.”
30.20: yia Bua zu'g kwaatq mivb zyepg yetq Havj, zib Laaj scvb Zyetq uaq Nxi, yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
30.24: yia xij pun Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb Eei puad henq yaag zx'q yia Eei Ru'g Daauq pun ninb Eei puad nanq Jyenq. mq paag yia xij pun faa-lo Eei puad nauq. ninb zyrug txv Jyenq Baa-Bi-lon huvb Funb Navq zu'g syav, haib taig Eei myenb.
30.7: peiq zu'g paaig Waav Eei maang kua'q, i-yipq kaub zu'g paaig Waav Jiaj. ninb Eei zivb yaag zu'g paaig Waav yem zu'g paaig Waav Eei zivb Bu'Dovj.
30.19: yia Navq naaiq pun i-yipq zu'g tivg zwid, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq ’+”
30.17: on zivb Zauj Pi-Be-setg zivb Eei myenb lunj myenb xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij. naaiq teij zivb Eei myenb yaag xij zu'g kwaatq mivb.
30.11: ninb Zauj kan ninb Eei myenb, se yem zwavj kua'q Bu'Dovj kaub Zyruq Jiaj Eei fivj, zyrug pia'g taaib myetg naaiq nxm teib puv. ninb Bua xij pcv Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq Zauj i-yipq Bx'q Jaaj, pun teib puv maaib zu'g taij Eei myenb pwavq Revg.
30.5: “+‘maaib e-Ti-o-pia myenb, Putq myenb, lu-De myenb, aa-laa-Bia Eei yetg zuvq myenb Zauj li-Bia myenb, cvj maaib yem teib puv Zauj ninb Bua tovb Hruq kapq Qa'q Eei myenb yaag xij zu'g Ru'g Daauq taij.
30.9: “+‘Tauj uaq Nxi yia xij pun trug fyenj myenb pia'g Ravq mivb weig hc'q maiq kx'g Jaav Eei e-Ti-o-pia myenb kamb Riaj. i-yipq zu'g myetg uaq Nxi, e-Ti-o-pia myenb yaag xij zu'g Kruq naang, weig zu'g naaiq nxm Nxi za'kevb xij Tauj a'q.
30.16: yia xij pun trud puaq i-yipq. pe-lu-syem xij zu'g tiaq tomb Kruq naang. Te-Betg zuvq zu'g Bx'q paaig, mem-fitq luvb Nxi zang yaag zu'g Kruq.
30.4: zuvq maaib Ru'g Daauq Tauj i-yipq taij i-yipq myenb, e-Ti-o-pia myenb yaag zu'g Kruq naang. yem i-yipq zu'g taig Eei myenb Kiv Fiag uaq zang, i-yipq Eei zinb zxib zu'g pyenb mivb, ninb Eei kxnb Do'q yaag zu'g Zc'q Revg.
30.10: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘yia xij lovg Baa-Bi-lon Eei huvb, ne-Bu-Katq-netq-saa, Eei puad pun i-yipq Eei zinb zxib zutg Revg.
30.22: weig naaiq zyruq Tinb huvb kxvq, yia zruj i-yipq Eei huvb, faa-lo, Eei winb wavq. yia xij Bx'q ninb Eei puad nauq, se henq uaq Jia'q Zauj nauq Jiaj uaq Jia'q. yia xij pun ninb Eei puad puvj Ru'g Daauq Dxtq Fiag.
30.12: yia xij pun nai-aa Daaib Gaai mivb, yaag zx'q teib puv maaig pun yem x'q myenb Eei puab Diaq. yia xij lovg kanb fivj myenb Eei puad zruj pun teib puv Zauj yem teib puv Eei Euvb Euvg ka'naaiq zu'g paaig Waav Revg. yia, zyruq, kxvq liud a'q.
30.15: yia Eei ka'Qiaj xij pctq Zwrtq pun i-yipq wrnq Eei laaub, se pe-lu-syem zivb, yaag xij pun Te-Betg Eei zwavj myenb zu'g Pai kwavg.
30.13: “+‘zyruq Tinb huvb Navq naaiq kxvq, “+‘yia xij myetg Revg miub favj, yaag yem mem-fitq pun Jaaq zyenb zutg Revg. yavb naaiq mivb i-yipq maiq maaib huvb kunq, yia zyrug pun yem i-yipq teib puv Eei myenb kamb Riaj.
30.1: yia cvj tu'q zipq zyruq Eei waag kxvq,
30.26: yia xij pun i-yipq myenb faatq Raanj mivb yem ziaj kua'q ziaj fivj Bu'Dovj. ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.”
30.25: yia xij pun Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puad maaib Qa'q, mq paag faa-lo Eei puad xij mau Fiag. yia zx'q yia Eei Ru'g Daauq an Jyenq Baa-Bi-lon huvb Eei puad, ninb yaag suv Ru'g Daauq Zwrtq taaib taij i-yipq myenb uaq zang, ninb Bua zyrug hiuq tu'q yia se zyruq.
